tika-s0519t:4_1: taṃ pana dhammasaṃvaṇṇanāsu viññūnaṃ bahumānuppādanatthaṃ, taṃ sammadeva tesaṃ uggahaṇadhāraṇādikkamaladdhabbāya
tika-s0519t:4_2: sammāpaṭipattiyā sabbahitasukhanipphādanatthaṃ. Atha vā maṅgalabhāvato, sabbakiriyāsu
tika-s0519t:4_3: pubbakiccabhāvato, paṇḍitehi sammācaritabhāvato, āyatiṃ paresaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanato
tika-s0519t:4_4: ca saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmakiriyā. Atha vā ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇaṃ pūjanīyapūjāpuññavisesanibbattanatthaṃ,
tika-s0519t:4_5: taṃ attano yathāladdhasampattinimittassa kammassa balānuppadānatthaṃ, antarā ca tassa
tika-s0519t:4_6: asaṅkocanatthaṃ, tadubhayaṃ anantarāyena aṭṭhakathāya parisamāpanatthaṃ. Idameva
tika-s0519t:4_7: ca payojanaṃ ācariyena idhādhippetaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati “vandanājanitaṃ…pe… tassa
tika-s0519t:5: “Pūjārahe pūjayato, buddhe yadi va sāvake”ti. ca,
tika-s0519t:7: “Ye, bhikkhave, buddhe pasannā, agge te pasannā, agge kho pana pasannānaṃ aggo vipāko hotī”ti ca,
tika-s0519t:10: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenapi jambudīpassa;
tika-s0519t:13: “Yasmiṃ, mahānāma, samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosa…pe… na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hotī”ti ca,
tika-s0519t:16: Bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā, lomahaṃso na hessatī”ti. ca;
tika-s0519t:17_0: Tattha yassa ratanattayassa vandanaṃ kattukāmo, tassa guṇātisayayogasandassanatthaṃ
tika-s0519t:17_2: ca katā vandanā yathādhippetappayojanaṃ sādhetīti. Tattha yassā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmo,
tika-s0519t:17_3: sā netti visesato yathānulomasāsanasannissayā, tassa ca vicittākārappavattivibhāvinī.
tika-s0519t:17_4: Tathā hi suttantadesanā na vinayadesanā viya karuṇāppadhānā, nāpi abhidhammadesanā
tika-s0519t:17_5: viya paññāppadhānā, atha kho karuṇāpaññāppadhānāti tadubhayappadhānadesanāvisesavibhāvanaṃ
tika-s0519t:17_6: tāva sammāsambuddhassa thomanaṃ kātuṃ tammūlakattā sesaratanānaṃ “mahākāruṇikaṃ nātha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:18_0: Tattha kiratīti karuṇā, paradukkhaṃ vikkhipati apanetīti attho. Atha vā kiṇātīti
tika-s0519t:18_1: karuṇā, paradukkhe sati kāruṇikaṃ hiṃsati vibādhatīti attho. Kampanaṃ karotīti vā
tika-s0519t:18_2: karuṇā, paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakhedaṃ karotīti attho. Kamiti vā sukhaṃ, taṃ
tika-s0519t:18_3: rundhatīti karuṇā. Esā hi paradukkhāpanayanakāmatālakkhaṇā, attasukhanirapekkhatāya
tika-s0519t:18_4: kāruṇikānaṃ sukhaṃ rundhati vibandhatīti attho. Kiriyati dukkhitesu pasāriyatīti
tika-s0519t:18_5: vā karuṇā, karuṇāya niyuttoti kāruṇiko yathā “dovāriko”ti. Yathā hi dvāraṭṭhānato
tika-s0519t:18_6: aññattha vattamānopi dvārapaṭibaddhajīviko puriso dvārānativattavuttitāya dvāre niyuttoti
tika-s0519t:18_7: “dovāriko”ti vuccati, evaṃ bhagavā mettādivasena karuṇāvihārato aññattha vattamānopi
tika-s0519t:18_9: paṭṭhāya hi yāva mahāparinibbānā lokahitatthameva lokanāthā tiṭṭhantīti. Mahanto
tika-s0519t:18_10: kāruṇikoti mahākāruṇiko. Satipi bhagavato tadaññaguṇānampi vasena mahantabhāve kāruṇikasaddasannidhānena
tika-s0519t:18_11: vuttattā karuṇāvasenevettha mahantabhāvo veditabbo yathā “mahāveyyākaraṇo”ti. Evañca
tika-s0519t:18_12: katvā “mahākāruṇiko”ti iminā padena puggalādhiṭṭhānena satthu mahākaruṇā vuttā hoti.
tika-s0519t:19_0: Aparo nayo – atthasādhanato karuṇaṃ karuṇāyanaṃ karuṇāsampavattanaṃ arahatīti kāruṇiko.
tika-s0519t:19_1: Bhagavato hi sabbaññutāya anavasesato sattānaṃ hitaṃ, hitupāyañca jānato, tattha
tika-s0519t:19_2: ca akilāsuno hitesitā satthikā, na tathā aññesanti. Atha vā karuṇā karuṇāyanaṃ sīlaṃ
tika-s0519t:19_3: pakati sabhāvo etassāti kāruṇiko. Bhagavā hi pathavīphassādayo viya kakkhaḷaphusanādisabhāvā
tika-s0519t:19_4: karuṇāsabhāvo sabhāvabhūtakaruṇoti attho. Sesaṃ purimasadisameva. Atha vā mahāvisayatāya,
tika-s0519t:19_5: mahānubhāvatāya, mahapphalatāya ca mahatī karuṇāti mahākaruṇā. Bhagavato hi karuṇā
tika-s0519t:19_6: niravasesesu sattesu pavattati, pavattamānā ca anaññasādhāraṇā pavattati, diṭṭhadhammikādibhedañca
tika-s0519t:19_7: mahantameva sattānaṃ hitasukhaṃ ekantato nipphādeti, mahākaruṇāya niyuttoti mahākāruṇiko,
tika-s0519t:19_8: taṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Sumāgadhādipadānaṃ viya
tika-s0519t:20_0: Nāthatīti nātho, veneyyānaṃ hitasukhaṃ āsīsati patthetīti attho, mettāyanavasena
tika-s0519t:20_1: cettha hitasukhāsīsanaṃ veditabbaṃ, na karuṇāyanavasena paṭhamapadena vuttattā. Atha
tika-s0519t:20_2: vā nāthati veneyyagataṃ kilesabyasanaṃ upatāpetīti nātho, nāthatīti vā nātho, yācatīti
tika-s0519t:20_3: attho. Bhagavā hi “sādhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ attasampattiṃ paccavekkhitā”tiādinā
tika-s0519t:20_4: sattānaṃ taṃ taṃ hitappaṭipattiṃ yācitvāpi mahākaruṇāya samussāhito te tattha niyojeti.
tika-s0519t:20_5: Paramena vā cittissariyena samannāgato, sabbasatte vā sīlādiguṇehi īsati abhibhavatīti
tika-s0519t:21_0: Ñātabbanti ñeyyaṃ, atītādibhedabhinnaṃ sabbaṃ saṅkhataṃ, asaṅkhatañca. Saṅgaraṇaṭṭhena
tika-s0519t:21_1: sāgaro, patitapatitānaṃ attano puthulagambhīrabhāvehi saṃsīdanaṃ nimmujjanaṃ karotīti
tika-s0519t:21_2: attho. Saṃ-saddassa cettha “sābhāvo, sārāgo”tiādīsu viya niruttinayena daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0519t:21_3: Saṅgaraṇaṭṭhenāti vā saṅgarakaraṇaṭṭhena, ṭhitadhammatāya “ayaṃ me mariyādā, imaṃ
tika-s0519t:21_4: velaṃ nātikkamāmī”ti lokena saṅgaraṃ saṅketaṃ karonto viya hotīti attho. Saṅgaraṇaṃ
tika-s0519t:21_5: vā samantato galanaṃ sandanaṃ udakena karotīti sāgaro. Kappavuṭṭhānakāle hi mahāsamuddo
tika-s0519t:21_6: ito cito ca paggharitvā sakalaṃ lokadhātuṃ ekoghaṃ karotīti. Lokiyā pana vadanti
tika-s0519t:21_7: “sāgarassa rañño puttehi sāgarehi nibbattito khatoti sāgaro, puratthimo samuddappadeso,
tika-s0519t:21_8: taṃsambandhatāya ruḷhivasena sabbopi samuddo tathā voharīyatī”ti. Sāgarasadisattā
tika-s0519t:21_9: sāgaro, ñeyyameva sāgaroti ñeyyasāgaro. Sadisatā cettha puthuladuttaragambhīrānādikālikatāhi
tika-s0519t:21_10: veditabbā, nihīnaṃ cetamopammaṃ. Tathā hi ñeyyasseva sātisayā puthulatā aparimāṇalokadhātubyāpanato,
tika-s0519t:21_11: sabbaññutaññāṇasseva taraṇīyatāya duttaratā, gambhīratā, ādikoṭirahitā ca pavatti,
tika-s0519t:21_12: na itarassa paricchinnadesattā bāhirakavītarāgehipi ittarena khaṇena atikkamitabbattā,
tika-s0519t:21_13: parimitagambhīrattā, parimitakālattā ca. Ñeyyasāgarassa pāraṃ pariyantaṃ gatoti ñeyyasāgarapāragū,
tika-s0519t:22_0: Gamanañcettha ñāṇagamanameva, na itaraṃ ñeyyaggahaṇato, taṃ pana ñāṇaṃ duvidhaṃ sammasanapaṭivedhabhedato,
tika-s0519t:22_1: tathā hetuphalabhedato. Tattha “kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno”tiādinā karuṇāyanavaseneva
tika-s0519t:22_2: abhinivisitvā anekākāravokāre saṅkhāre sammasantaṃ bhagavato sammasanañāṇaṃ chattiṃsakoṭisatasahassamukhena
tika-s0519t:22_3: ñeyyasāgaraṃ ajjhogāhetvā tassa pāraṃ pariyantaṃ agamāsi, yaṃ “mahāvajirañāṇa”nti
tika-s0519t:22_4: vuccati. Paṭivedhañāṇaṃ pana sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ, āsavakkhayañāṇapadaṭṭhānañca
tika-s0519t:22_5: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, yaṃ “mahābodhī”ti vuccati. Pāragamanañca tassa kiccasiddhiyā, samatthatāya
tika-s0519t:22_6: ca veditabbaṃ. Tathā yathāvuttaṃ sammasanañāṇaṃ hetu, itaraṃ phalaṃ. Saha sammasanañāṇena
tika-s0519t:22_7: vā āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ hetu, sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ phalaṃ tadānisaṃsabhāvatoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:23_0: Vandeti namāmi, abhitthavāmi vā. Saṇhaṭṭhena nipuṇā, anupacitañāṇasambhārānaṃ agādhaṭṭhena
tika-s0519t:23_1: gambhīrā, ekattādibhedato nandiyāvaṭṭādivibhāgato ca vicitrā visiṭṭhā nānāvidhā nayā
tika-s0519t:23_2: etissāti nipuṇagambhīravicitranayā, nipuṇagambhīravicitranayā desanā assāti nipuṇagambhīravicitranayadesano,
tika-s0519t:23_3: taṃ nipuṇa…pe… desanaṃ. Nayatīti vā nayo, pāḷigati, sā ca vuttanayena atthato nipuṇā,
tika-s0519t:23_4: atthato byañjanato ca gambhīrā, saṅkhepavitthārānulomādippavattiyā nānāvidhatāya
tika-s0519t:24_0: Tattha dvīhākārehi bhagavato thomanā veditabbā attahitasampattito, parahitappaṭipattito
tika-s0519t:24_1: ca. Tesu attahitasampatti anāvaraṇañāṇādhigamato, savāsanānaṃ sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ
tika-s0519t:24_4: ca veditabbā. Sā panettha payogato, āsayato ca duvidhā, parahitappaṭipatti, yathāvuttabhedā
tika-s0519t:24_5: duvidhā ca attahitasampatti pakāsitā hoti. Kathaṃ? “Mahākāruṇika”nti iminā āsayato,
tika-s0519t:24_6: “nipuṇa…pe… desana”nti iminā payogato, “nātha”nti iminā pana ubhayathāpi bhagavato
tika-s0519t:25_0: Atha vā tīhākārehi bhagavato thomanā veditabbā hetuto, phalato, upakārato ca. Tattha
tika-s0519t:25_1: hetu mahākaruṇā, sā pana paṭhamapadena sarūpeneva dassitā. Phalaṃ catubbidhaṃ ñāṇasampadā
tika-s0519t:25_2: pahānasampadā ānubhāvasampadā rūpakāyasampadā cāti. Tāsu padhānabhūtā ñāṇapahānasampadā
tika-s0519t:25_3: “ñeyyasāgarapāragu”nti iminā padena pakāsitā. Padhāne hi dassite avinābhāvato itarampi
tika-s0519t:25_4: dvayaṃ dassitameva hoti. Na hi buddhānaṃ ānubhāvarūpakāyasampattīhi vinā kadācipi
tika-s0519t:25_5: dhammakāyasirī vattatīti. Upakāro anantaraṃ abāhiraṃ katvā tividhayānamukhena vimuttidhammadesanā,
tika-s0519t:25_6: sā “nāthaṃ, nipuṇa…pe… desana”nti padadvayena pakāsitāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:26_0: Tattha “mahākāruṇika”nti etena sammāsambodhiyā mūlaṃ dasseti. Mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso
tika-s0519t:26_1: hi bhagavā saṃsārapaṅkato sattānaṃ samuddharaṇatthaṃ katābhinīhāro anupubbena pāramiyo
tika-s0519t:26_2: pūretvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ adhigatoti karuṇā sammāsambodhiyā mūlaṃ. “Ñeyyasāgarapāragu”nti
tika-s0519t:26_3: etena pubbabhāgappaṭipattiyā saddhiṃ sammāsambodhiṃ dasseti. Anāvaraṇañāṇapadaṭṭhānañhi
tika-s0519t:26_5: pana sammasanañāṇaṃ saha paññāpāramiyā tassā pubbabhāgapaṭipadā. Tassā hi ānubhāvena
tika-s0519t:26_7: ukkaṃsapāramippattā majjhimā paṭipadā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gatā. “Nātha”nti iminā sammāsambodhiyā
tika-s0519t:26_8: phalaṃ dasseti lokattayanāyakabhāvadīpanato. Tathā hi sabbānatthaparihārapubbaṅgamāya
tika-s0519t:26_11: bhagavā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ anuttaragāravaṭṭhānabhūtatāya
tika-s0519t:26_12: ca “nātho”ti vuccatīti. “Nipuṇa…pe… desana”nti iminā sammāsambodhiyā payojanaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0519t:26_13: Saṃsāramahoghato sattasantāraṇatthañhi bhagavatā sammāsambodhi abhipatthitā, tañca
tika-s0519t:26_14: sattasantāraṇaṃ yathāvuttadesanāsampattiyā samijjhati tadavinābhāvato. Iminā bhagavato
tika-s0519t:26_15: sātisayā parahitappaṭipatti dassitā, itarehi attahitasampattīti tadubhayena attahitāya
tika-s0519t:26_16: paṭipannādīsu catūsu puggalesu bhagavato catutthapuggalabhāvaṃ dīpeti, tena ca anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvaṃ,
tika-s0519t:26_17: uttamavandanīyabhāvaṃ, attano ca vandanakiriyāya khettaṅgatabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0519t:27_0: Ettha ca yathā “mahākāruṇika”nti iminā padena bhagavato mahākaruṇā dassitā, evaṃ
tika-s0519t:27_1: “ñeyyasāgarapāragu”nti etena mahāpaññā dassitā. Tesu karuṇāggahaṇena lokiyesu mahaggatabhāvappattāsādhāraṇaguṇadīpanato
tika-s0519t:27_3: sabbalokuttaraguṇasampatti. Tadubhayaggahaṇasiddho eva cattho nāthasaddena pakāsīyati.
tika-s0519t:27_4: Karuṇāvacanena upagamanaṃ nirupakkilesaṃ dasseti, paññāvacanena apagamanaṃ. Tathā
tika-s0519t:27_5: karuṇāggahaṇena lokasamaññānurūpaṃ bhagavato pavattiṃ dasseti lokavohāravisayattā
tika-s0519t:27_6: karuṇāya, paññāggahaṇena samaññāya anatidhāvanaṃ. Sabhāvānavabodhena hi dhammānaṃ
tika-s0519t:27_7: samaññaṃ atidhāvitvā sattādisammasanaṃ hotīti. Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena mahākaruṇāsamāpattivihāraṃ
tika-s0519t:27_8: dasseti, paññāggahaṇena tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇaṃ, catusaccañāṇaṃ, catupaṭisambhidāñāṇaṃ,
tika-s0519t:27_10: cha abhiññā, aṭṭhasu parisāsu akampanañāṇāni, dasa balāni, cuddasa buddhañāṇāni,
tika-s0519t:27_11: soḷasa ñāṇacariyā, aṭṭhārasa buddhadhammā, catucattālīsa ñāṇavatthūni sattasattati
tika-s0519t:27_12: ñāṇavatthūnīti evamādīnaṃ anekesaṃ paññāppabhedānaṃ vasena ñāṇacāraṃ dasseti.
tika-s0519t:28_0: Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena caraṇasampatti, paññāggahaṇena vijjāsampatti. Karuṇāggahaṇena
tika-s0519t:28_1: sattādhipatitā, paññāggahaṇena dhammādhipatitā. Karuṇāggahaṇena lokanāthabhāvo, paññāggahaṇena
tika-s0519t:28_2: attanāthabhāvo. Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena pubbakāribhāvo, paññāggahaṇena kataññutā. Karuṇāggahaṇena
tika-s0519t:28_3: aparantapatā, paññāggahaṇena anattantapatā. Karuṇāggahaṇena vā buddhakaradhammasiddhi,
tika-s0519t:28_4: paññāggahaṇena buddhabhāvasiddhi. Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena paresaṃ tāraṇaṃ, paññāggahaṇena
tika-s0519t:28_5: sayaṃ tāraṇaṃ. Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena sabbasattesu anuggahacittatā, paññāggahaṇena
tika-s0519t:28_6: sabbadhammesu virattacittatā dassitā hoti. Sabbesañca buddhaguṇānaṃ karuṇā ādi taṃnidānabhāvato,
tika-s0519t:28_7: paññā pariyosānaṃ tato uttari karaṇīyābhāvato, iti ādipariyosānadassanena sabbe buddhaguṇā
tika-s0519t:28_8: dassitā honti. Tathā karuṇāvacanena sīlakkhandhapubbaṅgamo samādhikkhandho dassito
tika-s0519t:28_9: hoti. Karuṇānidānañhi sīlaṃ tato pāṇātipātādiviratippavattito, sā ca jhānattayasampayoginīti.
tika-s0519t:28_10: Paññāvacanena paññākkhandho. Sīlañca sabbabuddhaguṇānaṃ ādi, samādhi majjhe, paññā
tika-s0519t:28_11: pariyosānanti evampi ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti nayato
tika-s0519t:28_12: dassitattā. Eso eva hi niravasesato buddhaguṇānaṃ dassanupāyo, yadidaṃ nayaggāhaṇaṃ,
tika-s0519t:28_13: aññathā ko nāma samattho bhagavato guṇe anupadaṃ niravasesato dassetuṃ. Tenevāha –
tika-s0519t:29: “Buddhopi buddhassa bhaṇeyya vaṇṇaṃ, kappampi ce aññamabhāsamāno;
tika-s0519t:30: Khīyetha kappo ciradīghamantare, vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassā”ti. ;
tika-s0519t:31: Teneva ca āyasmatā sāriputtattherenāpi buddhaguṇaparicchedanaṃ pati anuyuttena “no hetaṃ, bhante”ti paṭikkhipitvā “apica me, bhante, dhammanvayo vidito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:32_0: Evaṃ saṅkhepena sakalasabbaññuguṇehi bhagavantaṃ abhitthavitvā idāni saddhammaṃ thometuṃ
tika-s0519t:32_2: dhammānaṃ salakkhaṇaṃ, sāmaññalakkhaṇañca vindatīti vijjā, lobhakkhandhādīni vā vijjhanaṭṭhena
tika-s0519t:32_3: vijjā, catunnaṃ vā ariyasaccānaṃ viditakaraṇaṭṭhena vijjāti evaṃ tāvettha vacanatthato
tika-s0519t:32_4: vijjā veditabbā. Pabhedato pana tissopi vijjā vijjā bhayabheravasutte āgataniyāmeneva,
tika-s0519t:32_5: aṭṭhapi vijjā vijjā ambaṭṭhasuttādīsu āgataniyāmeneva. Caranti tehīti caraṇāni, sīlasaṃvarādayo
tika-s0519t:32_6: pañcadasa dhammā, iti imāhi vijjāhi, imehi ca caraṇehi sampannā sampannāgatāti vijjācaraṇasampannā.
tika-s0519t:33_0: Yenāti yena dhammena karaṇabhūtena, hetubhūtena ca. Tattha maggadhammassa karaṇattho
tika-s0519t:33_2: Paccayattho hi ayaṃ hetvattho. Pariyattidhammassapi hetuattho yujjateva paramparāya
tika-s0519t:33_3: hetubhāvato. Phaladhamme pana ubhayampi sambhavati. Kathaṃ? “Tāya saddhāya avūpasantāyā”ti
tika-s0519t:33_4: vacanato maggena samucchinnānaṃ kilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhippahānakiccatāya phalassa
tika-s0519t:33_5: niyyānānuguṇatā, niyyānapariyosānatā cāti iminā pariyāyena siyā karaṇattho niyyānakiriyāya.
tika-s0519t:33_6: Sakadāgāmimaggavipassanādīnaṃ pana upanissayapaccayabhāvato siyā hetuattho. Evañca
tika-s0519t:33_7: katvā aggappasādasuttādīsu aggādibhāvena aggahitāpi phalapariyattidhammā chattamāṇavakavimānādīsu
tika-s0519t:33_8: saraṇīyabhāvena gahitāti tesaṃ magganibbānānaṃ viya mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ saraṇabhāvo
tika-s0519t:33_9: uddhaṭo. Visesato cettha maggapariyāpannā eva vijjācaraṇadhammā veditabbā. Te hi
tika-s0519t:33_10: nippariyāyena niyyānakiriyāya sādhakatamabhūtā, na itare. Itaresaṃ pana niyyānatthatāya
tika-s0519t:33_11: niyyānatā. Yadi evaṃ kasmā “vijjācaraṇasampannā hutvā”ti vuttaṃ, niyyānasamakālameva
tika-s0519t:33_12: hi yathāvuttavijjācaraṇasampattisamadhigamoti? Nāyaṃ virodho samānakālatāya eva adhippetattā
tika-s0519t:33_13: yathā “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”nti. Sampannāti vā padassa
tika-s0519t:33_14: vattamānakālatthatā veditabbā “uppannā dhammā”ti ettha uppannasaddassa viya. Evañca
tika-s0519t:33_15: katvā vacanasesamantareneva padayojanā siddhā hoti. “Yenā”ti ca padaṃ ubhayattha
tika-s0519t:33_16: sambandhitabbaṃ “yena dhammena vijjācaraṇasampannā, yena dhammena niyyantī”ti.
tika-s0519t:34_0: Lokatoti khandhādilokato, vaṭṭatoti attho. Nti taṃ magganibbānaphalapariyattibhedaṃ
tika-s0519t:34_1: dhammaṃ. Uttamanti seṭṭhaṃ. Tathā hesa attanā uttaritarassa abhāvena “anuttaro”ti
tika-s0519t:34_2: vuccati. Tattha maggassa niyyānahetuādiatthena, nibbānassa nissaraṇavivekādiatthena,
tika-s0519t:34_3: phalassa ariyasantabhāvādiatthena ca seṭṭhatā veditabbā. Svāyamattho “yāvatā, bhikkhave,
tika-s0519t:34_4: dhammā saṅkhatā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti ādisuttapadānusārena vibhāvetabbo.
tika-s0519t:35_0: Dhammanti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne apāyato, saṃsārato ca apatamāne katvā dhāretīti
tika-s0519t:35_1: dhammo. Sammā, sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddho, sabbaññutāanāvaraṇañāṇo
tika-s0519t:35_2: samantacakkhu bhagavā, tena yathā sammāsambodhisamadhigameneva sabbe buddhaguṇā sampāpuṇīyanti,
tika-s0519t:35_3: evaṃ sammadeva āsevanāya bhāvanāya bahulīkiriyāya sammāpaṭipattiyā sammadeva paccavekkhaṇāya
tika-s0519t:36_0: “Ariyaṃ, vo bhikkhave, sammāsamādhiṃ desessāmi. Maggānaṭṭhaṅgiko seṭṭho. Yāvatā,
tika-s0519t:36_1: bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā, virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati. Ekāyano
tika-s0519t:36_2: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, maggo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā. Dhammaṃ, vo bhikkhave, desessāmi ādikalyāṇa”nti –
tika-s0519t:37: Ādivacanehi, abhitthavanena ca pūjito mānito apacitoti sammāsambuddhapūjito, taṃ sammāsambuddhapūjitaṃ dhammaṃ vandeti sambandho.
tika-s0519t:38_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho – yassa dhammassa adhigamane vijjāsampannā ceva honti
tika-s0519t:38_1: caraṇasampannā ca, sabbavaṭṭadukkhato ca niyyanti, tameva ariyānaṃ sakalaguṇasamaṅgibhāvanimittaṃ,
tika-s0519t:38_2: anavasesadukkhanissaraṇahetubhūtañca uttamaṃ pavaraṃ saddhiṃ pariyattidhammena navavidhaṃ
tika-s0519t:38_3: lokuttaradhammaṃ bhagavatāpi sammāpaṭipattiādividhinā pūjitaṃ namāmi, abhitthavāmi vāti.
tika-s0519t:39_0: Ettha ca “yena lokato niyyanti, vijjācaraṇasampannā ca hontī”ti padadvayena yathākkamaṃ
tika-s0519t:39_1: dhammassa bhāvetabbabhāvo, sacchikātabbabhāvo ca vutto. Tesu paṭhamena vijjāsampattiyā
tika-s0519t:39_2: dhammaṃ thometi, dutiyena vimuttisampattiyā. Tathā paṭhamena jhānasampadāya, dutiyena
tika-s0519t:39_3: vimokkhasampadāya. Paṭhamena vā samādhisampadāya, dutiyena samāpattisampadāya. Paṭhamena
tika-s0519t:39_4: vā khayañāṇabhāvena, dutiyena anuppādañāṇabhāvena. Atha vā purimena vijjūpamatāya,
tika-s0519t:39_5: dutiyena vajirūpamatāya. Purimena vā virāgasampattiyā, dutiyena nirodhasampattiyā.
tika-s0519t:39_6: Tathā paṭhamena niyyānabhāvena, dutiyena nissaraṇabhāvena. Paṭhamena vā hetubhāvena,
tika-s0519t:39_7: dutiyena asaṅkhatabhāvena. Paṭhamena vā dassanabhāvena, dutiyena vivekabhāvena. Paṭhamena
tika-s0519t:39_8: vā adhipatibhāvena, dutiyena amatabhāvena dhammaṃ thometi. Atha vā paṭhamena niyyānikabhāvadassanato
tika-s0519t:39_9: svākkhātatāya dhammaṃ thometi, dutiyena sacchikātabbabhāvato sandiṭṭhikatāya. Tathā
tika-s0519t:39_10: purimena akālikatāya, pacchimena ehipassikatāya. Purimena vā opaneyyikatāya, pacchimena
tika-s0519t:40_0: “Uttama”nti ca etena aññassa visiṭṭhassa abhāvadīpanena paripuṇṇatāya dhammaṃ thometi,
tika-s0519t:40_2: Parisuddhatāya cassa pahānasampadā, paripuṇṇatāya pabhavasampadā. Pahānasampattiyā
tika-s0519t:40_4: tatuttari karaṇīyābhāvato. Anaññasādhāraṇatāya hi uttamoti. Tathā bhāvetabbabhāvenassa
tika-s0519t:40_5: saha pubbabhāgasīlādīhi sekkhā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā, sacchikātabbabhāvena saha
tika-s0519t:40_6: asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā asekkhā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā dassitā hontīti.
tika-s0519t:41_0: Evaṃ saṅkhepena sabbasaddhammaguṇehi saddhammaṃ thometvā idāni ariyasaṅghaṃ thometuṃ
tika-s0519t:41_2: sampanno samannāgato, sampannasīlādiguṇo vā. Ariyānañhi taṃtaṃmaggavajjhakilesappahānena
tika-s0519t:41_3: hatapaṭipakkhā suvisuddhā sīlādayo “sampannā”ti vattabbataṃ arahanti, na puthūjjanānaṃ,
tika-s0519t:41_4: yato “suppaṭipanno”tiādinā ariyasaṅgho thomīyati. Atha vā sīlādiguṇasampannoti paripuṇṇasīlādiguṇo.
tika-s0519t:41_5: Ariyapuggalānañhi ariyasaccappaṭivedhena saheva yathārahaṃ sekkhāsekkhā sīlādidhammakkhandhā
tika-s0519t:41_6: pāripūriṃ gacchantīti. Ṭhito maggaphalesūti maggesu, phalesu ca ṭhito, maggaṭṭho,
tika-s0519t:41_7: phalaṭṭho cāti attho. Yoti aniyamato ariyasaṅghaṃ niddisati, tassa “ta”nti iminā niyamaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:42_0: Nanu ca ariyasaṅghe na sabbe ariyapuggalā maggaṭṭhā, nāpi sabbe phalaṭṭhāti? Saccametaṃ,
tika-s0519t:42_1: avayavadhammena pana samudāyaṃ niddisanto evamāha yathā “samaṃ cuṇṇa”nti. Yathā hi
tika-s0519t:42_2: yogacuṇṇassa avayavesu labbhamāno samabhāvo samudāye apadisīyati “samaṃ cuṇṇa”nti,
tika-s0519t:42_3: evaṃ ariyasaṅghassa avayavabhūtesu ariyapuggalesu labbhamāno maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhabhāvo
tika-s0519t:43_0: Ārakattā kilesehi, anaye na iriyanato, aye ca iriyanato, sadevakena ca lokena “saraṇa”nti
tika-s0519t:43_1: araṇīyato ariyo, diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatattā saṅgho, ariyo ca so saṅgho cāti ariyasaṅgho,
tika-s0519t:43_2: taṃ ariyasaṅghaṃ. Pujjabhavaphalanibbattanato attano santānaṃ punātīti vā puññaṃ,
tika-s0519t:43_3: khittaṃ vuttaṃ bījaṃ viruhanaṭṭhānatāya tāyati rakkhatīti khettaṃ kedārādi, khettaṃ
tika-s0519t:43_4: viyāti khettaṃ, sattānaṃ puññassa mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena viruhanaṭṭhānatāya khettanti
tika-s0519t:44_0: Ettha ca “sīlādiguṇasampanno”ti etena ariyasaṅghassa bhagavato anujātaputtataṃ dasseti,
tika-s0519t:44_1: tenassa pabhavasampadā dīpitā hoti. “Ṭhito maggaphalesū”ti etena pahānasampadaṃ,
tika-s0519t:44_3: ca. “Ariyasaṅgha”nti etena pabhavasampadaṃ sabbasaṅghānaṃ aggabhāvadīpanato, sadevakena
tika-s0519t:44_4: ca lokena araṇīyabhāvadīpanato. “Puññakkhettaṃ anuttara”nti etena lokassa bahūpakārataṃ
tika-s0519t:45_3: hitasukhāya paṭipannatādīpanaṃ. Tathā “ṭhito maggaphalesū”ti idaṃ ariyasaṅghassa
tika-s0519t:45_4: lokuttarasaraṇagamanasabbhāvadīpanaṃ, tenassa bhagavato orasaputtabhāvo dassito hoti.
tika-s0519t:45_6: sīlādidhammakkhandhā dassitā. “Ariyasaṅghaṃ puññakkhettaṃ anuttara”nti iminā tesaṃ
tika-s0519t:45_7: tesaññeva yathāvuttaguṇavisesānaṃ suparisuddhataṃ dīpeti. Tenassa mahānubhāvataṃ,
tika-s0519t:45_8: anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvaṃ, vandanārahabhāvaṃ, attano ca vandanākiriyāya khettaṅgatabhāvaṃ
tika-s0519t:45_9: dīpeti. Saraṇagamanañca sāvakānaṃ sabbaguṇānaṃ ādi, sapubbabhāgappaṭipadā sekkhā
tika-s0519t:45_10: sīlakkhandhādayo majjhe, asekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo pariyosānanti ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā
tika-s0519t:45_11: sabbe ariyasaṅghaguṇā imāya gāthāya pakāsitāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:46_0: Evaṃ gāthāttayena saṅkhepato sakalaguṇasaṃkittanamukhena ratanattayassa paṇāmaṃ katvā
tika-s0519t:46_1: idāni taṃ nipaccakāraṃ yathādhippete payojane pariṇāmento “vandanājanita”nti gāthamāha.
tika-s0519t:46_3: nipaccakāravasena vā uppāditanti attho. Itīti evaṃ “mahākāruṇika”ntiādippakārena.
tika-s0519t:46_4: Ratijananaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, buddhadhammasaṅghā, cittīkatādibhāvo vā ratanaṭṭho. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-s0519t:49_0: Cittīkatabhāvādayo ca anaññasādhāraṇā buddhādīsu eva labbhanti, ratanānaṃ tayaṃ ratanattayaṃ,
tika-s0519t:49_1: tasmiṃ ratanattaye. Hatantarāyoti vidhastaupaddavo hutvāti sambandho, etena attano
tika-s0519t:49_2: pasādasampattiyā, ratanattayassa ca khettabhāvasampattiyā tassa puññassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanāya
tika-s0519t:49_3: upaghātakaupaddavānaṃ vihanane samatthataṃ dasseti. Sabbatthāti sabbasmiṃ anto ceva
tika-s0519t:49_4: bahi ca, ajjhattikabāhiravatthūsūti attho. Sabbatthāti vā sabbasmiṃ kāle, saṃvaṇṇanāya
tika-s0519t:49_5: ādimajjhapariyosānakālesūti vuttaṃ hoti. Hutvāti pubbakālakiriyā, tassa “karissāmatthavaṇṇana”nti
tika-s0519t:49_6: etena sambandho. Tassāti yaṃ ratanattaye vandanājanitaṃ puññaṃ, tassa. Tejasāti ānubhāvena balena.
tika-s0519t:50_0: Evaṃ ratanattayavandanāya payojanaṃ dassetvā idāni nettippakaraṇassa gambhīratthattā
tika-s0519t:50_1: atthasaṃvaṇṇanāya dukkarabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “ṭhiti”ntiādimāha. Tattha ṭhitinti ṭhānaṃ
tika-s0519t:50_3: saddhammanetti ciraṃ tiṭṭheyyā”ti evaṃ patthayantenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Ciranti dīghakālaṃ,
tika-s0519t:50_5: nettiyā. Saddhammo hi veneyyasantānesu ariyaguṇānaṃ nayanato netti, saddhammassa
tika-s0519t:50_6: vā netti saddhammanetti, tassā saddhammanettiyā, svāyamattho aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vicārito
tika-s0519t:50_7: eva. Therenāti thiraguṇayuttena. Abhiyācitoti ādaragāravena yācito. Abhimukhaṃ vā
tika-s0519t:50_8: yācito, anuttaraṃ katvā yācitoti attho. Uddissa vā yācito, garutaraṃ katvā yācitoti
tika-s0519t:50_9: attho, “karotu āyasmā nettippakaraṇassa kañci atthasaṃvaṇṇana”nti evaṃ nettiyā atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ
tika-s0519t:50_10: pati ajjhesitoti vuttaṃ hoti. Ettha ca saddhammassa ciraṃ ṭhitikāmena ajjhāsayasampannena
tika-s0519t:50_11: sāsane thiraguṇayuttena sabrahmacārinā ādaragāravena, abhimukhaṃ vā yācitena me na
tika-s0519t:50_12: sakkā tassa abhiyācanaṃ paṭikkhipitunti dasseti “ṭhitiṃ ākaṅkhamānenā”ti gāthāya.
tika-s0519t:51_1: samantacakkhunā eva vā hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalakaṃ viya abhinīhāraṃ passantena. Tādināti
tika-s0519t:51_2: tādibhāvayuttena, sabbattha vā nibbikārena, “amhākaṃ bhagavatā”ti vacanaseso. Yassāti
tika-s0519t:52: “Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākaccāno”ti –
tika-s0519t:53: Evaṃ ṭhapito. Sīlādiguṇavisesehi mahantā sāvakāti mahāsāvakā, mahākassapādayo, tesu ayamāyasmā aññataroti, mahāsāvako ca so guṇavisesayogato uttamo cāti mahāsāvakuttamo.
tika-s0519t:54_0: Jhānādīsu sātisayānaṃ āvajjanādivasībhāvānaṃ, ariyiddhivasena paramassa ca cetovasībhāvassa
tika-s0519t:54_2: “Paṇḍito, bhikkhave, mahākaccāno, mahāpañño, bhikkhave, mahākaccāno”tiādinā anekesu
tika-s0519t:54_3: ṭhānesu bhagavatā pasaṃsitattā sambuddhena pasaṃsito. Tena vuttaṃ “satthu ceva saṃvaṇṇito
tika-s0519t:55_0: Anumoditāti “sādhu sādhu, kaccāna, sādhu kho, tvaṃ kaccāna, imaṃ dhammasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ
tika-s0519t:55_1: abhāsī”ti evaṃ anumoditā. Ekasmiṃ kira samaye ayaṃ mahāthero jambuvanasaṇḍe viharanto
tika-s0519t:55_2: attano santikāvacarānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ imaṃ hāranayapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ pakaraṇaṃ abhāsi. Bhāsitvā
tika-s0519t:55_3: ca bhagavato santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisinno yathābhāsitaṃ
tika-s0519t:55_4: imaṃ pakaraṇaṃ bhagavato nivedesi. Taṃ sutvā bhagavā “sādhu sādhū”tiādinā anumoditvā
tika-s0519t:55_5: “tasmātiha, tvaṃ kaccāna, imaṃ dhammasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ dhammanettitveva dhārehī”ti nāmaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0519t:56_0: Gambhīrañāṇehīhi gambhīrehi ñāṇehi, na saddhāmattakena, gambhīrañāṇehi vā mahāpaññehi
tika-s0519t:56_1: ariyehi. Pakaraṇassa gambhīratthataṃ, attano ca ñāṇassa nātivisayataṃ viditvā saṃvaṇṇanārambhe
tika-s0519t:56_2: saṃsīdantampi maṃ sāsanaguṇādiupanissayasampadā ussāhesīti imamatthaṃ dasseti “kiñcāpī”tiādinā.
tika-s0519t:57_0: “Pañcapi nikāye ogāhetvā”ti iminā nettiyā pañcapi mahānikāye anupavisitvā avaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0519t:57_1: tesaṃ saṃvaṇṇanābhāvañca dīpeti. Tattha “katamo assādo ca ādīnavo cā”tiādipeṭakopadesapāḷiṃ
tika-s0519t:57_2: ānetvā idha desanāhārādīnaṃ padatthavinicchayo peṭakena saṃsandanaṃ nāma. “yathābala”nti
tika-s0519t:57_3: iminā sabbathā sabbabhāgenāpi nettiyā saṃvaṇṇanā mayā na sukarā kātuṃ, attano pana
tika-s0519t:58_0: Suvisuddhanti suṭṭhu visuddhaṃ, nikāyantaraladdhidosehi antarantarā anuppavesitehi
tika-s0519t:58_1: asammissanti adhippāyo. Asaṃkiṇṇanti sanikāyepi padatthantaraparikappanādinā asaṃkiṇṇaṃ
tika-s0519t:58_2: tādisasaṅkararahitaṃ anākulaṃ suparicchinnaṃ. Vividhehi ākārehi nicchinotīti vinicchayo.
tika-s0519t:58_3: Atthānaṃ vinicchayo atthavinicchayo. Gaṇṭhiṭṭhānabhūtesu atthesu khilamaddanākārena
tika-s0519t:58_4: pavattā vimaticchedakathā, nipuṇo sukhumo saṇho atthavinicchayo etassāti nipuṇatthavinicchayo.
tika-s0519t:58_5: Atha vā atthe vinicchinotīti atthavinicchayo, yathāvuttaatthavisayañāṇaṃ, nipuṇo
tika-s0519t:58_6: cheko atthavinicchayo etassāti nipuṇatthavinicchayo, taṃ nipuṇatthavinicchayaṃ. Samayanti
tika-s0519t:58_7: siddhantaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ siddhanto vuttanayena suparisuddho,
tika-s0519t:58_8: anākulo, saṇhasukhumavinicchayo ca, siddhantaṃ taṃ avilomento anukūlato tattha siddhaṃyeva
tika-s0519t:59_0: Pamādalekhanti aparabhāge potthakāruḷhakāle pamajjitvā likhanavasena pavattappamādapāṭhaṃ.
tika-s0519t:59_1: Vajjetvāti apanetvā. Pāḷiṃ sammā niyojayanti taṃ taṃ nettipāḷiṃ tattha tattha udāharaṇabhāvena
tika-s0519t:59_2: ānītasutte sammadeva niyojento, atthasaṃvaṇṇanāya vā taṃ taṃ udāharaṇasuttasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0519t:59_3: pāḷiṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ lakkhaṇabhūte nettiganthe sammadeva niyojento. Upadesanti nettiupanisaṃ
tika-s0519t:59_4: nettihadayaṃ. Yvāyaṃ sapaṭṭhānavibhāgassa tettiṃsavidhassa nettipadatthassa saha
tika-s0519t:59_5: nimittavibhāgena asaṅkarato vavatthito visayo, taṃ. Vibhāvento pakāsento. Tassā nettiyā
tika-s0519t:60_0: Ettha ca “abhiyācito”ti iminā atthasaṃvaṇṇanāya nimittaṃ dasseti, “ṭhitiṃ ākaṅkhamānena
tika-s0519t:60_1: ciraṃ saddhammanettiyā”ti iminā payojanaṃ, “karissāmatthavaṇṇana”nti iminā piṇḍatthaṃ.
tika-s0519t:60_2: Saṃvaṇṇiyamānā hi pakaraṇatthā saṃvaṇṇanāya piṇḍattho. “Tamupanissāyā”tiādinā karaṇappakāraṃ.
tika-s0519t:61: Idāni saṃvaṇṇanāya savane niyojento “iti attha”nti osānagāthamāha. Tattha “sakkacca”nti padaṃ ubhayattha yojetabbaṃ “sakkaccaṃ vibhajantassa, sakkaccaṃ nisāmayathā”ti.
tika-s0519t:64_1: nettipadatthaparijānanameva ādimhi yuttarūpanti tadatthaṃ pucchati “tattha kenaṭṭhena
tika-s0519t:64_2: nettī”ti. Tattha tatthāti “tassā nettiyā karissāmatthavaṇṇana”nti yadidaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0519t:64_3: tasmiṃ; yassā karissāmatthavaṇṇananti paṭiññātaṃ, sā netti kenaṭṭhena nettīti attho.
tika-s0519t:64_4: Tatthāti vā “nettippakaraṇassā”ti etasmiṃ vacane yā netti vuttā, sā kenaṭṭhena nettīti
tika-s0519t:64_6: nayatī”ti kattusādhanavasena tāva nettisaddassa atthaṃ vatvā idāni karaṇādhikaraṇasādhanavasena
tika-s0519t:65_0: Tathā hi vuttanti nettiupadesādhīnattā eva suttāvabodhassa vuttaṃ. Peṭake “tasmā
tika-s0519t:65_1: nibbāyitukāmena sutamayena atthā pariyesitabbā, tattha pariyesanāya ayaṃ anupubbī
tika-s0519t:65_2: bhavati soḷasa hārā pañca nayā aṭṭhārasa mūlapadānī”tiādi. Hāranayavicāraṇā vinimutto
tika-s0519t:65_4: Svāyamattho parato pakiṇṇakakathāyaṃ āvi bhavissati. Evaṃ mahāvisayā cāyaṃ netti
tika-s0519t:65_5: kuto pabhavāti āha “suttappabhavā”ti, etena nettiyā pamāṇabhūtataṃ dasseti. Idañca
tika-s0519t:65_7: hi pañca mahānikāye ogāhetvā taṃsannissayeneva tesaṃ saṃvaṇṇanābhūtaṃ imaṃ pakaraṇaṃ
tika-s0519t:65_8: abhāsi, tasmā ayameva saṃvaṇṇanādhammo, yadidaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbadhammasannissayatā.
tika-s0519t:66_0: Pakaraṇaparicchedatoti pakaraṇassa vibhāgato. Hāravicārādayo hi tayo nettippakaraṇassa
tika-s0519t:66_1: vibhāgā, pakaraṇabhūtaparicchedato vā. Tīṇi hi etāni pakaraṇāni tayo adhikārā, yadidaṃ
tika-s0519t:67_0: “Sabbo hi pakaraṇattho”tiādinā saṅgahavārassa anvatthasaññataṃ dasseti. “Nanu cettha
tika-s0519t:67_1: paṭṭhānaṃ asaṅgahita”nti codako byabhicāramāha. Itaro yadipi sarūpato asaṅgahitaṃ,
tika-s0519t:67_2: atthato pana saṅgahitanti dassento “nayidameva”tiādinā pariharati. Puna “tathā hī”tiādinā
tika-s0519t:67_3: tamevatthaṃ pāḷiyā pākaṭataraṃ karoti. Atthanayā nandiyāvaṭṭādayo. Saṅkhārattikā
tika-s0519t:67_4: puññābhisaṅkhārādayo, kāyasaṅkhārādayo ca. Tesu atthanayānaṃ aññamaññasaṅgaho parato
tika-s0519t:67_5: āvi bhavissati. Itare pana kāmāvacarā, rūpāvacarā ca kusalā cetanā puññābhisaṅkhāro,
tika-s0519t:67_6: akusalā cetanā apuññābhisaṅkhāro, arūpāvacarā kusalā cetanā āneñjābhisaṅkhāro. Puññābhisaṅkhāro
tika-s0519t:67_7: ca apuññābhisaṅkhāro ca kāyadvārappavatto kāyasaṅkhāro, so eva vacīdvārappavatto
tika-s0519t:67_8: vacīsaṅkhāro, manodvārappavatto pana tividhopi cittasaṅkhāro. Iti jātivasena purimattike
tika-s0519t:67_9: vuttā eva dhammā dvāravasena dutiyattike vuttā, te eva ca purimattiketi aññamaññasaṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-s0519t:68_0: Yatthāti yasmiṃ vāre. Peṭaketi peṭakopadese. Sampatamānāti saṃvaṇṇanāvasena sannipatantā.
tika-s0519t:68_1: “Byañjanavidhiputhuttā”ti idaṃ ekasmiṃ sutte anekesaṃ hārānaṃ sannipatanassa kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:69_0: “Na sarūpato”ti iminā saṅgahavāre viya uddesaniddesavāresupi paṭṭhānassa atthato
tika-s0519t:69_1: uddhaṭataṃ dasseti. Mūlapadaggahaṇeneva gahitattā uddesavāre tāva evaṃ hotu, niddesavāre
tika-s0519t:69_2: pana kathanti? Tatthāpi nayaggahaṇeneva mūlapadānipi gahitānīti veditabbaṃ. Na hi
tika-s0519t:69_3: mūlapadehi vinā kāci nayayojanā sambhavati. Apare pana “hāranayā viya paṭṭhānaṃ na
tika-s0519t:69_4: suttassa saṃvaṇṇanāviseso, atha kho tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte saṃkilesabhāgiyatādilabbhamānavisesamattanti
tika-s0519t:69_5: na tassa pakaraṇassa padatthasaṅgaho. Evañca katvā tettiṃsāya nettipadatthesu paṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0519t:70_0: “Pāḷito eva viññāyatī”ti vuttamatthaṃ samatthento “tathā hi…pe… ābhata”nti āha, tena
tika-s0519t:70_1: therena bhāsitabhāvo viya bhagavatā anumoditabhāvopi pāḷianugato evāti dasseti. Sāvakabhāsitattā
tika-s0519t:70_2: nidānaṃ na vuttanti na sakkā vattunti codento “sāvaka…pe… bhāsita”nti āha. Nayidaṃ
tika-s0519t:70_3: ekantikanti ca sāvakabhāsitabuddhabhāsitabhāvo nidānāvacanassa, nidānavacanassa ca
tika-s0519t:70_4: akāraṇaṃ ubhayatthāpi ubhayassa dassanato. Tasmā nidānāvacanena nettiyā asāvakabhāsitatā
tika-s0519t:70_5: na sijjhatīti dasseti. Tenāha “na ca tāvatā tāni appamāṇaṃ, evamidhāpi daṭṭhabba”nti.
tika-s0519t:71_0: Yeneva kāraṇena nidānāvacanassa pamāṇabhāvasādhanatā, teneva kāraṇena imassa pakaraṇassa
tika-s0519t:71_1: pamāṇabhāvasiddhīti dasseti “nidānañca nāmā”tiādinā. Idāni “atha vā”tiādinā nettiyā
tika-s0519t:71_2: nidānāvacanena abyabhicārahetumāha. Ayañhettha payogo na nettiyā nidānaṃ vattabbaṃ
tika-s0519t:71_3: pāḷiyā atthasaṃvaṇṇanābhāvato. Yā hi pāḷiyā atthasaṃvaṇṇanā na tassā nidānavacanaṃ
tika-s0519t:72_0: “Ayaṃ vibhāgo”tiādinā ekavidhato paṭṭhāya yāva caturāsītisahassappabhedā, tāva yathādassitassa
tika-s0519t:72_1: pakaraṇavibhāgassa puna “ādinā nayena pakaraṇavibhāgo veditabbo”ti idaṃ nigamanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:72_2: Tattha ādinā nayenāti ādisaddena abhiññeyyadhammaniddesato paññattipaññapetabbadhammavibhajanato
tika-s0519t:74_0: Yanti aniyamattho sabbanāmasaddo kammasādhanavasena vutto. Atthāvabodhanattho saddappayogo
tika-s0519t:74_1: atthaparādhīno kevalo atthapadatthako, so padatthavipariyesakārinā iti-saddena parabhūtena
tika-s0519t:74_2: saddapadatthako jāyatīti āha “yanti aniyamato upayoganiddeso”ti. Lokoti kattuniddesotiādīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0519t:75_1: vatvā idāni avayavajotanavasena padatthaṃ dassetuṃ “lokiyanti etthā”tiādimāha. Lokasaddo
tika-s0519t:75_3: Sāsanantaradhānato paraṃ pūjanā aññabuddhuppādena veditabbā, yathetarahi vipassīādisammāsambuddhānaṃ.
tika-s0519t:75_5: pana pavattiṃ sandhāya vuttanti āha “yathāha bhagavā sumedhabhūto”ti.
tika-s0519t:76_1: Tena vuttaṃ “suññatamukhādīhī”ti. Tathā ca vuttanti viññūhi vedanīyatāya eva sāsanavarassa vuttaṃ bhagavatā –
tika-s0519t:77: “Etu viññū puriso asaṭho amāyāvī ujujātiko, ahamanusāsāmi, ahaṃ dhammaṃ desemi, yathānusiṭṭhaṃ tathā paṭipajjamāno na cirasseva sāmaññeva ussati, sāmaṃ dakkhitī”tiādi.
tika-s0519t:78_0: Yaṃ-saddo sāsanavisayo, lokapālasaddo satthuvisayopi lokaṃ pati guṇībhūtoti “tassā”ti
tika-s0519t:78_1: paṭiniddesassa kathaṃ satthuvisayatāti codanaṃ manasikatvā āha “salokapāloti cetthā”tiādi,
tika-s0519t:78_2: guṇībhūtopi lokapālasaddo padhānabhūto viya paṭiniddesaṃ arahati. Añño hi saddakkamo, añño atthakkamoti.
tika-s0519t:79_0: Dhammagāravena bhagavā dhammaṃ pūjento veneyyabandhave acintetvā samāpattisamāpajjanadhammapaccavekkhaṇāhi
tika-s0519t:79_1: sattasattāhaṃ vītināmesīti āha “bhagavato…pe… dīpetabbā”ti. Tattha ādisaddena sāvakehi
tika-s0519t:80_0: Iccassāti iti assa, evaṃ bhagavato aviparītaanantarāyikaniyyānikadhammadesanāya sabbaññutānāvaraṇabhāvadīpanenāti
tika-s0519t:80_1: attho. Tenāti catuvesārajjayogena. Tadavinābhāvinā dasabala…pe… pakāsitā hoti. Āveṇikabuddhadhammādīti
tika-s0519t:80_2: ettha ādisaddena tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇāni, catusaccañāṇāni, catupaṭisambhidāñāṇāni,
tika-s0519t:80_3: pañcagatiparicchedakañāṇāni, cha abhiññāñāṇāni, satta ariyadhanāni, satta bojjhaṅgā,
tika-s0519t:80_4: aṭṭha vijjā, aṭṭhasu parisāsu akampanañāṇāni, aṭṭha vimokkhā, nava samādhicariyā,
tika-s0519t:80_5: nava anupubbavihārā, dasa nāthakaraṇā dhammā, dasa ariyavāsā, dvādasa dhammacakkākārā,
tika-s0519t:80_6: terasa dhutadhammā, cuddasa buddhañāṇāni, pannarasa caraṇadhammā, soḷasa ñāṇacariyā,
tika-s0519t:80_7: soḷasa ānāpānassatī, ekūnavīsati paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni, catuvīsati paccayavibhāvanañāṇāni,
tika-s0519t:81_0: Aparo nayo – guṇavisiṭṭhataṃ dīpeti, sā ca guṇavisiṭṭhatā mahākaruṇāmahāpaññāhi veditabbā
tika-s0519t:81_1: tāhi satthusampattisiddhito. Tattha mahākaruṇāya pavattibhedo “bahukehi ākārehi passantānaṃ
tika-s0519t:81_2: buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamatī”tiādinā paṭisambhidāmagge vuttanayena
tika-s0519t:81_3: veditabbo. Mahāpaññāya pana pavattibhedo vutto eva. Tattha karuṇāya bhagavato caraṇasampatti,
tika-s0519t:81_4: paññāya vijjāsampatti. Karuṇāya sattādhipatitā, paññāya dhammādhipatitā. Karuṇāya
tika-s0519t:81_5: lokanāthatā, paññāya attanāthatā. Karuṇāya pubbakāritā, paññāya kataññutā. Karuṇāya
tika-s0519t:81_6: aparantapatā, paññāya anattantapatā. Karuṇāya buddhakaradhammasiddhi, paññāya buddhabhāvasiddhi.
tika-s0519t:81_7: Karuṇāya paresaṃ tāraṇaṃ, paññāya sayaṃ tāraṇaṃ. Karuṇāya sabbasattesu anuggahacittatā,
tika-s0519t:81_8: paññāya sabbadhammesu virattacittatā pakāsitā hotīti anavasesato parahitapaṭipattiyā,
tika-s0519t:81_9: attahitasampattiyā ca pāripūrī veditabbā. Tīsupi avatthāsūti hetuphalasattūpakārāvatthāsu.
tika-s0519t:82_0: Abhisamayo paṭivedhasāsanassa, manasikaraṇaṃ paṭipattisāsanassa, savanādīhi paricayakaraṇaṃ
tika-s0519t:82_2: dhammadesanenā”ti iminā idha “sāsana”nti vuttassa tividhassāpi saddhammassa avisesena
tika-s0519t:82_3: desanāpūjaṃ vatvā thomanāpūjanassa vasena taṃ vibhajitvā dassento “ariyaṃ, vo bhikkhave”tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:82_4: Tattha “thomanenā”ti padenāpi “sakkacca”nti padaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Pūjanādvayassāpi vā
tika-s0519t:82_5: vasena idhāpi padayojanā veditabbā. Ariyabhāvādayoti ariyaseṭṭhaaggabhāvādayo. Niyyānādayoti
tika-s0519t:83: Idāni ariyasaṅghaguṇānampi imāya gāthāya pakāsitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “yasmā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bālyādisamatikkamanatoti bālaabyattabhāvādisamatikkamanato.
tika-s0519t:84_1: avatthābhedo. Ubhayanti byañjanapadaṃ, atthapadañca. Ubhayathāti karaṇakammasādhanavasena
tika-s0519t:85_0: “Ayañca gāthā”tiādi kesañci vādo. Tathā hi apare “therenevāyaṃ gāthā bhāsitā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0519t:85_1: Attūpanāyikāpi hi kadāci dhammadesanā hoti eva yathā “dasabalasamannāgato, bhikkhave,
tika-s0519t:85_2: tathāgato catuvesārajjavisārado”tiādi. Evañca katvā “katame soḷasa hārā”tiādivacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0519t:86: Yathāvuttaatthamukhenevāti mūlapadasaṅkhātaatthuddhāreneva. Parato āgamissatīti niddesavārassa pariyosāne āgamissati “tīṇi ca nayā anūnā”tiādinā.
tika-s0519t:87_0: Vuccatīti kattari kammaniddesoti āha “vadatī”ti. Atha vā vuccatīti kammakattuniddesoyaṃ.
tika-s0519t:87_1: Ayañhettha attho – hārā, nayā cāti ubhayaṃ pariggahitaṃ saṃvaṇṇakena sabbathā gahitañce,
tika-s0519t:87_2: vuccati suttaṃ, sayameva suttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetīti, etena hāranayesu vasībhāvena suttasaṃvaṇṇanāya sukarataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0519t:88_0: Pakārantarenāti pubbe “sāsana”nti vuttamatthaṃ “desanā, desita”nti tato aññena pakārena.
tika-s0519t:88_1: Niyametvāti tassa ekantato viññeyyataṃ avadhāretvā. Viññeyyatā visiṭṭhesu desanādesitesu
tika-s0519t:89: Desanādesitāni ca yāvadeva vijānanatthānīti vijānanaṃ padhānanti tameva niddhārento “tatrāti tasmiṃ vijānane”ti āha.
tika-s0519t:90_0: Etthāhāti navaṅgasāsananavavidhasuttantāti etasmiṃ atthavacane āha codako. Tassāyaṃ
tika-s0519t:90_1: adhippāyo – navahi aṅgehi vavatthitehi aññamaññasaṅkararahitehi bhavitabbaṃ, tathā
tika-s0519t:90_2: ca sati asuttasabhāvāneva geyyaṅgādīnīti navavidhasuttantavacanaṃ virujjheyya. Atha
tika-s0519t:90_3: suttasabhāvāni geyyaṅgādīni, evaṃ sati “sutta”nti visuṃ suttaṅgaṃ na siyā, evaṃ sante
tika-s0519t:90_4: aṭṭhaṅgasāsanaṃ āpajjatīti. Tenāha “kathaṃ panā”tiādi. Geyyaṅgādīsu katipayānampi
tika-s0519t:90_5: suttabhāve yathāvuttadosānativatti, pageva sabbesanti dasseti “yañcā”tiādinā. Saṅgahesūti
tika-s0519t:90_6: aṭṭhakathāsu. Porāṇaṭṭhakathānañhi saṅkhepabhūtā idāni aṭṭhakathā “saṅgahā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0519t:90_7: Suttaṃ nāma sagāthakaṃ vā siyā, niggāthakaṃ vāti aṅgadvayeneva tadubhayaṅgaṃ katanti
tika-s0519t:90_8: visuṃ suttaṅgassa asambhavo tadubhayavinimuttassa suttassa abhāvato. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0519t:90_9: “suttaṅgameva na siyā”ti. Athāpi kathañci. Siyāti vakkhamānaṃ sāmaññavidhiṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0519t:91_2: gahetvā “evaṃ sante”tiādinā codeti. Itaro pana okāsavidhito anokāso vidhi balavāti
tika-s0519t:91_3: ñāyaṃ gāthāvirahitaṃyeva veyyākaraṇanti, idhādhippetanti ca dassento “nāpajjatī”tiādinā
tika-s0519t:91_4: pariharati. Tathā hīti teneva kāraṇena, satipi saññantaranimittayoge anokāsasaññānaṃ
tika-s0519t:94_0: 1. Vibhāgenāti sarūpavibhāgena. Adiṭṭhaṃ jotīyati etāyāti adiṭṭhajotanā. Diṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0519t:94_1: saṃsandīyati etāyāti diṭṭhasaṃsandanā, saṃsandanaṃ cettha sākacchāvasena vinicchayakaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0519t:94_2: Vimati chijjati etāyāti vimaticchedanā. Anumatiyā pucchā anumatipucchā. “Taṃ kiṃ
tika-s0519t:94_3: maññathā”ti hi kā tumhākaṃ anumatīti anumati pucchitā. Kathetukamyatāti kathetukamyatāya.
tika-s0519t:95_1: atthaṃ vatvā sadisakappanāvasena dassetuṃ “hārā viyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Puna ganthakaraṇādiatthena
tika-s0519t:95_3: “Haraṇato, ramaṇato cā”ti iminā manoharā manoramā cete saṃvaṇṇanāvisesāti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:96: Upapattisādhanayuttīti lakkhaṇahetu. Vuttanayenāti “nanu ca aññepi hārā yuttisahitā evā”tiādinā desanāhāre vuttanayānusārena.
tika-s0519t:97: Catunnaṃ byūho etthāti bhinnādhikaraṇānampi padānaṃ aññapadatthasamāso labbhati “urasilomo”tiādīnaṃ viyāti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:99: Anuppavesīyantīti avagāhīyanti. Samādhīyantīti pariharīyanti. Vinā vikappenāti jāti sāmaññaṃ, bhedo sāmaññaṃ, sambandho sāmaññantiādinā padatthantarabhāvavikappanamantarena.
tika-s0519t:101_0: 2. Sambandhoti hetuphalabhāvayogo. Tathābhūtānañhi dhammānaṃ ekasantānasiddhatā ekattanayo.
tika-s0519t:101_1: Vibhāgo satipi nesaṃ hetuphalabhāve vibhattasabhāvatā. Añño eva hi hetu, aññaṃ phalanti.
tika-s0519t:101_2: Byāpāraviraho nirīhatā. Na hi hetuphalānaṃ evaṃ hoti “ahaṃ imaṃ nibbattemi, imināhaṃ
tika-s0519t:101_3: nibbatto”ti. Anurūpaphalatā paccayuppannānaṃ paccayānukūlatā. Samūhādiṃ upādāya lokasaṅketasiddhā
tika-s0519t:101_5: Ayañhettha saṅkhepo – yasmiṃ bhinne, itarāpohe vā cittena katena tathā buddhi, idaṃ
tika-s0519t:101_6: sammutisaccaṃ yathā ghaṭe, sasambhārajale ca, tabbipariyāyena paramatthasaccanti.
tika-s0519t:102: Antoti abbhantaro. Padhānāvayavenāti mūlabhāvena. “Nandī dukkhassa mūla”ntiādīsu taṇhā “nandī”ti vuttā. “Saṅgāme ca nandiṃ caratī”tiādīsu pamodoti āha “taṇhāya, pamodassa vā”ti.
tika-s0519t:103_0: 3. Jātibhedatoti kusalā, akusalāti imasmā visesā. Yujjantīti ettha hetuattho antonīto
tika-s0519t:103_1: veditabboti āha “yojīyantī”ti. Kehi yojīyanti? Saṃvaṇṇanakehīti adhippāyo. Yujjantīti
tika-s0519t:103_2: vā yuttā honti, tehi samānayogakkhamā taggahaṇeneva gahitā hontīti attho tadekaṭṭhabhāvato.
tika-s0519t:103_3: Imasmiṃ atthe “navahi padehī”ti sahayoge karaṇavacanaṃ, purimasmiṃ karaṇe. “Ete kho”ti
tika-s0519t:103_4: ca pāṭho. Tattha kho-saddassa padapūraṇatā, avadhāraṇatthatā vā veditabbā. Ete evāti
tika-s0519t:103_5: ete taṇhādayo eva, na ito aññeti attho. Aṭṭhāraseva na tato uddhaṃ, adho vāti. Purimasmiṃ
tika-s0519t:103_6: pakkhe mūlapadantarābhāvo, dutiyasmiṃ tesaṃ anūnādhikatā dīpitā hoti.
tika-s0519t:106_0: 4. Niddesavāre sāmaññatoti sādhāraṇato. Visesenāti asādhāraṇato. Padatthoti saddattho.
tika-s0519t:106_1: Lakkhaṇanti sabhāvo. Kamoti anupubbī. Ettāvatāti ettakappamāṇabhāvo. Hetvādīti hetuphalabhūmiupanisāsabhāgavisabhāgalakkhaṇanayā.
tika-s0519t:108_0: 1. Yaṃ, bhikkhaveti ettha yanti paccattavacanaṃ, tañca sukhaṃ, somanassanti dvayena
tika-s0519t:108_1: samānādhikaraṇanti katvā “assādīyatīti assādo, sukhaṃ, somanassañcā”ti vuttaṃ. Sukhādivedanā
tika-s0519t:108_2: viya manāpiyarūpādipi avītarāgassa assādetabbanti āha “evaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇampī”ti. “Assādeti
tika-s0519t:108_3: etāyāti vā assādo, taṇhā”ti etena “ya”nti hetuatthe nipātoti dasseti. Tatrāyamattho
tika-s0519t:108_4: – yena hetunā pañcupādānakkhandhe paṭicca assādanīyabhāvena uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ,
tika-s0519t:108_5: ayaṃ taṇhāsaṅkhāto assādo assādanakiriyāya kāraṇanti. Iti katvā ayamattho diṭṭhābhinandanādibhāvato
tika-s0519t:108_6: vipallāsesupi sambhavatīti āha “evaṃ vipallāsāpī”ti. Aniṭṭhampīti pi-saddena iṭṭhampīti
tika-s0519t:108_7: yojetabbaṃ, anavasesā sāsavā dhammā idha ārammaṇaggahaṇena gahitāti āha “sabbesaṃ
tika-s0519t:109_0: Dukkhādukkhamasukhavedanānanti ettha dukkhasabhāvā eva adukkhamasukhā vedanā gahitā
tika-s0519t:109_1: aniṭṭhārammaṇassa adhippetattā, na sukhasabhāvā. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “yāyaṃ, bhante,
tika-s0519t:109_2: adukkhamasukhā vedanā, santasmiṃ esā paṇīte sukhe vuttā bhagavatā”ti. “Sukhapariyāyasabbhāvato”ti
tika-s0519t:109_3: iminā iṭṭhatāmattatopi lesena sattānaṃ ārammaṇassa assādanīyatā sambhavatīti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:110_0: Ādīnavo dosanissandanatāya doso, svāyaṃ pīḷanavuttiyā veditabboti āha “ādīnavo dukkhā
tika-s0519t:110_1: vedanā, tissopi vā dukkhatā”ti. Evaṃ dosatthataṃ ādīnavassa dassetvā idāni kapaṇatthataṃ
tika-s0519t:110_2: dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yatoti yasmā dosakapaṇasabhāvattāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0519t:111_0: Nissaratīti vivitti, sabbasaṅkhāravivekoti attho. Sāmaññaniddesenāti nissaraṇasaddavacanīyatāsāmaññena.
tika-s0519t:111_1: Purimānanti assādādīnavatānaṃ. Upāyo cātiādīsu ca-saddo padapūraṇamattanti katvā
tika-s0519t:112: Kāmabhavādīnanti ādi-saddena na rūpārūpabhavā eva gahitā, atha kho te ca saññībhavādayo ca ekavokārabhavādayo ca gahitā. Tenāha “tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhavāna”nti.
tika-s0519t:113_0: Yāvadeva anupādāparinibbānatthā bhagavato desanāti āha “nanu ca…pe… nipphādīyatī”ti.
tika-s0519t:113_2: kho”tiādinā pariharati. “Paramparāyā”ti etena ajjhattaṃ yonisomanasikāro viya na
tika-s0519t:113_3: paratoghoso āsannakāraṇaṃ dhammādhigamassa dhammassa paccattaṃ vedanīyattāti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:113_4: Tathā hi “akkhātāro tathāgatā, paṭipannā pamokkhanti, jhāyino mārabandhanā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:113_5: Tadadhigamakāraṇaṃ ariyamaggādhigamakāraṇaṃ siyā. Kiṃ pana tanti āha “sampattibhavahetū”ti,
tika-s0519t:114_0: “Attānudiṭṭhiṃ ūhacca, evaṃ maccutaro siyā”ti idaṃ ariyamaggassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya
tika-s0519t:114_1: phalabhāvasādhanaṃ. Yena hi vidhinā attānudiṭṭhisamugghāto, maccutaraṇañca siyā,
tika-s0519t:114_2: so “eva”nti iminā pakāsitoti. Attānudiṭṭhisamugghātamaccutaraṇānaṃ phalabhāve vattabbameva natthi.
tika-s0519t:115_0: “Dhammo have”ti pana gāthāyaṃ lokiyassa puññaphalassa vuttattā āha “idaṃ phala”nti.
tika-s0519t:115_1: Yaṃ nibbattetabbaṃ, taṃ phalaṃ. Yaṃ nibbattakaṃ, so upāyo. Ayamettha vinicchayo.
tika-s0519t:116: Visuddhīti ñāṇadassanavisuddhi adhippetāti āha – “etthāpi…pe… viññātu”nti. “Yasmā panā”tiādināpi tamevatthaṃ vacanantare pākaṭataraṃ karoti.
tika-s0519t:117_0: Sarūpato āgatāni “yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ samudayañca
tika-s0519t:117_1: atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”tiādīsu. Ekadesena
tika-s0519t:117_2: āgatāni “saṃyojaniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assādānupassino viharato, bahudukkhā
tika-s0519t:117_3: bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo, saṅkhārānametaṃ nissaraṇaṃ, yadidaṃ nibbāna”ntiādīsu.
tika-s0519t:117_4: Na sarūpena āgatāni yathā sāmaññaphalasuttādīsu. Atthavasenāti assādetabbādiatthavasena.
tika-s0519t:118_0: 2. Eseva nayoti atidesena viciyamānavacanaseso atidiṭṭho. Bhāvatthe tohi āha “vissajjitanti
tika-s0519t:118_1: vissajjanā”ti. Sutte āgataṃ na atthasaṃvaṇṇanāvasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0519t:118_2: Pucchānurūpatā idha pubbāparanti catubyūhapubbāparato imaṃ visesetvā dasseti. Pucchānusandhīti
tika-s0519t:118_3: pucchāya vissajjanena anusandhānaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana heṭṭhimadesanāya pucchānimittapavattauparidesanāya
tika-s0519t:118_5: “Suttassā”ti vā iminā pucchāvissajjanāanugītiyo ṭhapetvā seso vicayahārapadattho
tika-s0519t:118_6: saṅgahitoti padassāpi saṅgaho veditabbo. Imasmiṃ pakkhe gāthāyaṃ ca-saddo padapūraṇamatte daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0519t:119_0: “Cakkhu anicca”nti puṭṭhe “āma, cakkhu aniccamevā”ti ekantato vissajjanaṃ ekaṃsabyākaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0519t:119_3: kusala”nti puṭṭhe “kiṃ anavajjaṭṭho kusalaṭṭho, udāhu sukhavipākaṭṭho”ti paṭipucchitvā
tika-s0519t:119_4: vissajjanaṃ paṭipucchābyākaraṇaṃ. “Sassato attā, asassato vā”ti vutte “abyākatameta”ntiādinā
tika-s0519t:119_5: avissajjanaṃ ṭhapanaṃ. “Kiṃ panete kusalāti vā dhammāti vā ekatthā, udāhu nānatthā”ti
tika-s0519t:119_6: idaṃ pucchanaṃ sāvasesaṃ. Vissajjanassa pana sāvasesatā veneyyajjhāsayavasena desanāyaṃ
tika-s0519t:119_7: veditabbā. Appāṭihīrakaṃ sauttaraṃ. Sappāṭihīrakaṃ niruttaraṃ. Sesaṃ vicayahāraniddese suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0519t:120_0: Ettha ca assādo assādahetu yāva āṇattihetūti evaṃ hetūnampi assādādayo veditabbā.
tika-s0519t:120_1: Tattha saṅkhepato sukhasukhapaccayalakkhaṇo assādo, so visesato saggasampattiyā dīpetabbo.
tika-s0519t:120_2: Sā hi tassa ukkaṃso, sesā panettha bhavasampatti tadanvāyikā veditabbā. Tassa hetu
tika-s0519t:120_3: dānamayaṃ, sīlamayañca puññakiriyavatthu. Dukkhadukkhapaccayalakkhaṇo ādīnavo. Vipariṇāmasaṅkhāradukkhatānaṃ
tika-s0519t:120_4: tadavarodhato vaṭṭadukkhassāpi ettha saṅgaho. Visesato pana kāmānaṃ okāroti daṭṭhabbo,
tika-s0519t:120_5: svāyaṃ saṃkilesavatthunā, ittarapaccupaṭṭhānatādīhi ca vibhāvetabbo, tassa hetu dasa
tika-s0519t:120_6: akusalakammapathā. Nekkhammaṃ nissaraṇaṃ, tassa hetu yathārahaṃ tadanucchavikā pubbabhāgappaṭipadā.
tika-s0519t:120_7: Phalaṃ desanāphalameva, tassa hetu desanā. Upāyo yathāvuttaupāyova, tassa hetu cattāri
tika-s0519t:120_8: cakkāni. Āṇatti upadeso, tassa rāgaggiādīhi lokassa ādittatā, satthu mahākaruṇāyogo ca hetu.
tika-s0519t:121_0: Tathā catūsu ariyasaccesu samudayena assādo, dukkhena ādīnavo, magganirodhehi nissaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0519t:121_1: maggo vā upāyo, tadupadeso āṇatti, anupādisesā nibbānadhātu phalaṃ. Iti anupubbakathāya
tika-s0519t:121_2: saddhiṃ buddhānaṃ sāmukkaṃsikāya dhammadesanāya niddhāraṇabhāvena vicayo veditabbo.
tika-s0519t:121_3: Padassa padatthasambandho hetu. So hi tassa pavattinimittaṃ, pañhassa ñātukāmatā,
tika-s0519t:121_4: kathekukāmatā ca. Adiṭṭhajotanādīnañhi catunnaṃ ñātukāmatā, itarassa itarā. Vissajjanassa
tika-s0519t:121_5: pañho hetu. Evaṃ sesānampi yathārahaṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:122_0: 3. Byañjanatthānaṃ yuttāyuttaparikkhāti byañjanaggahaṇena padaṃ gahitaṃ, atthaggahaṇena
tika-s0519t:122_1: pañhādīhi saddhiṃ assādādayo gahitā. Vicayahārapadatthā eva hi yuttāyuttādivisesasahitā
tika-s0519t:122_2: yuttihārādīnaṃ padatthā. Tathā hi padaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānikabhāvavisiṭṭhā teyeva padaṭṭhānahārassa
tika-s0519t:122_3: padatthā. Lakkhaṇalakkhitabbatāvisiṭṭhā, niddhāritā ca lakkhaṇahārassa, nibbacanādivibhāvanāvisiṭṭhā
tika-s0519t:122_10: padatthā. “Byañjanassa sabhāvaniruttitā, atthassa suttādīhi avilomanaṃ yuttabhāvo”ti
tika-s0519t:122_11: iminā asabhāvaniruttitā, suttādīhi vilomanañca ayuttabhāvoti dīpeti, tena yuttāyuttīnaṃ hetuṃ dasseti.
tika-s0519t:123_1: asādhāraṇañca deyyapaṭiggāhakādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Sambhavatoti yathārahaṃ tassa dhammassa
tika-s0519t:123_2: anurūpaṃ. Yāva sabbadhammāti ettha sabbaṃ nāma padesasabbaṃ, na sabbasabbanti. Ayañhi
tika-s0519t:123_3: sabbasaddo yathā paṭhamavikappe sutte āgatadhammavasena padesavisayo, evaṃ dutiyavikappe
tika-s0519t:123_5: eva, na anavasesadhammavisayoti. Suttāgatadhammānaṃ yāni padaṭṭhānāni, tesañca yānīti
tika-s0519t:123_6: evaṃ kāraṇaparamparāniddhāraṇalakkhaṇo padaṭṭhānahāro, parikkhārahāro pana suttāgatadhammānaṃ
tika-s0519t:124_0: 5. Yathā “samānādhikaraṇasamānapade”tiādīsu ekasaddassa attho samānasaddo, evaṃ ekarasaṭṭhena
tika-s0519t:124_1: bhāvanā “ekuppādā”tiādīsu viya ekalakkhaṇāti ettha ekasaddo samānatthoti āha “samānalakkhaṇā”ti.
tika-s0519t:124_2: Saṃvaṇṇanāvasenāti ettha kammatthe ana-saddo, saṃvaṇṇetabbatāvasenāti attho. Lakkhaṇāti
tika-s0519t:124_4: daṭṭhabbā. Saññāsahagatā hi dhammā tattha saññāggahaṇena gahitā. “Dadaṃ mittāni ganthatī”tiādīsu
tika-s0519t:124_5: samānakiccatā. Piyavacanatthacariyā samānattatāpi hi tattha mittaganthanakiccena
tika-s0519t:124_7: Yathā hi phasso vedanāya, evaṃ saññādīnampi sahajātādinā paccayo hoti evāti tepi
tika-s0519t:124_8: samānahetutāya vuttā eva honti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā
tika-s0519t:124_9: cetanā”ti, “phuṭṭho sañjānāti, phuṭṭho cetetī”tiādi. Evaṃ “taṇhāpaccayā upādāna”nti
tika-s0519t:124_11: Yathā hi saṅkhārā avijjāya phalaṃ, evaṃ taṇhupādādīnampīti tepi tattha gahitāva honti.
tika-s0519t:124_12: Tenāha “purimakammabhavasmiṃ moho avijjā āyūhanā saṅkhārā nikanti taṇhā upagamanaṃ
tika-s0519t:124_13: upādāna”nti. “Rūpaṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjatī”ti vutte taṃsampayuttā
tika-s0519t:124_14: vedanādayo vuttā eva honti samānārammaṇabhāvato. Na hi tehi vinā tassa uppatti atthi.
tika-s0519t:124_16: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Atthādivasenapi hi sutte avuttānampi vuttānaṃ viya niddhāraṇaṃ
tika-s0519t:125_0: 6. “Phusanaṭṭhena phasso”tiādinā niddhāretvā vacanaṃ nibbacanaṃ, taṃ pana padasseva,
tika-s0519t:125_1: na vākyassāti āha “padanibbacana”nti. Adhippāyanidānānipettha byañjanamukheneva niddhāretabbāni.
tika-s0519t:126_0: 7. “Padaṭṭhāne”ti idaṃ sutte āgatadhammānaṃ kāraṇabhūtepi dhamme niddhāretvā sabhāgato,
tika-s0519t:126_1: visabhāgato ca āvaṭṭanaṃ kātabbanti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na tantivasena. Tasmā padaṭṭhānaniddhāraṇāya
tika-s0519t:126_2: vināpi āvaṭṭanaṃ yuttamevāti siddhaṃ hoti. Padassa vā saddapavattiṭṭhānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0519t:126_3: padattho. Etasmiṃ pakkhe “ārambhatha nikkamathāti vīriyassa padaṭṭhāna”nti ettha
tika-s0519t:126_4: yvāyamārambhadhātuādiko attho vutto, taṃ vīriyasaddassa pavattiṭṭhānaṃ vīriyasaddābhidheyyo
tika-s0519t:126_5: atthoti evamattho veditabbo. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Sesakaṃ nāmagahitato itaraṃ, taṃ
tika-s0519t:126_6: pana tassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ vā siyā, aññaṃ vāti āha “visabhāgatāya aggahaṇena vā”ti.
tika-s0519t:126_8: pāḷiyaṃ yojento. Tenāha “desana”nti. “Paṭipakkhe”ti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ
tika-s0519t:127_0: 8. Nāmavasenāti sādhāraṇanāmavasena. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “micchattaniyatānaṃ sattānaṃ, aniyatānañca
tika-s0519t:127_2: vuttaṃ. Vatthuvasenāti sattasantānavasena. So hi dhammānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānatāya idha
tika-s0519t:127_3: “vatthū”ti adhippeto. Tenāha – “puthujjanassa, sotāpannassa ca kāmarāgabyāpādā sādhāraṇā”tiādi.
tika-s0519t:127_4: Vuttavipariyāyenāti nāmato, vatthuto ca āveṇikatāya. Taṃtaṃmaggaphalaṭṭhānañhi taṃtaṃmaggaphalaṭṭhatā,
tika-s0519t:128_0: 9. “Bhāvite”ti idaṃ bhāvanākiriyāya upalakkhaṇaṃ, na ettha kālavacanicchāti āha “bhāvetabbeti
tika-s0519t:128_1: attho”ti. Bhāvanā cettha āsevanāti, kusalasaddopi anavajjaṭṭhoti veditabbo. Paṭipakkhatoti
tika-s0519t:133_0: 13. “Gāthāruḷhe”ti iminā pāḷiāgatova pañho veditabbo, na itaroti dasseti. Tenāha
tika-s0519t:133_1: “buddhādīhi byākate”ti. Tassa atthassāti āraddhassa atthassa, tena ārambhasodhanassa
tika-s0519t:133_2: visayamāha. Ettha ca atthadvāreneva padapucchāsodhanampi karīyatīti puna “tassa atthassā”ti
tika-s0519t:133_3: vuttaṃ. Atha vā vissajjitamhīti vissajjane. Vissajjanasodhanena hi pañhāsodhanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:133_4: Pañheti pucchāyaṃ. Gāthāyanti upalakkhaṇaṃ, tena gāthāyaṃ, suttageyyādīsu cāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0519t:133_5: hoti. Yamārabbhāti yaṃ sīlādimārabbha gāthādīsu desitaṃ, tasmiṃ ārambheti attho.
tika-s0519t:133_6: Pucchitāti pucchākārinī, “kā ettha padasuddhi, kā pañhāsuddhi, kā ārambhasuddhī”ti
tika-s0519t:133_7: evaṃ pucchākārinī pucchaṃ katvā pavattitā suddhāsuddhaparikkhāti yojanā.
tika-s0519t:134_0: 14. Na vikappayitabbāti yathā loke “jāti sāmaññaṃ, bhedo sāmaññaṃ, sambandho sāmañña”ntiādinā
tika-s0519t:134_1: sāmaññaṃ jātiādiṃ, tabbidhurañca visesaṃ vikappenti parikappenti, evaṃ na vikappayitabbāti
tika-s0519t:134_2: attho. Yadā yo kālaviseso “sve”ti laddhavohāro, tadā so taṃdivasātikkame “ajjā”ti,
tika-s0519t:134_3: puna taṃdivasātikkame “hiyyo”ti voharīyatīti anavaṭṭhitasabhāvā ete kālavisesā. Disāyapi
tika-s0519t:134_4: “ekaṃ avadhiṃ apekkhitvā puratthimā disā, tato aññaṃ apekkhitvā pacchimā nāma hotī”tiādinā
tika-s0519t:134_7: saccāpekkhāya viseso hotīti evamādiṃ sandhāyāha “esa nayo samudayādīsupī”ti.
tika-s0519t:135_2: “Atthato dassitā”ti idaṃ yasmiṃ sutte bhāvanāva kathitā, na pahānaṃ, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:137_0: 17. Taṇhāvijjāhi karaṇabhūtāhi. Saṃkileso pakkho etassāti saṃkilesapakkho, saṃkilesapakkhiko
tika-s0519t:137_1: suttattho, tassa nayanalakkhaṇoti yojanā. Vodānapakkhassa suttatthassāti sambandho.
tika-s0519t:137_2: Vuṭṭhānagāminiyā, balavavipassanāya ca dukkhādīsu pariññeyyatādīni maggānuguṇo gahaṇākāro
tika-s0519t:137_3: anugāhaṇanayo. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ nayoti āha “tassa panā”tiādi. Tattha “nayavohāro”ti
tika-s0519t:139: 19. Saṃkiliṭṭhadhammāti saṃkilesasamannāgatā dhammā saddhammanayakovidāti saccapaṭiccasamuppādādidhammanayakusalā, ekattādinayakusalā vā.
tika-s0519t:140_0: 20. Atthavissajjanesūti “ime dhammā kusalā”tiādinā sutte katapañhavissajjanesu ceva
tika-s0519t:140_1: aṭṭhakathāya kataatthasaṃvaṇṇanāsu ca. “Vodāniyā”ti iminā anavajjadhammā idha kusalāti
tika-s0519t:140_2: adhippetā, na sukhavipākāti dasseti. Tassa tassa atthanayassa yojanatthaṃ manasā
tika-s0519t:141_0: 21. Yadi karaṇabhūtaṃ, kathaṃ tassa atthantarābhāvoti āha “yena hī”tiādi. Disābhūtadhammānaṃ
tika-s0519t:141_1: volokayanasamānayanabhāvato vohārabhūto, kammabhūto ca nayo, na nandiyāvaṭṭādayo
tika-s0519t:143_0: 23. Apariyosite padeti uccāraṇavelāyaṃ pade asamatte, vippakateti attho. Pariyosite
tika-s0519t:143_1: hi “pada”ntve samaññā siyā, na “akkhara”nti adhippāyo. Padassa vevacanatāya atthavasena
tika-s0519t:143_2: pariyāyaṃ kharantaṃ sañcarantaṃ viya hoti, na evaṃ vaṇṇo avevacanattāti āha pariyāyavasena
tika-s0519t:143_3: akkharaṇato”ti. Na hi vaṇṇassa pariyāyo vijjatī”ti idaṃ akārādivaṇṇavisesaṃ sandhāya
tika-s0519t:143_4: vadati, na vaṇṇasāmaññaṃ. Tassa hi vaṇṇo akkharanti pariyāyo vutto evāti.
tika-s0519t:144_0: Akkharasaddassa atthaṃ vatvā tappasaṅgena vaṇṇasaddassapi vattuṃ “kenaṭṭhena vaṇṇo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:144_1: Tattha nanu padena, vākyena vā attho saṃvaṇṇīyati, na akkharenāti codanaṃ manasi
tika-s0519t:144_2: katvā āha “vaṇṇo eva hī”tiādi. Padādibhāvenāti padavākyabhāvena. Yathāsambandhanti
tika-s0519t:144_3: yathāsaṅketaṃ. Ayaṃ-saddo imassatthassa vācako, ayaṃ attho imassa saddassa vacanīyoti
tika-s0519t:144_4: yathāgahitasaṅketānurūpaṃ saddatthānaṃ vācakavacanīyabhāvo. Atha vā yvāyaṃ saddatthānaṃ
tika-s0519t:144_5: aññamaññaṃ avinābhāvo, so sambandho. Tadanurūpaṃ ekakkharaṃ nāmapadaṃ “mā evaṃ maññasī”tiādīsu
tika-s0519t:144_6: mā-kārādi. Kecīti abhayagirivāsino. Te hi abhidhammadesanaṃ “manasādesanā”ti vadanti,
tika-s0519t:144_7: yato rāhulācariyo “visuddhakaruṇānaṃ manasādesanā vācāya akkharaṇato akkharasaññitā”ti āha.
tika-s0519t:145_0: Satvappadhānanti drabyappadhānaṃ. Nāmapade hi drabyamāvibhūtarūpaṃ, kiriyā anāvibhūtarūpā
tika-s0519t:145_1: yathā “phasso”ti. Ākhyātapade pana kiriyā āvibhūtarūpā, drabyamanāvibhūtarūpaṃ yathā
tika-s0519t:145_4: vasanakiriyāya viyogavisiṭṭhataṃ dīpeti. “Evaṃ manasi karotha, mā evaṃ manasākatthā”tiādīsu
tika-s0519t:145_5: kiriyāvisesassa jotako evaṃ-saddo. “Evaṃsīlā evaṃdhammā”tiādīsu satvavisesassa. Evaṃ
tika-s0519t:146_0: Saṅkhepato vuttaṃ, kiṃ pana tanti āha “padābhihita”nti. Atha vā saṅkhepato vuttaṃ,
tika-s0519t:146_1: yo akkharehi saṅkāsitoti vuccati. Padābhihitaṃ padehi kathitaṃ, yo padehi pakāsitoti
tika-s0519t:146_2: vuccati. Tadubhayaṃ, yadi padasamudāyo vākyaṃ, tassa ko paricchedo. Yāvatā adhippetatthapariyosānaṃ,
tika-s0519t:146_3: tāvatā ekavākyantipi vadanti, bahūpettha pakāre vaṇṇenti. Kiṃ tehi, sākhyātaṃ sābyayaṃ
tika-s0519t:146_4: sakārakaṃ savisesanaṃ “vākya”nti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nanu ca padenapi attho byañjīyatīti
tika-s0519t:146_5: codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “padamattasavanepi hī”tiādi. Ākāresu vākyavibhāgesu abhihitaṃ
tika-s0519t:146_6: kathitaṃ nibbacanaṃ ākārābhihitaṃ nibbacanaṃ. “Abhihitanti ca pāḷiāgata”nti vadanti.
tika-s0519t:147_0: “Nibbānaṃ maggati, nibbānatthikehi vā maggīyati, kilese vā mārento gacchatīti maggo”tiādinā
tika-s0519t:147_2: niravasesadesanattā niddeso”ti. Padehīti vākyāvayavabhūtehi, vākyato vibhajjamānehi
tika-s0519t:147_3: vā ākhyātādipadehi. Tenāha “vākyassa vibhāgo”ti, tathā cāha “apariyosite”tiādi. Apare
tika-s0519t:147_5: nibbacanaṃ, vākyavibhāgo niddeso. Vaṇṇapadavākyāni hi avibhattāni, vibhattāni ca
tika-s0519t:147_6: cha byañjanapadānī”ti vadanti. Chaṭṭhaṃ vacananti chaṭṭhaṃ padaṃ. Kātabbanti “akkharaṃ
tika-s0519t:147_7: padaṃ byañjanaṃ ākāro tatheva nirutti niddeso chaṭṭhavacana”nti gāthāyaṃ evaṃ kattabbaṃ,
tika-s0519t:147_8: saṃvaṇṇanāvasena vā ākārapadaṃ catutthaṃ kātabbanti attho. Sabbo saddavohāro vibhattehi,
tika-s0519t:147_9: avibhattehi ca akkharapadavākyeheva, tadaññappakāro natthīti āha “yānimānī”tiādi.
tika-s0519t:148_0: 24. Kāsanāsaddo kammatthoti dassetuṃ “kāsīyatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Padehi tāva atthassa
tika-s0519t:148_1: saṅkāsanā, pakāsanā ca hotu, padāvadhikāpi saṃvaṇṇanā icchitāti akkharehi pana kathanti
tika-s0519t:148_4: yathāvutto attho sādhitoti dassetuṃ “tathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:149_0: Vibhajanuttānīkammapaññattīti ekattaniddeso samāhāroti ayaṃ dvandasamāso. Ubhayenāti
tika-s0519t:149_1: “vivaraṇā, vibhajanā”ti iminā dvayena. Etehīti ettha eva-kāro luttaniddiṭṭhoti āha
tika-s0519t:150_0: 25. Sammā yuttoti sammā aviparītaṃ, anavasesato ca yutto sahito. Tathā hi vuttaṃ
tika-s0519t:150_1: “anūnā”ti. Sabbo hi pāḷiattho atthapadaatthanayehi anavasesato saṅgahito. Tenāha “sabbassa hī”tiādi.
tika-s0519t:151_0: 26. Kasmā panettha mūlapadapadaṭṭhānāni asaṅgahitānīti? Padatthantarābhāvato. Mūlapadāni
tika-s0519t:151_1: hi nayānaṃ samuṭṭhānamattattā padaṭṭhānānīti dassitoyaṃ nayo. Tena vuttaṃ “ito vinimutto
tika-s0519t:152_0: Nettiyā kāraṇabhūtāya. Hārā saṃvaṇṇetabbāti suttassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanāvasena hārā vitthāretabbā.
tika-s0519t:152_1: Svāyanti so ayaṃ saṃvaṇṇanākkamo. Yena anukkamena nettiyaṃ desitā, teneva sutte atthasaṃvaṇṇanāvasena
tika-s0519t:152_2: yojetabbāti. Evaṃ siddheti desanākkameneva siddhe. Ayaṃ ārambhoti “soḷasa hārā paṭhama”nti
tika-s0519t:152_3: evaṃ pavatto ārambho. Imamatthanti imaṃ vuccamānaniyamasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ.
tika-s0519t:153_0: Yadi desitakkameneva hāranayā sutte yojetabbā siyuṃ, kiṃ so kamo kāraṇanirapekkho,
tika-s0519t:153_1: udāhu kāraṇasāpekkhoti? Kiñcettha – yadi tāva kāraṇanirapekkho hāranayānaṃ anukkamo,
tika-s0519t:153_2: aneke atthā vuccamānā avassaṃ ekena kamena vuccantīti. Evaṃ sante yena kenaci kamena
tika-s0519t:153_3: sutte yojetabbā siyuṃ, tathā sati niyamo niratthako siyā. Atha kāraṇasāpekkho, kiṃ
tika-s0519t:153_4: taṃ kāraṇanti? Itaro kāraṇagavesanaṃ akatvā attho evettha gavesitabboti adhippāyena
tika-s0519t:153_5: “nāyamanuyogo na katthaci anukkame nivisatī”ti vatvā “na pana mayaṃ devānaṃpiyassa
tika-s0519t:153_6: manorathavighātāya cetemā”ti kamakāraṇaṃ vicārento “apicā”tiādinā desanāhārassa tāva
tika-s0519t:153_7: ādito desanāya kāraṇaṃ patiṭṭhapeti. Tattha dhammadesanāya nissayo assādādīnavanissaraṇāni,
tika-s0519t:153_8: sarīraṃ āṇatti. Pakatiyā sabhāvena. Niddhāraṇena vināpi patiṭṭhābhāvato nissayabhāvato.
tika-s0519t:154: “Tathā hi vakkhatī”tiādinā yathāvuttaṃ atthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti. Esa nayo itaresupi.
tika-s0519t:155_0: Vicayānantaranti vicayahārānantaraṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Tathā hīti lakkhaṇahāravibhaṅge
tika-s0519t:155_1: yuttāyuttānaṃ kāraṇaparamparāya pariggahitasabhāvānaṃ avuttānampi ekalakkhaṇatāya gahaṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:156_1: saṃvaṇṇiyamānasutte ānītānaṃ pāḷidhammānaṃ. Saddato, pamāṇantarato ca laddhānaṃ idha
tika-s0519t:156_2: vicāretabbattā āha “niravasesato”ti. Atthassāti abhidheyyatthassa. Dhammassāti sabhāvadhammassa.
tika-s0519t:156_3: Tattha tattha taṃ abhiniropetīti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe, dhamme ca taṃ nāmaṃ abhiniropeti,
tika-s0519t:156_4: “ayamevaṃnāmo”ti voharati. “Atthassa, dhammassā”ti padadvayena sāmaññato attho, dhammo
tika-s0519t:156_5: ca anavasesetvā gahitoti āha “anavasesapariyādāna”nti, yato vuttaṃ “tattha tatthā”ti.
tika-s0519t:156_6: Tathāti yathā anavasesatthāvabodhadīpakaṃ anavasesapariyādānaṃ kataṃ catubyūhapāḷiyaṃ,
tika-s0519t:156_7: evaṃ punappunaṃ gabbhamupetīti ettha asaddavatī atthā pavattivasena labbhamānā sammāpaṭipatti
tika-s0519t:158: Te dhammāti paṭipakkhato parivattitadhammā. Na pariyāyavibhāvanā paññattivibhāgapariggāhikāti āha “pariyā…pe… subodhanañcā”ti.
tika-s0519t:159_0: Pucchāvisodhanaṃ vissajjanaṃ. Ārambhavisodhanaṃ desanāya atthakathanaṃ. Tadubhayavicāro
tika-s0519t:159_1: dhātādīsu asammuyhantasseva sambhavatīti āha “dhātāyatanā…pe… sampādetu”nti. Suddho
tika-s0519t:160_0: “Kāraṇākāro”ti padaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vadati. Pabhedato desanākāroti vevacanaṃ. Niddhāretvā
tika-s0519t:160_1: vuccamānānīti uddharitvā samāropiyamānānīti adhippāyo. Suttassa atthaṃ tathattāvabodhāyāti
tika-s0519t:161_1: paccayasamavāye tadupadesaphalaṃ adhigacchantaṃ atthaṃ payojeti nāmāti. Tadanukkamenevāti
tika-s0519t:161_2: tesaṃ ugghaṭitaññuādīnaṃ desanānukkameneva. Teti tayo atthanayā. Tesanti ugghaṭitaññuādīnaṃ.
tika-s0519t:161_3: Yathā uddesādīnaṃ saṅkhepamajjhimavitthāravuttiyā tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ upakāratā, evaṃ
tika-s0519t:161_4: tesaṃ atthanayānaṃ. Tassāti atthanayatthassa. Tatthāti tassaṃ tassaṃ bhūmiyaṃ.
tika-s0519t:162_0: Samuṭṭhānaṃ nidānaṃ. Anekadhā saddanayato, niruttinayato cāti anekappakāraṃ. Padattho
tika-s0519t:162_1: saddattho. Vidhi anuvādoti idamettha vidhivacanaṃ, ayamanuvādoti ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo.
tika-s0519t:162_2: Samādhātabboti pariharitabbo. Anusandhīyā anurūpaṃ nigametabbanti yāya anusandhiyā
tika-s0519t:162_3: sutte upari desanā pavattā, tadanurūpaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā nigametabbā. Payojananti phalaṃ.
tika-s0519t:162_4: Piṇḍatthoti saṅkhepattho. Anusandhīti pucchānusandhiādianusandhi. Upogghāṭoti nidassanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:163_0: Pakatiādipadāvayavaṃ bhinditvā kathanaṃ bhedakathā yathā “dibbantīti devā”ti. Padassa
tika-s0519t:163_1: atthakathanaṃ tatvakathā yathā “buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako”ti. Pariyāyavacanaṃ
tika-s0519t:164_0: Attano phalaṃ dhāretīti dhammoti hetuno dhammabhāvo veditabbo. Ñāpakahetūpi ñāṇakaraṇaṭṭhena
tika-s0519t:164_1: kārake pakkhipitvā āha “kārako sampāpakoti duvidho”ti. Puna cakkhubījādinibbattakameva
tika-s0519t:164_2: kāraṇaṃ katvā dassento “puna…pe… tividho”tiādimāha. “Tayo kusalahetū”tiādinā āgatā
tika-s0519t:164_3: alobhādayo, lobhādayo ca hetuhetu nāma. “Cattāro kho, bhikkhave, mahābhūtā hetu,
tika-s0519t:164_4: cattāro mahābhūtā paccayo rūpakkhandhassa paññāpanāyā”tiādinā āgato paccayahetu nāma.
tika-s0519t:164_5: Kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ attano vipākaṃ pati uttamahetu nāma. Cakkhādibījādi cakkhuviññāṇaaṅkurādīnaṃ
tika-s0519t:164_7: visuṃ gahaṇaṃ, saddamaggānaṃ pana ñāpakasampāpakahetubhāvadassanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:164_10: itaro bāhirahetu. Keci pana “sasantāniko ajjhattikahetu, itaro bāhirahetū”ti vadanti.
tika-s0519t:165_1: nibbānaṃ pati maggassa hetubhāvo viya maggaṃ pati nibbānassa phalabhāvo upacārasiddhoti
tika-s0519t:167_0: Kiccatoti sarasato. Lakkhaṇatoti upalakkhaṇato. Sāmaññatoti samānabhāvato. Tena samānahetutā,
tika-s0519t:167_1: samānaphalatā, samānārammaṇatā ca gahitā hotīti. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā
tika-s0519t:168_1: vasena nayavibhāgo veditabbo. Tattha sampayogato tāvanayavibhāgo – “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave,
tika-s0519t:168_2: aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ lahuparivattaṃ, yathayidaṃ citta”nti cittassa
tika-s0519t:168_3: lahuparivattitā gahitā, taṃsampayogato cetasikānampi gahitāva hoti aññattha nesaṃ
tika-s0519t:168_4: cittena sampayogadīpanato. Atha vā “saññino”ti. Saññāsahitatāvacanena hi nesaṃ vedanācetanādivantatāpi
tika-s0519t:169_0: Vippayogato – “ahetukā”ti. Hetusampayuttā hi dhammā “sahetukā”ti vuttāti tabbidhurā
tika-s0519t:169_1: dhammā vippayogato “ahetukā”ti vuttāti viññāyati. Atha vā “asaññino”ti. Saññāvippayuttā
tika-s0519t:169_2: hi dhammapavatti idhādhippetā, na saññāya abhāvamattanti viññāyati.
tika-s0519t:170_0: Virodhato – “aṭṭhamako, saddhānusārī”ti ca vutte taṃ santatiyaṃ saṃyojanattayappahānaṃ
tika-s0519t:170_1: viññāyati, tathā “sati vā upādisese anāgāmitā”ti vutte pañcorambhāgiyasaṃyojanappahānaṃ,
tika-s0519t:171: Pakaraṇato – “abyākatā dhammā”ti. Adhikārato hi kusalākusalabhāvena na kathitāti ñāyati. “Upadhī hi narassa socanā”ti ca. Bāhirā hi dhammā idha “upadhī”ti adhippetāti viññāyati.
tika-s0519t:172: Liṅgato – “sītenapi ruppati, uṇhenapi ruppatī”tiādi. Sītādiggahaṇena hi liṅgena bhūtupādāyappakārasseva dhammassa rūpabhāvo, na itarassa.
tika-s0519t:173: Saddantarasannidhānato – “kāyapassaddhi, kāyāyatana”nti. “Yā vedanākkhandhassā”tiādivacanato hi purimo kāyasaddo samūhavācī, itaro āyatanasaddasannidhānato pasādavācī.
tika-s0519t:174_0: Sāmatthiyato – “sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, ādittaṃ, sabbe tasanti daṇḍassā”ti ca, tathā “sabbāvantaṃ
tika-s0519t:174_1: lokaṃ mettāsahagatena cetasā…pe… pharitvā viharatī”tiādi. Ettha hi satipi sabbasaddassa
tika-s0519t:174_2: anavasesasattavācakatte ādittatā sāpekkhasseva atthassa vācakattā padesavācī sabbasaddo,
tika-s0519t:174_3: lokasaddopi sattavācī. Sattārammaṇā hi appamaññāti. Tathā “mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hantvā”ti
tika-s0519t:174_4: sabbena sabbaṃ hi sapaṭikkhepato, mātupitughātakammassa ca mahāsāvajjatāpavedanato,
tika-s0519t:174_5: idha ca tadanuññāya katāya mātupituṭṭhāniyā tādisā keci pāpadhammā veneyyavasena
tika-s0519t:174_6: gahitā viññāyati. Ke pana teti? Taṇhāmānā. Taṇhā hi jananī sattānaṃ. “Taṇhā janeti
tika-s0519t:174_7: purisa”nti hi vuttaṃ. Pituṭṭhāniyo māno taṃ nissāya attasampaggaṇhato “ahaṃ asukassa
tika-s0519t:174_8: ruñño, rājamahāmattassa vā putto”ti yathā. Sāmatthiyādīnanti ādisaddena desapakatiādayo saṅgayhanti.
tika-s0519t:175_1: Yathālakkhaṇanti yaṃ yaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ, lakkhaṇānurūpaṃ vā yathālakkhaṇaṃ. Hetuphalādīni
tika-s0519t:175_2: upadhāretvā yojetabbāni tesaṃ vasenāti adhippāyo. Idāni hetuphalādayo ye yasmiṃ hāre
tika-s0519t:175_3: savisesaṃ icchitabbā, te dassetuṃ “visesato panā”tiādimāha. Taṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0519t:179: 5. Anvatthasaññatanti atthānugatasaññabhāvaṃ, “desanāhāro”ti ayaṃ saññā anvatthā atthānugatāti attho.
tika-s0519t:180_0: Avuttamevāti pubbe asaṃvaṇṇitapadameva. “Dhammaṃ vo”tiādi vacanassa sambandhaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0519t:180_1: “kattha panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tepiṭakassa hi buddhavacanassa saṃvaṇṇanālakkhaṇaṃ nettippakaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0519t:180_2: tañca pariyattidhammasaṅgāhake suttapade saṃvaṇṇetabbabhāvena gahite gahitameva hoti.
tika-s0519t:181_0: Yesaṃ assādādīnaṃ vibhajanalakkhaṇo desanāhāro, te gāthāya, idhāpi ca āgate “assādaṃ
tika-s0519t:181_1: ādīnava”ntiādinā udāharaṇavasena vibhajituṃ “tattha katamo assādo”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0519t:181_2: Tattha tatthāti tassaṃ “assādādīnavatā”ti gāthāyaṃ vutto katamo assādo. Atha vā “assādaṃ
tika-s0519t:181_3: ādīnava”ntiādinā yo idha assādādīnaṃ uddeso, tattha katamo assādoti ceti attho. Esa
tika-s0519t:181_6: cāti duvidhassāpi ādīnavassa nidassanatthaṃ “ariyamaggo nibbāna”nti duvidhassāpi
tika-s0519t:181_7: nissaraṇassa nidassananidassanatthañca dve dve gāthā udāhaṭā.
tika-s0519t:182_0: Dhammo have rakkhati dhammacārinti ettha dhammacārino maggaphalanibbānehi sātisayārakkhā
tika-s0519t:182_2: adhippāyenāha “nissaraṇaṃ anāmasitvā”ti. Tathā hi vakkhati “nibbānaṃ vā upanidhāya
tika-s0519t:183_0: Avekkhassūti vidhānaṃ. Tassā pana avekkhāya pavattiākāro, visayo, kattā ca “suññato,
tika-s0519t:183_1: lokaṃ, mogharājā”ti padattayena vuttāti āha – “suññato…pe… āṇattī”ti. Tattha saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-s0519t:183_2: suññatā anattasabhāvatāya, attasuññatāya ca siyā. Yato te na vasavattino, attasāravirahitā
tika-s0519t:183_3: ca, yato te anattā, rittā, tucchā ca attanā, tadubhayaṃ dasseti “avasavattitā”tiādinā.
tika-s0519t:183_4: Evaṃ maccutaro siyāti evaṃ paṭipattiyā maccutaro bhaveyyāti attho. Parikappetvā vidhiyamānassa
tika-s0519t:183_5: maccutaraṇassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadā desanāya paccakkhato sijjhamānaṃ sātisayaṃ phalanti
tika-s0519t:184: 6. Udāharaṇavasenāti nidassanavasena. Tattha “puggalavibhāgenā”ti iminā ugghaṭitaññuādipuggalapayojito assādādīsu bhagavato desanāvisesoti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:185_1: sassatucchedākārassa. Idañhi dvayaṃ dhammadesanāya cāletabbaṃ, na anulomikakhanti,
tika-s0519t:185_2: yathābhūtañāṇaṃ vā. Etasmiñhi catukke āsayasāmaññatā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-s0519t:188_0: Calanāyāti vikkhambhanāya. Parānuvattiyāti samucchedanāya. Ugghaṭite jānātīti ugghaṭitaññūti
tika-s0519t:189_0: Cattāroti assādo ca ādīnavo ca assādo ādīnavo ca assādo nissaraṇañcāti ete cattāro.
tika-s0519t:189_1: Yadi nissaraṇavibhāvanā veneyyavinayanasamatthā, kasmā pañcamo na gahitoti āha “ādīnavāvacanato”ti.
tika-s0519t:189_2: Yadi hi ugghaṭitaññuṃ sandhāya ayaṃ nayo vuccati, nissaraṇamattena siddhaṃ siyā.
tika-s0519t:189_3: Atha vipañcitaññuṃ, neyyaṃ vā, ādīnavo ca nissaraṇañca assādo ca ādīnavo nissaraṇañca
tika-s0519t:189_4: vattabbo siyā? Tathā appavattattā na gahito. Tenāha “ādīnavāvacanato”tiādi. Desananti
tika-s0519t:189_5: sāmaññato gahitaṃ “suttekadesaṃ gāthaṃ vā”ti viseseti. Padaparamaaggahaṇañcettha
tika-s0519t:190_0: “Kalyāṇa”nti iminā iṭṭhavipāko, “pāpaka”nti aniṭṭhavipāko adhippetoti āha “ayaṃ assādo,
tika-s0519t:190_1: ayaṃ ādīnavo”ti. Lābhādīnaṃ puññaphalattā tadanurodhaṃ vā sandhāya “ayaṃ assādo”ti
tika-s0519t:191_0: Kāmāti kilesakāmasahitā vatthukāmā. Virūparūpenāti appatirūpākārena. Mathentīti maddanti.
tika-s0519t:191_1: Pabbajitomhīti pabbajjaṃ upagato amhi. Apaṇṇakanti avirajjhanakaṃ. Sāmaññanti samaṇabhāvo.
tika-s0519t:192: Tattha “kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā”ti ayaṃ assādo, “virūparūpena mathenti citta”nti ayaṃ ādīnavo, “apaṇṇakaṃ sāmañña”nti idaṃ nissaraṇanti āha “ayaṃ…pe… nissaraṇañcā”ti.
tika-s0519t:193: Phalādīnaṃ ekakavasena ca tikavasena ca pāḷiyaṃ udāhaṭattā vuttaṃ “dukavasenapī”ti.
tika-s0519t:194_0: Sukhā paṭipadā, dukkhā paṭipadāti yā dve paṭipadā, tāsu ekekā dandhakhippābhiññatāya
tika-s0519t:194_1: dve dve hontīti āha “paṭipadābhiññākato vibhāgo paṭipadākato hotī”ti. Katapubbakiccassa
tika-s0519t:194_3: Upacāranti upacārajjhānaṃ. Paṭipajjitabbatāya jhānampi “paṭipadā”ti vuccati. Tadaññā
tika-s0519t:195: Kileseti nīvaraṇappakāre, taṃsahagatakilese ca. Aṅgapātubhāvanti vitakkādijhānaṅgapaṭilābhaṃ.
tika-s0519t:196_0: Abhinivisantoti paṭṭhapento. Rūpārūpaṃ pariggaṇhantoti rūpārūpadhamme lakkhaṇādīhi
tika-s0519t:196_1: paricchinditvā gaṇhanto. Pariggahitarūpārūpassa maggapātubhāvadandhatā ca nāmarūpavavatthānādīnaṃ
tika-s0519t:196_2: kicchasiddhiyā siyāti na rūpārūpapariggahakicchatāya eva dukkhāpaṭipadatā vattabbāti
tika-s0519t:196_3: ce? Na, nāmarūpavavatthāpanādīnaṃ paccanīkakilesamandatāya sukhasiddhiyampi tathāsiddhavipassanāsahagatānaṃ
tika-s0519t:196_4: indriyānaṃ mandatāya maggapātubhāvato. Rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvāti akicchenapi pariggahetvā,
tika-s0519t:196_5: kicchena pariggahite vattabbameva natthi. Evaṃ sesesupi. Nāmarūpaṃ vavatthāpentoti
tika-s0519t:196_6: “nāmarūpamattametaṃ, na añño koci sattādiko”ti vavatthāpanaṃ karonto. Kataro panettha
tika-s0519t:196_7: vāro yuttarūpoti? Yo koci sakiṃ, dvikkhattuṃ, anekasatakkhattunti evamādīsu hi vikkhambhanavāresu
tika-s0519t:196_8: sakiṃ, dvikkhattuñca vikkhambhanavāro sukhā paṭipadā eva, na tato uddhaṃ sukhā paṭipadā
tika-s0519t:196_9: hoti, tasmā tikkhattuṃ vikkhambhanavārato paṭṭhāya dukkhā paṭipadā veditabbā. Apica
tika-s0519t:196_11: vikkhambhanena kicchatāvāro dukkhā paṭipadā veditabbā. Ettha dandhattā paṭipadāya
tika-s0519t:196_12: etassa akicchattepi purimānaṃ kicchatte dukkhāpaṭipadatā vuttanayāva. Yassa pana
tika-s0519t:196_13: sabbattha akicchatā, tassa paramukkaṃsagatā sukhā paṭipadā veditabbā.
tika-s0519t:197_0: Yathā nāmarūpapariggahakicchatāya maggapātubhāvadandhatāya dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā
tika-s0519t:197_1: vuttā, tathā tabbipariyāyena catutthī, tadubhayavomissatāvasena dutiyā, tatiyā ca
tika-s0519t:197_2: ñātabbāti dassento āha “iminā…pe… veditabbā”ti. Vaṭṭadukkhato niyyānassa adhippetattā
tika-s0519t:198_0: Hetupāyaphalehīti ettha taṇhācaritatā, mandapaññatā ca paṭhamāya paṭipadāya hetu,
tika-s0519t:198_1: taṇhācaritatā, udatthapaññatā ca dutiyāya, diṭṭhicaritatā, mandapaññatā ca tatiyāya,
tika-s0519t:198_2: diṭṭhicaritatā, udatthapaññatā ca catutthiyā. Upāyo pana yathākkamaṃ satisamādhivīriyapaññindriyāni,
tika-s0519t:198_3: satipaṭṭhānajhānasammappadhānasaccāni ca upanissayabhūtāni. Phalaṃ vaṭṭadukkhato niyyānaṃ.
tika-s0519t:199_1: Idhāti imasmiṃ nettippakaraṇe. Vakkhati “rāgavirāgā cetovimutti sekkhaphala”nti,
tika-s0519t:200_0: Tenāti paṭipakkhena. Tatoti paṭipakkhato. Samānādhikaraṇavasena ca cetovimuttisaddānaṃ
tika-s0519t:200_1: samāsaṃ katvā bhinnādhikaraṇavasena vattuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Puna “cetaso vā”tiādinā
tika-s0519t:200_2: aññapadatthavasena cetovimuttipadānaṃ samāsaṃ dasseti. Viññāṇapariyāyena ceto-saddena
tika-s0519t:201: Hā-saddo gatiattho, gati cettha ñāṇagati adhippetāti āha “hātabbāti gametabbā”ti. Netabbāti ñāpetabbā.
tika-s0519t:202_2: Desanāyanti sutte. Taṃ dassetunti taṃ puggalavibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ. “Svāyaṃ hāro kathaṃ
tika-s0519t:203_0: Sāti vuttappakāradhammatthānaṃ vīmaṃsanapaññā. Adhikāratoti “satthā vā dhammaṃ desayatī”tiādiadhikārato.
tika-s0519t:204_1: cintāya hetubhūtāya nibbattā cintāmayī”ti evamādivuttanayānusārena sakkā yojetunti
tika-s0519t:205_0: Sutacintāmayañāṇesūti sutamayañāṇe ca cintāmayañāṇe ca sutacintāmayañāṇesu ca sutacintāmayañāṇesūti
tika-s0519t:205_1: ekadesasarūpekaseso veditabbo. Cintāmayañāṇeyeva hi patiṭṭhitā mahābodhisattā carimabhave
tika-s0519t:205_2: vipassanaṃ ārabhanti, itare sutacintāmayañāṇesūti. Tehīti tathā paṭhantehi. Vuttanayenāti
tika-s0519t:206_0: 8. Parato ghoso paccayabhūto etissāti adhippāyo. “Paccattasamuṭṭhitena ca yonisomanasikārenā”ti
tika-s0519t:206_1: idaṃ āvuttinayena dutiyaṃ āvaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ. Tena sāvakānaṃ bhāvanāmayañāṇuppatti
tika-s0519t:206_2: saṅgahitā hoti. Sāvakānameva vā ñāṇuppatti idhādhippetā ugghaṭitaññuādivibhāgakathanato.
tika-s0519t:206_3: Etasmiṃ pakkhe pubbe vuttaekasesanayopi paṭikkhitto daṭṭhabbo. “Āsayapayogapabodhassa
tika-s0519t:206_5: sandhāya “imā dve paññā atthī”ti vuttanti dasseti. Atthibhāvo cetāsaṃ paṭipakkhena
tika-s0519t:206_6: anupaddutatā veditabbā. Aparikkhatattā anabhisaṅkhatattā. Sutamayañāṇassāpi purimasiddhassa.
tika-s0519t:208: Avasiṭṭhapārisajjenāti khattiyagahapatiparisapariyāpannena. Aṭṭhannanti khattiyaparisā brāhmaṇagahapatisamaṇacātumahārājikatāvatiṃsamārabrahmaparisāti imāsaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ.
tika-s0519t:210_0: Tameva dvādasapadabhāvaṃ dīpetvāti sambandho. Tadatthassāti chachakkapariyāyatthassa.
tika-s0519t:210_2: suttena saṅgahitattā vuttaṃ “sabbassāpi…pe… vibhāvento”ti. Visayibhāvena byañjanapadānaṃ,
tika-s0519t:211_0: Padāvayavo akkharāni. Padatthoti padatthāvayavo. Padatthaggahaṇassāti padatthāvabodhassa.
tika-s0519t:211_1: Visesādhānaṃ visesuppatti. Vākyabhedeti vākyavisese. Cittaparitosanaṃ cittārādhanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:211_2: Buddhinisānaṃ paññāya tejanaṃ tikkhabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Nānāvākyavisayatāpi siddhā hoti
tika-s0519t:211_3: padādīhipi saṅkāsanassa siddhattā. Ekavākyavisayatāya hi atthapadānaṃ saṅkāsanādayo
tika-s0519t:211_4: yathākkamaṃ akkharādivisayā evāti niyamo siyā. Etenāti atthapadānaṃ nānāvākyavisayatthena.
tika-s0519t:213_0: 10. Upatiṭṭhati etthāti upaṭṭhitanti upaṭṭhitasaddassa adhikaraṇatthataṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0519t:213_2: paṭipattigamanadesanāgamanehi. “Kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno jāyati ca…pe… jarāmaraṇassā”tiādinā
tika-s0519t:213_3: jarāmaraṇato paṭṭhāya paṭiccasamuppādamukhena vipassanaṃ abhinivisitvā mahāgahanaṃ
tika-s0519t:213_4: chindituṃ nisānasilāyaṃ pharasuṃ nisento viya kilesagahanaṃ chindituṃ lokanātho ñāṇapharasuṃ
tika-s0519t:213_5: tejento buddhabhāvāya hetusampattiyā paripākagatattā sabbaññutaññāṇādhigamāya vipassanāgabbhaṃ
tika-s0519t:213_7: anekākāravokārasaṅkhāre sammasanto chattiṃsakoṭisatasahassamukhena yaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattesi,
tika-s0519t:213_9: āgataṃ, taṃ devasikaṃ vaḷañjanakasamāpattīnaṃ purecarānucarañāṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:213_10: Yaṃ pana vakkhati “ñāṇavajiramohajālapadālana”nti, taṃ saha vipassanāya maggañāṇaṃ
tika-s0519t:213_11: veditabbaṃ. Etaṃ brahmacariyanti sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ adhippetanti taṃ dassento “brahmuno”tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:214: Desanāyāti karaṇatthe idaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Niyuttoti ettha hetuattho antonītoti dassento “niddhāretvā yojito”ti āha.
tika-s0519t:217_1: kariyamāno ca yathāsabhāvaniruttiyā eva kato sukato hotīti dassento “idaṃ nāmapadaṃ
tika-s0519t:217_2: …pe… ayaṃ saddato padavicayo”ti vatvā “so panāya”ntiādimāha. Vattabbaatthasaṃvaṇṇanāti
tika-s0519t:217_3: taṃtaṃpadavacanīyassa atthassa bhedaṃ vatvā pariyāyehi vivaritvā kathanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:218_1: pucchāvaseneva pavattānī”ti vadanti “na sabbampi suttapada”nti. Ekasseva padassa
