tika-s0519t:218_2: sambhavantānaṃ anekesaṃ atthānaṃ uddhāro atthuddhāro. Ekasseva pana atthassa sambhavantānaṃ
tika-s0519t:218_3: anekesaṃ padānaṃ uddhāro paduddhāro. Sabbe hi saṃvaṇṇiyamāne sutte labbhamāne sabbe
tika-s0519t:218_4: padatthe. Nava suttanteti suttageyyādivasena navappakāre suttasmiṃ ānetvā vicinatīti
tika-s0519t:218_5: yojanā. Atha vā “sabbe nava suttante”ti iminā pavicayalakkhaṇena hārena suttageyyādīni
tika-s0519t:218_6: sabbānipi navappakārāni suttāni vicinatīti attho. Tenāha “suttageyyādike”tiādi.
tika-s0519t:219_1: pana ādikā ekūnavīsati gāthā anugītigāthā. Idaṃ nāmaṃ katanti idaṃ “pārāyana”nti
tika-s0519t:219_2: nāmaṃ kataṃ. Tenāha “pāraṃ gamanīyā ime dhammā, tasmā imassa dhammapariyāyassa ‘pārāyanantveva
tika-s0519t:219_3: adhivacana”’nti. Buddhiyaṃ viparivattamānanti imassa vicayahāravibhaṅgassa desanākāle
tika-s0519t:219_4: āyasmā mahākaccāno attano buddhiyaṃ vattamānaṃ katvā evamāhāti yojanā.
tika-s0519t:220_0: Ekaṃsabyākaraṇassa ayanti ekaṃsabyākaraṇīyā, ekaṃsena vā byākātabbattā ekaṃsabyākaraṇīyā,
tika-s0519t:220_1: ekaṃsabyākaraṇayoggāti attho. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Ṭhapanīyāti ṭhapetabbattā
tika-s0519t:220_2: abyākaraṇīyāti attho. Samayantaraparicayena nivāraṇadhammaṃ pati saṃsayapakkhando
tika-s0519t:220_3: pucchatīti adhippāyenāha “vimaticchedana”nti. Pakatiyā pana nivāraṇadhammaṃ ajānanto
tika-s0519t:220_4: ñātukāmatāya pucchatīti adiṭṭhajotanāya pucchāpi siyā. Tathā hi vakkhati “lokassa
tika-s0519t:222: Vimuttiparipācakaindriyāni vivaṭṭapakkhe ṭhitassa saddhādayo dhammā, kiṃ panettha ariyānampi indriyalokena saṅgaho hotīti āha “pariyāpannadhammavasenā”tiādi.
tika-s0519t:223_1: Vivicchāti vicikicchāya. Tenāha “vicikicchāhetū”ti. Dukkhamassa mahabbhayanti ettha
tika-s0519t:223_2: vuttaṃ “assā”ti padaṃ “jappābhilepanaṃ assa brūmī”ti ānetvā sambandhitabbanti dassento
tika-s0519t:223_3: “jappā taṇhā assa lokassā”ti āha. “Sabbasattāna”ntiādinā, “sabbasovā”tiādinā ca anvayato,
tika-s0519t:223_4: byatirekato ca sātisayaṃ avijjāya nīvaraṇabhāvaṃ dasseti. “Dūre santo pakāsanti,
tika-s0519t:223_5: ratto atthaṃ na jānātī”ti gāthādvayenāpi anugītivicayaṃ dassetīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:224_0: Rūpāvacarāti rūpāvacarasattā. Vipariṇāmadukkhatāya muccanassa kāraṇavacananti sambandho.
tika-s0519t:224_1: Yato vaṭṭadukkhato muccanaṃ. Taṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ anavasesapariyādānavasena saṅkhāradukkhatāgahaṇena.
tika-s0519t:225_0: Ekādhāranti ekavatthu adhiṭṭhānaṃ. Nivāraṇaṃ vikkhambhanaṃ pidhānaṃ samucchedoti
tika-s0519t:226_1: adhippetāti āha “pucchāya duvidhatthavisayataṃ vivarituṃ ‘eva’ntiādi vutta”nti. Tathā
tika-s0519t:227_1: nissitupacāravasena. Sabbasmāti cakkhuto yāva manatoti sabbasmā dvārato. Sabbappakārenātti
tika-s0519t:228_0: Tameva satinti yāyaṃ sati pubbabhāge sotānaṃ vikkhambhanavasena vuttā, tameva satiṃ.
tika-s0519t:228_1: Maggakkhaṇe sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ pidhānaṃ brūmi. Yasmā pana pidhāyikāpi sati maggakkhaṇe
tika-s0519t:228_2: paññānugā, paññākiccamevettha adhikaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ “paññāyete pidhīyare”ti.
tika-s0519t:230_0: Yasmiṃ yasmiṃ ariyamagge anadhigate yaṃ yaṃ abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ uppajjanārahaṃ,
tika-s0519t:230_1: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ adhigate taṃ taṃ viññāṇaṃ anuppādanirodhena nirujjhati saddhiṃ attanā
tika-s0519t:230_2: sampayuttanāmarūpenāti āha “tassa tassa viññāṇassa nirodhena sahevā”ti. Anuppādanirodho
tika-s0519t:230_3: hi ettha “nirodho”ti adhippeto anupādisesanibbānassa adhippetattāti. Anusandhīyati
tika-s0519t:231_0: Saha visayena dassetunti ettha saccāni eva visayo. Pahātabbasabhāvaṃ samudayasaccaṃ,
tika-s0519t:231_1: tassa visayo dukkhasaccaṃ. “Saṃyojaniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assādānupassino viharato
tika-s0519t:231_2: taṇhā pavaḍḍhatī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Pahāyakasabhāvaṃ maggasaccaṃ, tassa visayo nirodhasaccanti
tika-s0519t:231_3: āha “saha visayena…pe… saccesū”ti. Kāmañcettha “samudayo dvīsu bhūmīsu pahīyatī”ti
tika-s0519t:231_4: āraddhaṃ, “dassanena tīṇi saṃyojanāni pahīyanti, bhāvanāya satta saṃyojanāni pahīyantī”ti
tika-s0519t:231_5: pana vibhāgavacanameva vattanti āha “pahāyakavibhāgamukhena pahātabbavibhāgaṃ dassetu”nti.
tika-s0519t:232_0: Niravasesakāmarāgabyāpādā tatiyamaggena pahīyanti, itare catutthamaggenāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0519t:232_1: “itarehi pana niravasesa”nti. Tatthāti kammavipākavaṭṭappabhedena tedhātuke bhavattaye.
tika-s0519t:233: 12. Aggaphalañāṇatāya ekampi samānaṃ tannimittassa khayānuppādārammaṇassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa vasena phalavohārena dve nāmāni labhati.
tika-s0519t:234: Somanassanāmalābho iminā ārammaṇasaṅketenāti tadatthaṃ vivaranto “khaye…pe… samaññāyā”ti āha.
tika-s0519t:235_1: ceva nissayārammaṇādinā ca. “Sampayutta”nti iminā sahitatā avisiṭṭhatā idhādhippetāti
tika-s0519t:236: Kathaṃ samādhindriyaṃ uppādetīti āha “satiggahaṇena cettha pariyuṭṭhānappahānaṃ idhādhippeta”nti. Na hi samādhinā pariyuṭṭhānappahānaṃ sambhavati.
tika-s0519t:237_0: Padahati etenāti padhānaṃ, vīriyaṃ. Teti vīriyasaṅkhārā. Ekarasenāti yathā indriyāni
tika-s0519t:237_1: ekarasāni honti, evaṃ ekarasabhāvena saraṇato pavattanato. Tathā pavattiyā eva suṭṭhu
tika-s0519t:237_2: vata vīriyaṃ vāhesīti yoginā saṅkappetabbato tadupagavīriyavāhanaṭṭhena “sampahaṃsanā”ti
tika-s0519t:238_0: Iddhisaddassa paṭhamo kattuattho, dutiyo karaṇattho vutto, pādasaddassa eko karaṇattho
tika-s0519t:238_1: eva. Pajjitabbā ca iddhī vuttā, na ca ijjhanti. Pajjitabbā ca iddhī pajjanakaraṇena
tika-s0519t:238_2: pādena samānādhikaraṇā na hontīti “paṭhamena atthena iddhi eva pādo”ti kathaṃ sakkā
tika-s0519t:238_3: vattuṃ, tathā iddhikiriyākaraṇena sādhetabbā buddhisaṅkhātā iddhi pajjanakiriyākaraṇena
tika-s0519t:238_4: pajjitabbāti dvinnaṃ karaṇānaṃ na samānādhikaraṇatā sambhavatīti “dutiyena atthena
tika-s0519t:238_5: iddhiyā pādo”ti kathaṃ sakkā vattunti ce? Sakkā, pādassa ijjhamānakoṭṭhāsa ijjhanakaraṇūpāyabhāvato.
tika-s0519t:238_6: Atha vā “paṭhamena atthena iddhiyā pādo, dutiyena atthena iddhi eva pādo iddhipādo”ti
tika-s0519t:238_7: evaṃ yojanato. Kathaṃ? Anantarattho paccāsattiñāyena idha paṭhamoti adhippeto, tato purimo dutiyoti.
tika-s0519t:239_0: “Chandaṃ ce bhikkhu adhipatiṃ karitvā labhati samādhi”ntiādi vacanato chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ
tika-s0519t:239_1: iddhipādaṃ bhāvetīti etthāpi chandādhipati samādhi chandasamādhīti adhipatisaddalopaṃ
tika-s0519t:239_2: katvā samāso vuttoti viññāyati. Adhipatisaddatthadassanavaseneva pana “chandahetuko,
tika-s0519t:239_3: chandādhiko vā samādhī”ti sammohavinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā idhāpi chandādhipati samādhi
tika-s0519t:239_4: chandasamādhīti veditabbo. Taṃ pana chandaṃ vuttanayena saddhāsīsena dassento “saddhādhipateyyā
tika-s0519t:239_5: cittekaggatā”ti vuttaṃ. “Idaṃ padhāna”nti vā vīriyaṃ vuttaṃ. Vīriyasaddāpekkhāsahitaṃ
tika-s0519t:239_6: ekavacanena vatvā catubbidhassapi vīriyassa adhippetattā nibbattetabbadhammavibhāgena
tika-s0519t:239_7: ca “ime saṅkhārā”ti vuttaṃ. Tena padhānabhūtā saṅkhārāti evaṃ samāso veditabbo. Saṅkhatasaṅkhārādinivattanatthañcettha
tika-s0519t:239_8: padhānaggahaṇaṃ. Atha vā taṃ taṃ visesaṃ saṅkharotīti saṅkhāro, sabbampi vīriyaṃ.
tika-s0519t:239_9: Tattha catukiccasādhakato aññassa nivattanatthaṃ padhānaggahaṇanti padhānabhūtā seṭṭhabhūtāti attho.
tika-s0519t:240_1: āgataṃ. Tattha purimaṃ samādhivisesanaṃ “vīriyādhipati samādhi vīriyasamādhī”ti,
tika-s0519t:240_2: dutiyaṃ samannāgamaṅgadassanatthaṃ. Dve eva hi sabbattha samannāgamaṅgāni samādhi,
tika-s0519t:240_3: padhānasaṅkhāro ca. Chandādayo samādhivisesanāni. Padhānasaṅkhāro pana padhānavacaneneva
tika-s0519t:240_4: visesito, na chandādīhīti na idha vīriyādhipatitā padhānasaṅkhārassa vuttā hoti.
tika-s0519t:240_5: Vīriyañca samādhiṃ visesetvā ṭhitameva samannāgamaṅgavasena padhānasaṅkhāravacanena
tika-s0519t:240_6: vuttanti nāpi dvīhi vīriyehi samannāgamo vutto hoti. Yasmā pana chandādīhi visiṭṭho
tika-s0519t:240_7: samādhi tathā visiṭṭheneva tena sampayutto padhānasaṅkhāro, sesadhammā ca, tasmā
tika-s0519t:240_8: samādhivisesanānaṃ vasena “cattāro iddhipādā”ti vuttā. Visesanabhāvo ca chandādīnaṃ
tika-s0519t:240_9: taṃtaṃapassayanavasena hotīti chandasamādhi…pe… iddhipādanti ettha nissayatthepi
tika-s0519t:240_10: pādasaddena upāyatthena chandādīnaṃ iddhipādatā vuttā hoti. Tathā hi abhidhamme uttaracūḷabhājanīye
tika-s0519t:240_11: “cattāro iddhipādā chandiddhipādo”tiādinā chandādīnameva iddhipādatā vuttā. Pañhāpucchake
tika-s0519t:240_12: ca “cattāro iddhipādā – idha bhikkhu chandasamādhī”ti ārabhitvāpi puna chandādīnaṃyeva
tika-s0519t:240_13: kusalādibhāvo vibhatto. Upāyiddhipādadassanatthameva hi nissayiddhipādadassanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0519t:240_14: Aññathā catubbidhatāva na hotīti. Ayamettha pāḷivasena atthavinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-s0519t:241_1: avacanaṃ “chandasamādhi…pe… iddhipādaṃ bhāvetī”ti bhāvetabbānaṃ iddhipādānaṃ vuttattā.
tika-s0519t:242_0: Vossaggasaddo pariccāgattho, pakkhandanattho cāti vossaggassa duvidhatā vuttā. Yathāvuttena
tika-s0519t:242_1: pakārenāti tadaṅgasamucchedappakārena, tanninnabhāvārammaṇappakārena ca. Pariṇamantaṃ vipassanakkhaṇe.
tika-s0519t:243_2: vā. Upacārapaññāyāti ekāvajjane, sabbattha vā pavattaupacārapaññāya.
tika-s0519t:244: Pucchāvissajjanavicayopīti yathāvuttāya pucchāya vissajjanavicayopi. Vuttanayānusārenāti adiṭṭhajotanā, vimaticchedanā cāti heṭṭhā vuttanayānugamanena.
tika-s0519t:245: 15. Sekhe asekheti sekkhe ariyapuggale, asekkhe ariyapuggale. Vipassanāpubbaṅgamappahāneti vipassanaṃ purecārikaṃ katvā pavattakilesappahāne, pahānābhisamayeti attho.
tika-s0519t:246: “Yaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti pāḷiṃ dassetvā puna “yaṃ anicce dukkhe anattanī”ti vacanaṃ evampettha paṭhantīti dassetuṃ.
tika-s0519t:247: Sesasaṃkilesavodānadhammāti gedhato avasiṭṭhasaṃkilesadhammā ca sabbavodānadhammā ca. Abhāvenāti abhāvanena abhāvakaraṇena.
tika-s0519t:248_0: Payogaparakkamanti bhusaṃ yogo payogo, payogova parakkamo payogaparakkamo, cittaṃ.
tika-s0519t:248_1: Ukkhipatīti kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adento kusalapakkhe uddhaṃ khipento viya pavattati.
tika-s0519t:249: 16. “Aṭṭhamakassa indriyānī”ti vuttattā “paṭhamamagge saddhādayo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Indriyaggahaṇañca pāḷiyaṃ nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:250_1: kāmavitakko”ti. Samādhi uppajjamāno kāmavitakkampi niggahetvā eva uppajjatīti dassento
tika-s0519t:250_3: uppajjamāno vīriyacchando khantiṃ paribrūhetīti dasseti. Anavajjadhammānaṃ upakārakadhammāsevanaṃ
tika-s0519t:251_1: vuttanti dassento “sabbadhammānanti…pe… dassetu”nti āha. Mahaggatadhammesu ṭhānaṃ
tika-s0519t:251_2: taṃsampādanāva. Tathā sesesu. Vaḍḍhiyamānesūti yathā vimuttiṃ paripācayanti, evaṃ brūhiyamānesu.
tika-s0519t:252_0: Dassanapariññāti rūpārūpadhammānaṃ salakkhaṇato, paccayato ca parijānanā. Tenāha
tika-s0519t:252_2: adhippetāti āha “bhāvanā…pe… pariññā cā”ti. Dassanatthā pariññā dassanapariññā, bhāvanatthā
tika-s0519t:252_3: pariññā bhāvanāpariññāti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0519t:253: Kakkhaḷaphusanādīti kakkhaḷādiphusanādi. Abhijānitvāti abhiññāya paññāya jānitvā, ṭhitassa abhijānanahetu vāti attho. Atthoti phalaṃ. Nayoti vuttanayo.
tika-s0519t:254: “Yaṃ asaṅkhata”ntipi paṭhanti. Catunayakovidoti ekattanānattādinayacatukke nipuṇo. Desanāyuttikusaloti dhammānaṃ desanāvidhimhi kusalo.
tika-s0519t:255_0: Sadisī kātabbā saṃsandanavasenāti adhippāyo. Ānetabbā “ayaṃ desanā imāya desanāya
tika-s0519t:255_1: evaṃ saṃsandatī”ti. Atthato apetanti ayuttatthaṃ. Asambandhatthanti aññamaññaṃ asambandhapadatthaṃ.
tika-s0519t:255_2: Nanu paṭṭhānavicāro nayavicāro viya hārehi asammisso vicāraṇantaroti codanaṃ manasi
tika-s0519t:255_3: katvā āha “yasmā panā”tiādi. Idha nikkhittoti idha suttavicaye suttatthavicārabhāvato
tika-s0519t:255_4: nikkhitto, etena vā paṭṭhānassa hārantogadhabhāvadassaneneva mūlapadānaṃ viya paṭṭhānassa
tika-s0519t:256: Imassa suttassāti saṃvaṇṇiyamānasuttaṃ sandhāyāha. Kasmiṃ vā padeti saṃvaṇṇiyamānaṃ gāthaṃ sandhāyāha. Tabbicayenāti pucchādivicayena, assādādivicayena ca.
tika-s0519t:259_0: 18. Evametassa suttassa attho na gahetabbo, evaṃ pana gahetabboti aggahetabbagahetabbānaṃ
tika-s0519t:259_1: atthānaṃ vijahanaggahaṇatthāya yuttāyuttivicāraṇāyaṃ vajjetabbesu tāva paṭhamaṃ paṭipattīti
tika-s0519t:259_2: dassento āha “atathākārena gayhamānā suttatthā visayo”ti yathā “vāmaṃ muñca, dakkhiṇaṃ
tika-s0519t:259_3: gaṇhā”ti. Vajjetabbabhāvato hi suttapadehi suttatthe vivecite gahetabbabhāvo ca avasiṭṭho
tika-s0519t:259_4: hoti. Tathā hi vakkhati “mettāvihārassa sato byāpādo cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhassatī’ti
tika-s0519t:259_5: na yujjati desanā, ‘byāpādo pahānaṃ abbhatthaṃ gacchatī’ti yujjati desanā”ti.
tika-s0519t:260_0: Yuttiniddhāraṇena ayathāsabhāvato vivecitvā yathāsabhāvato dhammassa gahaṇakāraṇāni
tika-s0519t:260_2: Patiṭṭhānānīti patiṭṭhānasādhanāni. Sesesūti saṅghāpadesādīsu. Paṭhamattho eva hi
tika-s0519t:260_3: idha pāḷi āgato, vinicchayane kāraṇaṃ mahāpadesoti adhippāyo. Suttotaraṇādīti ādisaddena
tika-s0519t:260_4: suttānotaraṇādipi saṅgayhati. Suttotaraṇavinayasandassanāni hi kenaci yathābhatassa
tika-s0519t:260_6: Yadi evanti yadi yathābhatassa ganthassa suttavinayehi saṃsandanaṃ “dhammo”ti, asaṃsandanaṃ
tika-s0519t:260_7: “adhammo”ti vinicchayakāraṇaṃ, evaṃ santeti attho. Sampadīyati ñāpīyati dhammo etehīti
tika-s0519t:261_0: Vinīyanti rāgādayo etenāti vinayo, kāraṇaṃ. Tenāha “rāgādivūpasamanimitta”nti. Kiṃ
tika-s0519t:261_1: pana taṃ? Sādhiṭṭhānasamathavipassanādidhammā. Ye parato “tecattālīsaṃ bodhaṅgamā dhammā”ti vakkhati.
tika-s0519t:262: Vinayamahāpadesā kappiyānulomato anulomakappiyaṃ nāma, taṃsadisatāya suttantamahāpadesāpi anulomakappiyanti aṭṭhakathāvohāro. Tena vuttaṃ “yaṃ anulomakappiyanti vuccatī”ti.
tika-s0519t:263_0: Yadipi tattha tattha pavattā bhagavato pakiṇṇakadesanā aṭṭhakathā, sā pana dhammasaṅgāhakehi
tika-s0519t:263_1: tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ saṅgāyitvā tassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanānurūpena vācanāmaggaṃ āropitattā
tika-s0519t:263_2: ācariyavādo nāma. Tena vuttaṃ “ācariyavādo nāma aṭṭhakathā”ti. Tissopi saṅgītiyo
tika-s0519t:263_3: āruḷho eva hi buddhavacanassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanābhūto kathāmaggo pacchā tambapaṇṇiyehi
tika-s0519t:263_4: mahātherehi sīhaḷabhāsāya ṭhapito. Attanomati theravādo. Samentameva gahetabbanti
tika-s0519t:263_5: yathā pāḷiyā saṃsandati, evaṃ mahāpadesato atthā uddharitabbāti dasseti. Pamādapāṭhavasena
tika-s0519t:263_6: ācariyavādassa kadāci pāḷiyā asaṃsandanāpi siyā, so na gahetabboti dassento āha –
tika-s0519t:264_0: Catūhi mahāpadesehi yujjatīti catūhi mahāpadesehi na virujjhati. Idāni taṃ avirujjhanākāraṃ
tika-s0519t:264_1: dassento “yena yenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Suttotaraṇādi eva hettha kāraṇaṃ. Tassa ca anekākāratāya
tika-s0519t:264_2: “pakārenā”ti vutto. Saṃvaṇṇiyamāne sutte saṃvaṇṇanāvasena gahetabbanti sambandho.
tika-s0519t:264_3: Ābhatenāti ānītena. Suttatoti suttantarato. Ayañhettha attho – kenaci pasaṅgena suttantarato
tika-s0519t:264_4: uddharitvā ānītena suttapadena suttotaraṇādinā, kāraṇappakārena ca catumahāpadesāvirodhena
tika-s0519t:264_5: saṃvaṇṇiyamāne sutte saṃvaṇṇanāvasena atthajātaṃ gahetabbanti. Tenāha “tena…pe… kātabbā”ti.
tika-s0519t:264_6: Tattha yuttihārayojanā kātabbāti yuttiniddhāraṇavasena ayaṃ yuttihāro yojetabbo.
tika-s0519t:264_7: Atha vā yuttihārayojanā kātabbāti iminā hārena vakkhamānanayena yuttigavesanaṃ katvā
tika-s0519t:264_8: tāya yuttiyā sabbahārayojanā kātabbāti attho. Lakkhaṇañhetaṃ yuttigavesanāya, yadidaṃ
tika-s0519t:264_9: yuttihāro. Tenāha “sabbesaṃ hārānaṃ, yā bhūmī, yo ca gocaro tesaṃ. “Yuttāyuttaparikkhā”ti,
tika-s0519t:265: 19. Yadi vā sabbāni padāni ekaṃ atthaṃ abhivadantīti yojanā.
tika-s0519t:266: 20. Jarāyaṃ ṭhitassa aññathattanti ṭhitassa yaṃ aññathattaṃ aññathābhāvo, ayaṃ jarā nāma. Khaṇikamaraṇaṃ khaṇikanirodho. Samucchedamaraṇaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ khandhaparinibbānaṃ.
tika-s0519t:267_0: Kevalassāti jarāya amissassa. Aññāva jarā, aññaṃ maraṇanti “paṭiññātassa kevalassa
tika-s0519t:267_1: maraṇassa diṭṭhattā”ti hetu. Yathā taṃ devānanti sadisūdāharaṇaṃ, visadisūdāharaṇaṃ
tika-s0519t:269_0: “Jīraṇabhijjanasabhāvā”ti iminā lesena taṇhājarāmaraṇānaṃ anaññattaṃ yojeti. Yadipi
tika-s0519t:269_1: “aññā taṇhā, aññā jarā, aññaṃ maraṇa”nti siddhovāyamattho, yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “na
tika-s0519t:269_2: ida”ntiādi, tathāpi sakkuṇeyyaparihārāyaṃ codanāti ajjhāruḷhaṃ tattha dosaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0519t:269_3: “yadi ca yathā jarāmaraṇa”nti pāḷipavattāni dassento “yadi…pe… dassetī”ti āha. Bhāvoti
tika-s0519t:270_0: “Imāya yuttiyā aññamaññehi kāraṇehi gavesitabba”nti ca keci paṭhanti, byañjanatopi
tika-s0519t:270_1: gavesitabbaṃ, aññattha atthato aññatthampīti adhippāyo. Tameva byañjanato aññatthaṃ
tika-s0519t:270_2: dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “salloti vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Imesanti salladhūpāyanānaṃ. Icchāvipariyāyeti
tika-s0519t:270_3: icchitālābhe, appaccayasamavāye vā. Idampi samatthanaṃ hoti yathādhippetassa aññatthassa
tika-s0519t:270_4: byatirekadassanabhāvato. Jarāmaraṇavipariyāyeti jarāmaraṇe asati. Na hi yathādhippetajarāmaraṇābhāve taṇhā na hotīti.
tika-s0519t:271_0: Dvidhā vuttāti dvippakārena vuttā, dvikkhattuṃ vā vuttā. Yaṃ idaṃ…pe… ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
tika-s0519t:271_1: vā abhilapananti evaṃ kiriyāparāmasanaṃ yojetabbanti veditabbaṃ. Visesoti ayaṃ etāsaṃ
tika-s0519t:271_2: icchātaṇhānaṃ pakatisaṅkhāto viseso. “Dvīhi nāmehī”tipi pāḷi. Yadipi evanti kāmaṃ
tika-s0519t:271_3: visayavisesesu evaṃ yathāvuttaavatthāvisesena icchātaṇhānaṃ atthi kāci bhedamattāti
tika-s0519t:271_4: attho. Sabhāvato pana bhedo natthīti dassento “tathāpī”ti āha.
tika-s0519t:272_0: Icchantīti kāmenti. Taṇhāyanā pātukāmatā. Santāpanaṭṭhenāti paridahanabhāvena. Ākaḍḍhanaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0519t:272_1: avaharaṇaṭṭhena. Saritānīti rāgavasena allāni. Taṃsampayuttapītivasena siniddhāni
tika-s0519t:272_2: sinehitāni. Visattikāti vitthatā rūpādīsu tebhūmakadhammesu byāpanavasena. Visaṭāti
tika-s0519t:272_3: purimavevacanameva ta-kārassa ṭa-kāraṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Visālāti vipulā. Visakkatīti
tika-s0519t:272_4: parisakkati sahati. Ratto hi rāgavatthunā pādena tāḷiyamānopi sahati. “Osakkanaṃ,
tika-s0519t:272_5: vipphandanaṃ vā visakkana”nti vadanti. Aniccādikaṃ niccādito gaṇhantī visaṃvādikā
tika-s0519t:272_6: hoti. Visaṃharatīti tathā tathā kāmesu ānisaṃsaṃ dassentī vividhehi ākārehi nekkhammābhimukhappavattito
tika-s0519t:272_7: cittaṃ saṃharati saṃkhipati. Visaṃ vā dukkhaṃ, taṃ harati, vahatīti attho. Dukkhanibbattakassa
tika-s0519t:272_8: kammassa hetubhāvato visamūlā, visaṃ vā dukkhādibhedā vedanā mūlaṃ etāyāti visamūlā,
tika-s0519t:272_9: dukkhasamudayattā visaṃ phalaṃ etissāti visaphalā. Rūpādidukkhasseva paribhogo etāya,
tika-s0519t:272_10: na amatassāti visaparibhogā. Sabbattha niruttivasena padasiddhi veditabbā. Yo panettha
tika-s0519t:272_11: padhāno attho, taṃ dassetuṃ puna “visatā vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:273: Sinehanaṃ pemakaraṇaṃ. Bandhanaṭṭhenāti saṃyojanaṭṭhena. Āsīsanaṭṭhenāti icchanaṭṭhena. Abhinandanaṭṭhenāti assādanaṭṭhena, sampaṭicchanaṭṭhena vā.
tika-s0519t:274: 21. Anabhiratīti ukkaṇṭhā. Ñāṇanibbidāti nibbidānupassanā. Yathā ca dukkhū…pe… cāresu yutti vuttāti yojanā.
tika-s0519t:275_1: paṭipadāya visesaṃ adhigantuṃ bhabbo, tassa sukhāpaṭipadāyogyassa viya kariyamānā
tika-s0519t:275_2: dhammadesanā visesāvahā na hoti, tasmā sā na yuttāti imamatthaṃ dasseti “rāgacarito”tiādinā.
tika-s0519t:275_3: Rāgacaritassa tathā tathā kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ, okāraṃ, saṃkilesaṃ, nekkhamme ānisaṃsañca
tika-s0519t:275_4: avibhāvetvā ādito vipassanākathāva kariyamānā na visesāvahā hoti āsayassa asodhitattāti
tika-s0519t:275_5: etamatthaṃ dassento pāḷiyaṃ “vipassanā…pe… desanā”ti āhāti veditabbaṃ. Sesapadesupīti
tika-s0519t:275_6: yathā “rāgacaritassā”tiādinā rāgacaritakoṭṭhāsavasena pāḷiyaṃ desanāya ayutti vuttā,
tika-s0519t:275_7: iminā nayena sesapadesupi dosacaritakoṭṭhāsādīsupi “dosacaritassa puggalassa asubhaṃ
tika-s0519t:275_8: deseyyā”tiādinā pāḷiyaṃ avuttopi yathāsambhavamattho niddhāretvā vattabbo. Kasmā
tika-s0519t:275_9: pana yuttihāre ayuttiniddhāraṇā katāti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “ettha cā”tiādi.
tika-s0519t:275_10: Sesesupi eseva nayoti sesesupi dosacaritādivasena niddhāritesu ayuttigavesanesu ayameva
tika-s0519t:276_0: “Yāvatikā ñāṇassa bhūmī”ti etena yuttihārassa mahāvisayataṃ dasseti. Kasmā panāyaṃ
tika-s0519t:276_1: mahāvisayoti? Yuttivicārabhāvato, saṃvaṇṇetabbassa ca dhammassa nānānayanipuṇādiguṇavisesayogatoti
tika-s0519t:277: Aparabhāgeti pacchābhāge. Mettāvihāribhāgassa aparihīnatāvacanato ayogo vutto. Tenāha “sato”ti. Yathāvuttakāraṇato evāti paṭipakkhattā eva.
tika-s0519t:278_0: Pahānekaṭṭhabhāvato diṭṭhimaññitassa. Ādīnavadassanena vitakkaṃ jigucchantā dutiyajjhānassa
tika-s0519t:278_1: āsannaupacārajjhānadhammāpi vitakkārammaṇā na honti, pageva dutiyajjhānadhammāti
tika-s0519t:279_0: Evaṃ yuttihāralakkhaṇaṃ āgamato yuttāyuttavicāraṃ dassetvā idāni āgamānugatāya yuttiyāpi
tika-s0519t:279_1: taṃ dassetuṃ guṇamukhena dosavibhajanaṃ vibhajanto “apicetthā”tiādimāha. Taṃ uttānatthameva.
tika-s0519t:282_0: 22. Tesaṃ tesanti anavasesapariyādānaṃ, tena ye sutte vuttā ca dhammā, ye ca tesaṃ
tika-s0519t:282_1: kāraṇabhūtaṃ, tesaṃ sabbesampīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sabbadhammayāthāvaasampaṭivedhoti imamatthaṃ
tika-s0519t:283_1: vā. Ekavāraṃ uppannāpi pāṇātipātacetanā verappasavanato dosassa, ekavāraṃ uppannāpi
tika-s0519t:283_2: pamādāpatti, micchābhiniveso vā mohassa uppattikāraṇanti pāḷiyaṃ avuttampi nayato
tika-s0519t:283_3: niddhāretabbanti dassento “dosassa…pe… imināva nayena attho veditabbo”ti āha. Nimittatthaggahaṇalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0519t:283_5: vuttaṃ. Tattha tattha nimittaṃ itthipurisanimittaṃ. Anubyañjanaṃ hatthapādahasitakathitādi.
tika-s0519t:283_6: Phasso paccayo etissāti phassapaccayā, taṃbhāvo phassapaccayatā. Assādeti etāyāti assādo, taṇhā.
tika-s0519t:284_3: vatvā “tassā nibbidāpadaṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ nibbidaṃ dassento “nibbidā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:284_4: Tattha paritassanato visesetuṃ “ñāṇenā”ti visesitaṃ. Tathā pavattanti nibbidanākārena pavattanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:285_0: Yoniso ummujjantiyā videharañño dhītāya rucāya jātissarañāṇaṃ kammassakataññāṇassa
tika-s0519t:285_1: kāraṇaṃ ahosi, na pana asappurisūpanissayato, ayoniso ummujjantassa tasseva rañño
tika-s0519t:285_2: senāpatino alātassa bījakassa dāsassāti imamatthaṃ dassento “imassa ca…pe… udāharitabbo”ti
tika-s0519t:285_3: āha. Soti pasādo. Avatthāvisesoti sampayuttadhammānaṃ anāvilabhāvalakkhito avatthābhedo.
tika-s0519t:286_0: Imasmiṃ ca ṭhāne pāḷiyaṃ pubbe yesaṃ dhammānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ niddhāritaṃ, te dhammā
tika-s0519t:286_1: yesaṃ dhammānaṃ padaṭṭhānāni honti, te dassetuṃ “aparo nayo”tiādi āraddhanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:286_3: yebhuyyena sattānaṃ lobhavasena ayonisomanasikārā saṃvattantītti dassanatthaṃ vā
tika-s0519t:286_4: evaṃ vuttaṃ. Upapatti eva opapaccayaṃ, tassa bhāvo opapaccayikanti āha “upapattibhavabhāvenā”ti.
tika-s0519t:286_6: aṅgānīti bhavassa kāraṇāni. Dutiye aṅgānīti avayavā, kammavaṭṭampi vā kāraṇaṅgabhāvena yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:287_0: Kammaṭṭhānassāti bhāvanāya brūhanā vaḍḍhanā. Tesūti titthaññutādīsu. Kalyāṇamittassa
tika-s0519t:287_1: sammadeva payirupāsanāyapīti taṃ nissāya laddhena sabbāya dhammassavanena dhammupasaṃhitaṃ
tika-s0519t:287_2: pāmojjaṃ hotīti titthaññutā pītaññutāya padaṭṭhānaṃ. Evaṃ yāya vimuttiyā sati vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ
tika-s0519t:287_3: hotīti sā tassa padaṭṭhānanti ayamattho pākaṭoti āha “purimānaṃ…pe… suviññeyyo evā”ti.
tika-s0519t:287_4: Saha adhiṭṭhānenāti ñātapariññāya saddhiṃ. Ñātapariññā hi tīraṇapariññāya adhiṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0519t:290_0: 23. “Lakkhaṇahārassa visayaṃ pucchatī”ti vuttaṃ, “ko pana tassa visayo”ti vutte samānalakkhaṇā
tika-s0519t:290_1: avuttadhammā. Kāyānupassanāya samāraddhāya vedanānupassanādayo sukheneva sijjhantīti
tika-s0519t:290_2: tabbacanena vedanāgatāsatiādīnaṃ vuttabhāvo dassito satipaṭṭhānabhāvena ekalakkhaṇattāti
tika-s0519t:290_4: evaṃ itaresampīti katvā vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ attho aṭṭhakathāyameva parato āgamissati. Iminā
tika-s0519t:290_5: nayena sesesupi ekalakkhaṇatāniddesesu attho veditabbo. Paratoti catubyūhahāravaṇṇanāyaṃ.
tika-s0519t:291: Asammissatoti vedanādayopi ettha sitā ettha paṭisandhāti kāye vedanādianupassanāpasaṅgepi āpanne tadasammissatoti attho.
tika-s0519t:292_1: tāni ca kesādīhi, kesādike ca bhūtupādāyarūpehi vinibbhujituṃ “tathā na kāye”tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:292_2: Pāsādādinagarāvayavasamūhe avayavivādinopi avayavigāhaṇaṃ karonti. Nagaraṃ nāma koci
tika-s0519t:292_3: attho atthīti pana kesañci samaññātidhāvanaṃ siyāti itthipurisādisamaññātidhāvane
tika-s0519t:292_4: nagaranidassanaṃ vuttaṃ. Añño koci sattādiko. Yaṃ passati itthiṃ, purisaṃ vā. Nanu
tika-s0519t:292_5: cakkhunā itthipurisadassanaṃ natthīti? Saccaṃ natthi, “itthiṃ passāmi, purisaṃ passāmī”ti
tika-s0519t:292_6: pana pavattasamaññāvasena “yaṃ passatī”ti vuttaṃ. Micchādassanena vā diṭṭhiyā yaṃ
tika-s0519t:292_7: passati, na taṃ diṭṭhaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ hoti, rūpāyatanaṃ vā taṃ na hotīti attho. Atha
tika-s0519t:292_8: vā taṃ kosādibhūtupādāyasamūhasaṅkhātaṃ diṭṭhaṃ na hoti, diṭṭhaṃ vā yathāvuttaṃ na
tika-s0519t:292_9: hotīti attho. Yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ taṃ na passatīti yaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ, kesādibhūtupādāyasamūhasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0519t:292_10: vā diṭṭhaṃ, taṃ paññācakkhunā bhūtato na passatīti attho.
tika-s0519t:293: Na aññadhammānupassīti na aññasabhāvānupassī, asubhādito aññākārānupassī na hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0519t:294_1: vā anekabhedabhinnaṃ sakalasarīragataṃ pubbāpariyabhāvena pavattamānaṃ samūhavasena
tika-s0519t:296_0: Tīsu bhavesu kileseti bhavattayavisayakilese. Sabbatthikanti sabbattha līne, uddhate
tika-s0519t:296_1: ca citte icchitabbatthā, sabbe vā līne, uddhate ca bhāvetabbā bojjhaṅgā atthikā etāyāti
tika-s0519t:296_2: sabbatthikā. Anto saṅkocoti anto olīyanā, kosajjanti attho.
tika-s0519t:297_0: 24. Gahitesūti bhāvanāggahaṇena gahitesu, bhāvitesūti attho, vacanena vā gahitesu.
tika-s0519t:297_1: Bhāvanāggahaṇadīpanatthattā pana vacanena gahaṇassa bhāvanāggahaṇamettha padhānaṃ.
tika-s0519t:297_2: Yassa satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā, tassa sammappadhānādayo bodhipakkhiyadhammā na bhāvitāti
tika-s0519t:297_3: netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti ca samānalakkhaṇatāpadesena imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “catūsu
tika-s0519t:297_4: satipaṭṭhānesu bhāviyamānesu cattāro sammappadhānā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchantī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:298_0: Vipallāsā pahīyanti ujuvipaccanīkabhāvato. “Āhārasamudayā kāyassa samudayo, phassasamudayā
tika-s0519t:298_1: vedanānaṃ samudayo, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti vacanato
tika-s0519t:298_3: pariññātā honti tappaṭipakkhappahānatoti dassento “cattāro āhārā”tiādimāha. Sabbatthāti
tika-s0519t:299_0: Tattha yasmā pañca kāmaguṇā savisesā kāye labbhantīti visesena kāyo kāmupādānassa
tika-s0519t:299_2: uppādetīti diṭṭhupādānassa vedanā, citte niccaggahaṇavasena sassatassa “attano sīlādivasena
tika-s0519t:299_3: parisuddhaparāmasanaṃ hotī”ti sīlabbatupādānassa cittaṃ, nāmarūpaparicchedena bhūtaṃ
tika-s0519t:299_4: bhūtato apassantassa “attābhiniveso hotī”ti attavādupādānassa dhammā vatthu, tasmā
tika-s0519t:299_5: “catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu bhāviyamānesu upādānehi anupādāno bhavatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:300_0: Yasmā pana vuttanayeneva kāyo kāmayogassa vatthu, bhavesu sukhaggahaṇavasena bhavassādo
tika-s0519t:300_1: hotīti bhavayogassa vedanā, santatighanaggahaṇavasena citte attābhiniveso hotīti
tika-s0519t:300_2: diṭṭhiyogassacittaṃ, dhammavinibbhogassa dukkarattā, dhammānaṃ dhammamattatāya ca
tika-s0519t:300_3: duppaṭivijjhattā sammoho hotīti avijjāyogassa dhammā, vatthu, tasmā catusatipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya
tika-s0519t:300_4: tesu tesaṃ pahānasiddhito yogehi visaṃyuttatā vuttā. Eteneva āsavehi anāsavatā, oghehi
tika-s0519t:300_5: nittiṇṇatā ca saṃvaṇṇitā hoti kāmarāgādīnaṃ eva kāmayogakāmāsavakāmoghādibhāvato.
tika-s0519t:301_0: Vuttanayeneva kāyo abhijjhākāyaganthassa vatthu, “dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo
tika-s0519t:301_2: vatthu, citte niccābhinivesavasena sassatassa “attano sīlena suddhī”tiādiparāmasanaṃ
tika-s0519t:301_3: hotīti sīlabbataparāmāsassa cittaṃ vatthu, sappaccayanāmarūpadassanābhāvato bhavavibhavadiṭṭhisaṅkhāto
tika-s0519t:301_4: idaṃsaccābhiniveso hotīti tassa dhammā vatthūti catusatipaṭṭhānāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:302_0: Vuttanayeneva visesato kāyo rāgasallassa vatthu, vedanā dosasallassa, “cittaṃ niccaggahaṇavasena
tika-s0519t:302_1: attābhinivesaṃ attānaṃ seyyādito dahatī”ti cittaṃ mānasallassa, vuttanayeneva dhammā
tika-s0519t:303_0: Yasmā pana kāyānupassanādīhi kāyavedanācittadhammesu pariññātesu rūpavedanāsaññāsaṅkhārakkhandhā
tika-s0519t:303_1: pariññātā honti, citte hi pariññāte saññāpi pariññātāva hoti, tasmā “viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo
tika-s0519t:304_0: Tathā visesato kāye sāpekkhā chandāgatiṃ gacchatīti kāyo chandāgatiyā vatthu, vuttanayeneva
tika-s0519t:304_1: vedanā byāpādassa nimittanti sā dosāgatiyā vatthu, santatighanaggahaṇavasena sarāgādicitte
tika-s0519t:304_2: sammoho hotīti mohāgatiyā cittaṃ, dhammasabhāvānavabodhena bhayaṃ hotīti bhayāgatiyā
tika-s0519t:304_3: dhammā vatthūti catusatipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya agatigamanappahānaṃ hotīti āha “agatigamanehi
tika-s0519t:305_0: “Akusalassa somanassassa vasenā”ti idaṃ “ayampi attho sambhavatī”ti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:305_1: “Sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anusetī”ti pana vacanato sukhavedanāggahaṇena tatthānusayanena
tika-s0519t:305_2: samudayasaccaṃ desitanti veditabbaṃ. Desitaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccanti dukkhadukkhaggahaṇena
tika-s0519t:305_3: sātisayaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pakāsitaṃ hotīti pāḷiyaṃ “dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ desita”nti
tika-s0519t:305_4: vuttaṃ. Sahacaraṇādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā niddesavāravaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:308: 25. Hārānanti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ. Hāresu imassa catubyūhahārassa visesato suttassa byañjanavicayabhāvatoti yojanā. Tena vuttaṃ “byañjana…pe… dassetī”ti. Yāyāti niruttiyā.
tika-s0519t:309_0: Yathārahanti saṃvaṇṇiyamāne sutte yaṃ yaṃ arahati nibbacanaṃ vattuṃ, taṃtaṃlokasamaññānurodheneva.
tika-s0519t:309_1: Pubbabhāgapaṭipadā sampādetvā pacchā saccābhisamayaṃ pāpuṇātīti āha “sammuti…pe…
tika-s0519t:309_2: hotī”ti, taṃtaṃpaññattiggahaṇamukhena paramatthaggahaṇaṃ hotīti evaṃ vā iminā sambandho.
tika-s0519t:310_0: Yamidaṃ anindriyabaddharūpasantānaṃ sandhāya “ubhayamantarenā”ti idha vuttaṃ. Otaraṇahāre
tika-s0519t:310_2: phassasamuditesu dhammesū”ti attho vutto. Aṭṭhakathācariyā panāhu “antarenāti vacanaṃ
tika-s0519t:310_3: pana vikappantaradīpana”nti. Tasmā ayamettha attho – na imaṃ lokaṃ, na huraṃ lokaṃ,
tika-s0519t:310_4: atha kho ubhayamantarenāti. Aparo vikappo – ubhayamantarenāti vā vacanaṃ vikappantarābhāvadīpanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:310_5: Tassattho – na imaṃ lokaṃ, na huraṃ lokaṃ nissāya jhāyati jhāyī, ubhayamantarena
tika-s0519t:311_0: Yepi ca “antarāparinibbāyī, sambhavesī”ti ca imesaṃ suttapadānaṃ atthaṃ micchā gahetvā
tika-s0519t:311_1: atthi eva antarābhavoti vadanti, tepi yasmā avihādīsu tattha tattha āyuvemajjhaṃ
tika-s0519t:311_3: antarāparinibbāyī, na antarābhavabhūtoti purimassa suttapadassa attho. Pacchimassa
tika-s0519t:311_4: ca ye bhūtā eva, na puna bhavissanti, te hi khīṇāsavā, purimapadehi “bhūtā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0519t:311_5: Tabbiparītatāya sambhavaṃ esantīti sambhavesino. Appahīnabhavasaṃyojanattā sekkhā,
tika-s0519t:311_6: puthujjanā ca. Catūsu vā yonīsu aṇḍajajalābujasattā yāva aṇḍakosaṃ, vatthikosañca
tika-s0519t:311_7: na bhindanti, tāva sambhavesī nāma. Aṇḍakosato, vatthikosato ca bahi nikkhantā bhūtā
tika-s0519t:311_8: nāma. Saṃsedajaopapātikā ca paṭhamacittakkhaṇe sambhavesī nāma, dutiyacittakkhaṇato
tika-s0519t:311_9: paṭṭhāya bhūtā nāma. Yena vā iriyāpathena jāyanti, yāva tato aññaṃ na pāpuṇanti,
tika-s0519t:311_10: tāva sambhavesī, tato paraṃ bhūtāti attho, tasmā natthīti paṭikkhipitabbaṃ. Sati
tika-s0519t:311_11: hi ujuke pāḷianugate atthe kiṃ aniddhāritasāmatthiyena antarābhavena attabhāvaparikappitena payojananti.
tika-s0519t:312_0: Yaṃ pana ye “santānavasena pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ avicchedena desantaresu pātubhāvo
tika-s0519t:312_1: diṭṭho. Yathā taṃ vīhiādiaviññāṇakasantāne, evaṃ saviññāṇakasantānepi avicchedena
tika-s0519t:312_2: desantaresu pātubhāvena bhavitabbaṃ. Ayañca nayo sati antarābhave yujjati, nāññathā”ti
tika-s0519t:312_3: yuttiṃ vadanti. Tehi iddhimato cetovasippattassa cittānugatikaṃ kāyaṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa
tika-s0519t:312_4: khaṇena brahmalokato idhūpasaṅkamane, ito vā brahmalokagamane yutti vattabbā. Yadi
tika-s0519t:312_5: sabbattheva vicchinnadese dhammānaṃ pavatti na icchitā, yadipi siyā “iddhivisayo
tika-s0519t:312_6: acinteyyo”ti, taṃ idhāpi samānaṃ “kammavipāko acinteyyo”ti vacanato, tasmā taṃ tesaṃ
tika-s0519t:312_7: matimattameva. Acinteyyasabhāvā hi sabhāvadhammā, te katthaci paccayavisesena vicchinnadese
tika-s0519t:312_8: pātubhavanti, katthaci avicchinnadese ca. Tathā hi mukhaghosādīhi aññasmiṃ dese ādāsapabbatappadesādike
tika-s0519t:312_9: paṭibimbapaṭighosādikaṃ paccayuppannaṃ nibbattamānaṃ dissati, tasmā na sabbaṃ sabbattha
tika-s0519t:312_10: upanetabbanti ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthārato pana paṭibimbassa udāharaṇabhāvasādhanādiko
tika-s0519t:313_0: Apare pana “idhāti kāmabhavo, huranti arūpabhavo, ubhayamantarenāti rūpabhavo vutto”ti
tika-s0519t:313_1: vadanti, “idhāti paccayadhammā, huranti paccayuppannadhammā, ubhayamantarenāti paṇṇattidhammā
tika-s0519t:313_2: vuttā”ti ca vadanti, taṃ sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu natthi, tasmā vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
tika-s0519t:313_3: Avasiṭṭhaṃ rūpanti āpodhātuākāsadhātūhi saddhiṃ lakkhaṇarūpāni, ojañca sandhāyāha
tika-s0519t:313_4: anindriyabaddharūpassa adhippetattā. Tassa khīṇāsavassa taṃ nibbānārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ
tika-s0519t:313_5: na jānanti na ñāyanti “jhāyamānā”ti vuttattā. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0519t:316_0: 29. Akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ viddhaṃsanasabhāvattā, akusalānaṃ vā pajahane kusalānaṃ
tika-s0519t:316_1: sampādane paṭṭhapanasabhāvattā ārambhadhātu. Tathābhūtāti sīlādīhi samaṅgībhūtā.
tika-s0519t:316_2: Kāmadhātuādikā tidhātuyova tedhātu. Tassa abhibhavanato tedhātuissaro maccurājā.
tika-s0519t:316_3: Anādimatisaṃsāre cirakālaṃ laddhapatiṭṭhāpi acirakālaṃ bhāvitehi kusalehi dhammehi
tika-s0519t:316_4: samucchindanīyattā abalā kilesāti vuttaṃ “abalaṃ dubbala”nti. Tenāha “abalā naṃ balīyantī”ti.
tika-s0519t:317_0: Idaṃ vacanaṃ ayaṃ gāthāpādo. Samādhissa padaṭṭhānanti ettha samādhissa kāraṇaṃ samatānuyoge
tika-s0519t:317_1: niyojanatoti yojetabbaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. Papañcāti rāgādayova. Tathā ceva saṃvaṇṇitanti
tika-s0519t:318_0: Nti taṃ desanaṃ. Tassāti sabhāgādivasena āvaṭṭanassa. Paripakkañāṇānaṃ visesādhigamāya.
tika-s0519t:318_2: pariyesanāya sati hotīti pariyesanāggahaṇena gahito. Vinicchayoti “ettakaṃ me rūpārammaṇatthāya
tika-s0519t:318_3: bhavissati, ettakaṃ saddādiārammaṇatthāya, ettakaṃ mayhaṃ, ettakaṃ parassa, ettakaṃ
tika-s0519t:318_4: paribhuñjissāmi, ettakaṃ nidahissāmī”ti evaṃ pavatto vitakko vinicchayo. So lāpitahetukattā
tika-s0519t:318_5: pariyesanamūlakatāya pariyesanāggahaṇeneva gahito, tathā pariggahamacchariyāni. Tattha
tika-s0519t:318_6: pariggaho “mama ida”nti pariggaṇhanaṃ. Macchariyaṃ “mayheva hotū”ti parehi sādhāraṇabhāvāsahanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:318_7: Tenevassa porāṇā evaṃ vacanatthaṃ vadanti “mayhevidamacchariyaṃ hotu, mā aññesaṃ
tika-s0519t:318_8: acchariyaṃ hotūti pavattattā macchariyanti vuccatī”ti. Paribhogatthānaṃ pana vinicchayādīnaṃ
tika-s0519t:318_9: paribhogantogadhatā veditabbā. Chandarāgo dubbalarāgo. Ajjhosānaṃ “mama ida”nti taṇhāvasena
tika-s0519t:318_10: balavasanniṭṭhānanti āha “chandarāgaajjhosānā taṇhā evā”ti. Ārakkhanimittaṃ dvārapidahanamañjūsāgopanādinā
tika-s0519t:318_11: suṭṭhu rakkhaṇanimittaṃ. Pāpāni karonto paribhoganimittaṃ ratto giddho gadhito mucchito
tika-s0519t:318_12: hutvā migova paribhuñjananimittaṃ pamādaṃ āpajjatīti evaṃ pariyenārakkhā paribhoganimittaṃ.
tika-s0519t:318_13: Pamādo tividho taṇhāya vasena kathitoti dassento “tividho taṇhāyāti vutta”nti āha.
tika-s0519t:319_0: Avisesena vuttanti “katamena upādānena saupādānā”ti vibhāgena pucchitvāpi “avijjāya
tika-s0519t:319_1: ca taṇhāya cā”ti avinibbhujitvā vuttaṃ. Taṇhañca avijjañca caturupādānaṃ vasenāti
tika-s0519t:319_2: kāmupādānādīnaṃ catunnaṃ upādānānaṃ vasena vibhajitvā khandhānaṃ dukkhabhāvena dukkhasaccabhāvena
tika-s0519t:319_3: saha pariññeyyabhāvaṃ, upādānānaṃ samudayabhāvena samudayasaccabhāvena saha pahātabbabhāvaṃ dassetīti yojanā.
tika-s0519t:320_0: 30. “Yo”tiādinā vutto tividho pamādo pariyesati, ārakkhaṇañca karoti, paribhoganimittañcāti
tika-s0519t:320_1: sambandho. Pamādo hi pamajjantassa puggalassa bhogānaṃ pariyesanāya, ārakkhaṇāya
tika-s0519t:320_2: ca hetubhūto kattubhāvena upacarito, paribhogassa pana nimittaṃ. “Tappaṭipakkhenā”ti
tika-s0519t:320_3: padassa atthaṃ vivarati “appamādānuyogenā”ti, tena samathabhāvaṃ dasseti. Khepanāti
tika-s0519t:320_4: khayapāpanā. Vodānapakkhavisabhāgadhammavasenāti vodānapakkho ca so pamādassa visabhāgadhammo
tika-s0519t:320_5: cāti vodāna…pe… dhammo, samatho, tassa vasena.
tika-s0519t:321: Samathe satīti adhiṭṭhānabhūte jhāne sati, taṃ pādakaṃ katvāti attho. Yā paññāti nāmarūpaparicchedādivasena pavattapaññā. Tenāha “ayaṃ vipassanā”ti. Pahīnesūti pahīyamānesu.
tika-s0519t:323: Puna apariyodāpaniyaṃ sikhāppattapariyodāpanaṃ idhādhippetanti āha “taṃ pana arahattena hotī”ti.
tika-s0519t:324: Mohasamuṭṭhānatā vuttā “moho eva samuṭṭhāna”nti katvā. Aññathā pisuṇāvācāya dosasamuṭṭhānatā musāvādassa viya mohasamuṭṭhānabhāvā vattabbā siyā.
tika-s0519t:325: Kammapathabhāvaṃ pattānaṃ, appattānañca akusaladhammānaṃ “sabbapāpa”nti padena pariggahitattā vuttaṃ “kammapathakammavibhāgenā”ti.
tika-s0519t:326: 31. Sesapadānanti “kusalassa upasampadā”tiādīnaṃ gāthāya avasiṭṭhapadānaṃ. Yathādhigatanti attanā adhigatappakāraṃ, pacchā bhūmidisā.
tika-s0519t:327: Upari yāpentīti manussalokato upariṭṭhimaṃ devalokaṃ gamenti.
tika-s0519t:328_0: 32. Yathāvuttassa dhammassāti sīlassa ca maggassa ca. Taṇhāvijjādīnanti ādisaddena
tika-s0519t:328_1: tadekaṭṭhakilesā gayhanti, tesaṃ padaṭṭhānadhammā ca. Samathavipassanādīnanti ādisaddena
tika-s0519t:328_2: sāmaññaphalānaṃ saṅgaho. Yadaggena cettha “nirodho rakkhatī”ti vutto, tadaggena maggo
tika-s0519t:328_3: rakkhaṇakiriyāya karaṇaṃ vuttaṃ “yena rakkhatī”ti. Visabhāgadhammavasena purimāni
tika-s0519t:331_0: 33. Dhammesūti puññādidānādibhedabhinnesu sabhāvadhammesu. Tattha labbhamānoti tesu
tika-s0519t:331_2: Padaṭṭhānavibhāgoti te puññādidhammā yesaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ, tesaṃ vā ye dhammā padaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0519t:331_3: tabbibhāgo. Yesaṃ suttānanti mūlapadaṭṭhānabhūtānaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyādīnaṃ catunnaṃ
tika-s0519t:331_4: suttānaṃ vasena. Asaṅkaravavatthānena hi etesu suttesu sātisayaṃ dhammā vibhattā
tika-s0519t:331_5: nāma honti. Tenāha “visesato”ti. Yadi evaṃ kasmā vāsanābhāgiyanibbedhabhāgiyasuttāni
tika-s0519t:331_6: evettha gahitānīti? Nayidamevaṃ nikkhamanapariyosānabhāvena itaresampi gahitattā.
tika-s0519t:331_7: Yato hi nissaṭā vāsanābhāgiyā dhammā, te saṃkilesabhāgiyā. Yaṃpariyosānā nibbedhabhāgiyā
tika-s0519t:331_8: dhammā, te asekkhabhāgiyāti dvayaggahaṇeneva itarampi dvayaṃ gahitameva hoti. Tenāha
tika-s0519t:331_9: “imesaṃ catunnaṃ suttānaṃ desanāyā”ti. Imāni cattāri suttānīti pāḷiyā, vakkhamānāya
tika-s0519t:331_10: desanāya vā itaradvayasaṅgaho daṭṭhabbo, na paṭikkhepo.
tika-s0519t:332_0: Tenevāti niyamassa akatattā, tato ca tena tannissitena ca brahmacārī bhavatīti siddhaṃ
tika-s0519t:332_1: hoti. Eva-saddo vā samuccayattho daṭṭhabbo. Siyā tassa paṭikkhepoti tassa aṭṭhasamāpattibrahmacariyassa
tika-s0519t:332_2: siyā paṭikkhepo. Evaṃ sati sāvasesā desanā siyā.
tika-s0519t:333_0: Tadaṅgādippahānadvayaṃ padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ idha gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti “samucchedapaṭippassaddhippahānānaṃ
tika-s0519t:333_1: vasenā”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā hettha keci “tenevā”ti paṭhanti. “Teneva brahmacariyenāti
tika-s0519t:333_2: paṭhantī”ti idaṃ “saṃvarasīle ṭhito”ti ettha vuttaṃ pāḷivikappaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0519t:334_0: Kathaṃ mantāti? Anibbedhasabhāvattā mahaggatapuññānaṃ na nibbedhabhāgiyasuttena saṅgaho,
tika-s0519t:334_1: vāsanābhāgiyattā pana vāsanābhāgiyasutteneva saṅgahoti. Tadupasaṅgā hi pacchimo eva
tika-s0519t:334_2: pāṭho yuttataro. Itarathā sāvasesā desanā bhaveyya. Tenāha “na hi…pe… desetī”ti.
tika-s0519t:335_2: ekādasasu ṭhānesu pakkhipitvā”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ yojitaṃ. Tattha padādike vicayahārapadatthe
tika-s0519t:335_3: sandhāya “ekādasasu ṭhānesū”ti vuttaṃ. Pubbapekkhatāya pana “sabbatobhāgena desanāya
tika-s0519t:336_0: Saṃkilesabhāgiyānaṃ taṇhāsaṃkilesādinā desanānayo veditabbo. Phalaṃ apāyadukkhena
tika-s0519t:336_1: manussesu dobhaggiyena. Asekkhabhāgiyānaṃ asekkhehi sīlakkhandhādīhi desanānayo.
tika-s0519t:336_2: Phalaṃ aggaphalena ca anupādisesāya ca nibbānadhātuyā veditabbaṃ. Itaresaṃ pāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0519t:336_4: asekkhaggahaṇeneva ca asekkhabhāgiyānaṃ vakkhamānattā vuttaṃ “vakkhamānānaṃ…pe… vasenā”ti.
tika-s0519t:336_6: pāḷiyaṃ “vicayena…pe… tabbānī”ti vuttanti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vicayena…pe… dassetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:337_0: 34. Evanti iti. Dhammeti vuttasabhāgadhamme. Sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇabhāvehīti sāmaññavisesena
tika-s0519t:337_1: visiṭṭhehi. Dve dhammā sādhāraṇāti dve ime dhammā yehi sabhāgadhammā sādhāraṇā nāma
tika-s0519t:337_2: honti. Katame dve? Nāmaṃ, vatthu ca. Tattha nāmaṃ nāmapaññatti, taṃmukheneva saddato
tika-s0519t:337_3: tadatthāvagamo. Saddena ca sāmaññarūpeneva tathārūpassa atthassa gahaṇaṃ, na visesarūpena,
tika-s0519t:337_4: tasmā saddavacanīyā atthā sādhāraṇarūpanāmāyattagahaṇīyatāya nāmasādhāraṇā vuttā.
tika-s0519t:337_5: Vatthūti pavattiṭṭhānaṃ. Yattha hi ye dhammā pavattanti, tesaṃ sabbesaṃ te dhammā
tika-s0519t:337_6: sādhāraṇāti pavattiṭṭhānasaṅkhātānaṃ vatthūnaṃ sādhāraṇā. Yasmā panidaṃ dvayaṃ tesaṃ
tika-s0519t:337_7: dhammānaṃ sādhāraṇabhāve pakatibhūtaṃ sabhāvabhūtaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ “dve dhammāti duve
tika-s0519t:337_9: Dassanapahātabbānañhi yathā micchattaniyatasattā pavattiṭṭhānaṃ, evaṃ aniyatāpīti
tika-s0519t:337_10: ubhaye hi te samānavatthukā. Esa nayo itaresupi. Sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchāsīlabbataparāmāsā
tika-s0519t:337_11: hi bhinnasabhāvāpete dhammā dassanena pahātabbataṃ nātivattantīti te nāmasāmaññataṃ
tika-s0519t:337_12: pattā, rūparāgādayo ca bhāvanāya pahātabbatanti āha “pahānekaṭṭhā nāmasādhāraṇā”ti.
tika-s0519t:337_13: Yathā pana “vatthūnaṃ sādhāraṇā vatthusādhāraṇā”ti ayamattho labbhati, evaṃ “vatthunā
tika-s0519t:337_14: sādhāraṇā vatthusādhāraṇā”ti ayampi attho labbhatīti dassento “sahajekaṭṭhā vatthusādhāraṇā”ti
tika-s0519t:337_15: āha. Te hi aññamaññaṃ phusanādisabhāvato bhinnāpi yasmiṃ pavattanti, tena vatthunā
tika-s0519t:337_16: sādhāraṇā nāma honti. Ettha ca labbhamānampi kusalādināmasādhāraṇaṃ anāmasitvā vatthusādhāraṇā
tika-s0519t:337_17: tāva yojitāti veditabbā. Paṭipakkhādīhīti ādisaddena samānaphalatāsahabyatādike saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0519t:337_18: Sesapadesūti “puthujjanassā”tiādivākyesu. Kathaṃ? Tattha hi puthujjanassa, sotāpannassa
tika-s0519t:337_19: ca sambhavato anāgāmino, arahato ca asambhavatotiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:338_0: Kathaṃ te odhiso gahitāti kenākārena te “sādhāraṇā”ti vuttadhammā bhāgaso gahitā.
tika-s0519t:338_1: “Amukassa, amukassa cā”ti ayañhettha attho. Sāmaññabhūtā dhammā sādhāraṇā nāma, evaṃ
tika-s0519t:338_2: sante kathaṃ tesaṃ micchattaniyatāniyatādivasena vibhāgena pavattiṭṭhānatā vuccati,
tika-s0519t:338_3: na vattabbanti adhippāyo. Atha vibhāgena taṃ vattabbaṃ, nanu te sādhāraṇāti na vattabbamevāti?
tika-s0519t:338_4: Evaṃ sādhāraṇāti micchattaniyatānaṃ, aniyatānanti imesaṃ ubhayesaṃyeva te dhammā
tika-s0519t:338_6: tattha kāraṇamāha, tenetaṃ dasseti “keci dhammā kesañcideva dhammānaṃ sādhāraṇā honti,
tika-s0519t:339_0: Itarathāti aniyatapavattiṭṭhānatāya sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇā, asādhāraṇā vā siyuṃ, tathā
tika-s0519t:339_1: sati. Tathā vohāroti “sādhāraṇā, asādhāraṇā”ti ca ayaṃ vohāro sāmaññā eva na bhaveyya.
tika-s0519t:339_2: Ete eva dhammāti “sādhāraṇā”ti vuttadhammā eva. Evanti “micchattaniyatāna”ntiādinā
tika-s0519t:339_4: vuttassevatthassa pākaṭakaraṇaṃ. “Na hī”tiādinā anvayato, byatirekato ca tamevatthaṃ
tika-s0519t:340_0: Paccattaniyatoti pāṭipuggaliko. Itarassāti apaccattaniyatassa. Tathāti asādhāraṇabhāvena.
tika-s0519t:340_1: Koci dhammo kañci dhammaṃ upādāya sādhāraṇopi samāno tadaññaṃ upādāya asādhāraṇopi
tika-s0519t:340_2: hotīti āha “sādhāraṇāvidhuratāyā”ti. Tenāha “taṃ taṃ upādāyā”tiādi. Tathā hi “dhammatā”ti
tika-s0519t:340_3: vuttapaṭhamamaggaṭṭhatā dīpitā, tādisānaṃ eva anekesaṃ ariyānaṃ vasena sādhāraṇāti.
tika-s0519t:340_4: Paṭhamassāti aṭṭhamakassa. Dutiyassāti sotāpannassa. Puna aṭṭhamakassāti “aṭṭhamakassa,
tika-s0519t:340_5: anāgāmissa cā”ti ettha vuttaaṭṭhamakassa. Tenāha “anāgāmimaggaṭṭhassā”ti. Aggaphalaṭṭhato
tika-s0519t:340_6: paṭṭhāya paṭilomato gaṇiyamāno paṭhamamaggaṭṭho aṭṭhamako, maggaṭṭhatāya, pahīyamānakilesatāya
tika-s0519t:340_7: ca sabbepi maggaṭṭhā aṭṭhamakā viyāti aṭṭhamakā, “ekacittakkhaṇato uddhaṃ na tiṭṭhatīti
tika-s0519t:340_8: aṭṭhamako”ti apare niruttinayena. “Sekkhā”ti nāmaṃ sādhāraṇanti sambandho. Itaresūti
tika-s0519t:341_1: ñāṇavisesapaccayasamavāye. Yathā hi ñāṇabalena dandhābhiññatā na hoti, evaṃ paṭipadāpaṭipannopi
tika-s0519t:341_2: sukhena visosīyatīti. Sā hi sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññā taṃsamaṅgino ñāṇuttarattā
tika-s0519t:342: Dhammato anapetā cintā dhammacintā, yonisomanasikārena pavattitattā dhammesu cintā, dhammo vā ñāṇaṃ, tasmā dhammāvahā cintā dhammacintā, cintāmayañāṇassa hetubhūtā cintāti attho.
tika-s0519t:343_0: Pāḷiyaṃ sutamayapaññāggahaṇena “ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā…pe… tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā
tika-s0519t:343_1: hontī”tiādi suttapadasaṅgaho attho pariggahito, tathā yonisomanasikāraggahaṇena “so
tika-s0519t:343_2: ‘anicca’nti yoniso manasi karotī”tiādinā vutto upāyamanasikāro pariggahito. Sammādiṭṭhiggahaṇena
tika-s0519t:343_3: “sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāveti vivekanissita”ntiādinā vuttā sammādiṭṭhi pariggahitāti dassento
tika-s0519t:344_0: Yassa ca pubbe attho na saṃvaṇṇito, tattha kalyāṇamittatāya āyatanagato pasādo, cittavūpasamo
tika-s0519t:344_1: ca phalanti dassento “sappurisa…pe… padaṭṭhāna”nti āha. Attasammāpaṇihitattā pāpajegucchinibbidādibahulova
tika-s0519t:344_2: hotīti dassento āha “attha…pe… padaṭṭhāna”nti. Dhammo svākkhāto ādito paṭṭhāya yāva
tika-s0519t:344_4: āha. Kusalamūlaropanā hi samāpattipariyosānāti. Saṅghasuṭṭhutāya saṅghassa suṭṭhubhāvāya
tika-s0519t:344_5: saṅghassa sappatissatāya “suṭṭhu, bhante”ti vacanasampaṭicchanabhāvāya. Itaraṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0519t:347_0: 35. Sammādiṭṭhissa…pe… nijjiṇṇā bhavatīti ettha yathā maggasammādiṭṭhivasenattho
tika-s0519t:347_1: vutto, evaṃ kammassakatākammapathasammādiṭṭhīnampi vasena attho labbhateva. Kammapathakathā
tika-s0519t:347_3: Micchābhinivesavasenāti asammāsambuddhaṃ eva sammāsambuddhoti, aniyyānikaṃ eva niyyānikoti,
tika-s0519t:347_4: asantaṃ eva pana santanti, anariyaṃ eva ariyoti viparītābhinivesavasena. Micchādhimokkhoti
tika-s0519t:347_5: ayāthāvapasādo, ayāthāvasanniṭṭhānaṃ vā. Uppannamoho micchāvimuttiñāṇadassananti sambandho.
tika-s0519t:348: 36. Vādānaṃ vā anuvādā vādānuvādā, tesaṃ vādānaṃ upādāti attho. Vādānupavattiyoti vādānaṃ dosānaṃ anupavattiyo.
tika-s0519t:350_0: Etesupi vāresūti “niyyāniko dhammo tesaṃ adhammo, sukho tesaṃ adhammo”ti ca imesu
tika-s0519t:350_1: vāresu. Vuttanayenāti yadi attaparitāpanaṃ attano dukkhāpanaṃ dhammo, dhammassa paṭiviruddho
tika-s0519t:350_2: adhammo siyā, dukkhassa ca sukhapaṭiviruddhanti jhānamaggaphalasukhassa, anavajjapaccayaparibhogasukhassa
tika-s0519t:350_3: ca tesaṃ adhammabhāvo āpajjatīti evaṃ vattabbā. “Yaṃ yaṃ vā panātiādinā”ti idaṃ avasesapāṭhāmasanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:350_4: Ettha yaṃ yaṃ vā pana dhammanti yaṃ vā taṃ vā dhammaṃ, kusalaṃ vā akusalaṃ vā iṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0519t:350_5: vā aniṭṭhaṃ vāti vuttaṃ hoti. Rocayati vā upagacchati vāti cittena rocati, diṭṭhiyā
tika-s0519t:350_6: upagacchatīti. Tassa tassa dhammassa yo paṭipakkhoti tassa tassa rucitassa, upagatassa
tika-s0519t:350_7: vā dhammassa yo paṭipakkho nāma. Svassa aniṭṭhato ajjhāpanno bhavatīti yo dhammo
tika-s0519t:350_8: assa rucitassa, upagatassa vā dhammassa aniṭṭhato paccanīkato abbhupagato hoti, tena
tika-s0519t:350_9: paṭipakkhena desanāya parivattanaṃ parivattano hāroti attho. Tenāha “paṭipakkhassa
tika-s0519t:353_0: 37. Aññamaññehīti aññehi aññehi. Āyatinti paccavekkhaṇakāle. Kathañcīti yena kenaci
tika-s0519t:353_1: pakārena, paṭhamaṃ vuttena pariyāyena appaṭivijjhanto aparena pariyāyena paṭivijjheyyāti
tika-s0519t:353_2: adhippāyo. Pariyāyavacanaṃ niddisatīti sambandho. Evaṃ sabbattha. Tasmiṃ khaṇeti
tika-s0519t:353_4: Aññavihitānanti aññaṃ cintentānaṃ. Kasmā pana aññena pariyāyena tadatthāvabodhanaṃ,
tika-s0519t:353_5: nanu tena vutte daḷhīkaraṇaṃ hotīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “tenevā”tiādi. Tattha tadaññesanti
tika-s0519t:353_6: tehi vikkhittacittādīhi aññesaṃ, yehi paṭhamaṃ vacanaṃ sammadeva gahitaṃ. Tatthāti
tika-s0519t:353_7: vuttavacaneneva punappunaṃ vacane. Adhigataanvatthatāya punarutti parivajjanatthaṃ
tika-s0519t:353_8: visesanabhāvena tāhi tāhi saññāhipi ayampi saddo imassatthassa vācako, ayampi saddo
tika-s0519t:353_9: imassatthassa vācakoti paññāpanehi. Desetabbassa tassa tassa atthassa attano citte
tika-s0519t:353_10: upanibandhanaṃ ṭhapanaṃ. Tatthāti dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāyaṃ. Bījāvāpanaṃ hetusampādanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:354_0: Evaṃ bhagavato pariyāyadesanāyaṃ anekāni payojanāni vatvā idāni attano sammāsambuddhatāya
tika-s0519t:354_1: evaṃ tathāgatā buddhalīlāya anekehi pariyāyehi dhammaṃ desentīti dassento “kiṃ bahunā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:355_0: Pāḷiyaṃ “pihā nāma yā vattamānassa atthassa patthanā”ti paccuppannavisayataṃ dassetvā
tika-s0519t:355_1: puna anāgatavisayataṃ dassetuṃ “seyyataraṃ vā”tiādi vuttanti “anāgatapaccuppannatthavisayā taṇhā pihā”ti āha.
tika-s0519t:356: Atthanipphattipaṭipālanāti imasmiṃ vā pade pihāya evatthavasena anāgatapaccuppannatthavisayabhāvadīpanato.
tika-s0519t:357: Dhammārammaṇeneva saṅgahitā “dhammārammaṇa”ntveva gahaṇaṃ gatā. Catuvīsati padānīti ettha gehasitadomanassūpavicārādīnaṃ catunnaṃ chakkānaṃ vasena catuvīsa koṭṭhāsā.
tika-s0519t:358_0: 38. Sāyeva patthanākārena dhammanandītiādimāhāti ettha ayamattho – sā eva patthanākārena
tika-s0519t:358_1: pavattiyā āsādipariyāyena vuttā taṇhā rūpādidhammesu nandanaṭṭhena dhammanandī. Tesaṃ
tika-s0519t:358_2: eva piyāyanaṭṭhena dhammapemaṃ. Gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā ṭhānato dhammajjhosānanti.
tika-s0519t:359_0: Imināpīti na kevalaṃ “paññā pajānanā”tiādiāveṇikapariyāyeneva vevacanaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-s0519t:359_1: atha kho iminā ādhipateyyādisādhāraṇapariyāyenapi vevacanaṃ vattabbanti attho. Imināva
tika-s0519t:359_2: nayenāti etena pariyāyavacanena. Na hi desanatthasādhanaṃ “itipi so bhagavā”tiādipāḷinayadassananti
tika-s0519t:359_3: dasseti. Balanipphattigatotiādīsu dasasu tathāgatabalesu nipphattiṃ pāripūriṃ gato.
tika-s0519t:360_1: asaṅkhepasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ, akuppadhammatāya guṇehi vā asaṅkhepaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ gato
tika-s0519t:360_2: upagatoti asaṅkhepagato. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva. Uddheyyanti uddharitabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:361: Dhammānussatiyaṃ evaṃ attho daṭṭhabboti sambandho. Saṃsāradukkhato pāti, santena sukhena rameti cāti vā pāraṃ.
tika-s0519t:362: Abhūtapubbattāti anuppannapubbattā, tenassa niccataṃva vibhāveti kenaci devatopasaggādinā anupasajjanīyattā anupasaṭṭhattā.
tika-s0519t:363: “Duppassa”ntipi pāḷi, duradhigamanti attho. Guṇasobhāsurabhibhāvenāti guṇehi sobhāya, sugandhibhāvena ca.
tika-s0519t:364_0: Yathā akkhaṇavedhī puggalo sippanipphattiyā rattandhakāratimisāya acirakkhaṇālokena
tika-s0519t:364_1: atisukhumampi dūragataṃ lakkhaṃ vijjhati, evaṃ ariyasāvako sīlasampattiyā atisukhumaṃ
tika-s0519t:364_2: nibbānaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ ekapaṭivedheneva paṭivijjhatīti āha “sippañca sīlaṃ akkhaṇavedhitāyā”ti.
tika-s0519t:367_0: 39. Bhagavato sābhāvikadhammakathāyāti attano bhāvo sabhāvo, sabhāvena nibbattā,
tika-s0519t:367_1: tato vā āgatāti sābhāvikā, sā eva dhammakathāti sābhāvikadhammakathā, buddhānaṃ sāmukkaṃsikadhammakathāti
tika-s0519t:367_2: attho, tāya karaṇabhūtāya dhammadesanāya anaññattepi kathādesanānaṃ upacārasiddhena
tika-s0519t:367_3: bhedenevaṃ vuttaṃ, avayavasamudāyavibhāgena vā. Tenāha “kā ca pakatikathāya desanā?
tika-s0519t:367_4: Cattāri saccānī”ti. Idañhi atthassa desanāya abhedopacāraṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Tassā desanāya
tika-s0519t:367_5: paññāpanā. Ayaṃ paññattihāroti saṅkhepeneva paññattihārassa sarūpamāha. Sāti yathāvuttadesanā.
tika-s0519t:367_6: Tathā tathāti yathā yathā saccāni desetabbāni, tathā tathā. Kathañcetāni desetabbāni?
tika-s0519t:367_8: attho. Atthanti desetabbatthaṃ, dukkhādiatthameva vā. Nikkhipatīti patiṭṭhāpeti.
tika-s0519t:368: Tatthāti nikkhepadesanāyanti attho. Maggapakkhiyāti dukkhasaccato bahikatāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0519t:369: Yasmiṃ ṭhāneti yasmiṃ bhavādisaṅkhāte ṭhāne. Yathāvuttā desanāti caturāhārapaṭibaddharāgādimukhena vaṭṭadīpanī vuttappakārā desanā.
tika-s0519t:370_0: 41. Teparivaṭṭavasenāti etthāpi “saccesū”ti yojetabbaṃ. Pariññāpaññattīti āhāti sambandho.
tika-s0519t:370_1: Ajjhattarato, samāhitoti padadvayena samādhānavisiṭṭhaṃ ajjhattaratatābhāvanaṃ dīpeti
tika-s0519t:370_3: vattati. Ajjhattaratatāvisiṭṭhañca samādhānaṃ sātisayaṃ cittaṭṭhitiṃ dīpetīti imamatthaṃ
tika-s0519t:371: Āsajjanaṭṭhenāti āsaṅganaṭṭhena. Tathā dassananti atathābhūtassāpi bhabbarūpassa viya attano vidaṃsanaṃ. Alakkhikoti vilakkhiko.
tika-s0519t:372_0: Kāmānanti kāmāvacaradhammānaṃ. Rūpānanti rūpāvacaradhammānaṃ. Nissaraṇanti kāmānaṃ
tika-s0519t:372_1: rūpāvacaradhammā nissaraṇaṃ, tesaṃ arūpāvacaradhammā nissaraṇaṃ. Evaṃ taṃsabhāvānanti
tika-s0519t:372_2: sauttarasabhāvānaṃ. Tathāti yathā saṅkhatadhammānaṃ nissaraṇabhāvato, kilesasamucchedakassa
tika-s0519t:372_3: ariyamaggassa ārammaṇabhāvato ca attheva asaṅkhatā dhātu, tathā vuccamānenāpi kāraṇena
tika-s0519t:372_4: attheva asaṅkhatā dhātūti dasseti. Katthaci visayeti asaṅkhatadhātuṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0519t:372_5: Aviparītatthoti bhūtattho. “Yato kho bho ayaṃ attā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgībhūto
tika-s0519t:372_6: paricāreti, ettāvatā kho bho ayaṃ attā paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānappatto hoti, sapakaṭṭhanibbānabhāvino”ti
tika-s0519t:372_7: ca evamādīsu upacāravuttisabbhāvato. Yathā taṃ sīhasaddoti yathā “sīho māṇavako”tiādinā
tika-s0519t:372_8: māṇavakādīsu upacāravuttinā vattamāno migarāje bhūtatthavisaye diṭṭho, evaṃ nibbānasaddopi
tika-s0519t:372_9: kāmaguṇarūpajjhānasamaṅgitāsu upacāravuttiyā vattamāno katthaci visaye aviparītattho.
tika-s0519t:372_10: Yattha ca visaye aviparītattho, sā asaṅkhatā dhātu. Hatthatale saāmalakaṃ viya ñeyyaṃ
tika-s0519t:372_11: paccakkhato passantassa ekappamāṇassa satthuvacanamevettha pamāṇanti dassento “kiṃ
tika-s0519t:372_12: vā etāya yutticintāyā”tiādimāha. “Paṭiññātassa atthassa siddhiyā pakāsanāpaññattī”ti
tika-s0519t:375: 42. Indriyehīti karaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ “maggena gacchatī”tiādīsu viya, “pharasunā chindatī”ti evamādīsu viya ca. Otaraṇāti anuppavesanā.
tika-s0519t:376_0: Paññākkhandhe saṅgaṇhanavasena sammāsaṅkappo viyāti yojanā. Adhicittaanuyuttānaṃ
tika-s0519t:376_1: saddahanussahanupaṭṭhānasamādahanehi saddhādīsu upakarontesu eva paññā dassanakiccaṃ
tika-s0519t:376_2: sādhetīti dassento “saddhā..pe… vuttānī”ti āha. No ca bhavaṅgāti tesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-s0519t:377: 43. Tathā vuttoti “nissayo”ti vutto. Cetanāsīsena taṇhaṃ eva vadati cetanāsahacaraṇato.
tika-s0519t:378_0: Rattassāti maggena asamucchinnarāgassa. Yena puggalo “ratto”ti vuccati, tassa rāgassa
tika-s0519t:378_1: sambandhinī sukhā vedanā vuttā tattha tassa anusayanato. Tenāha “sukhāya…pe… vutta”nti.
tika-s0519t:379_1: sandhāyāha “idha vedanāsīsena cetanā vuttā”ti. Na hi vedanā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā
tika-s0519t:379_2: hoti. Taṇhāya, diṭṭhiyāti ca upayoge karaṇavacananti dassento “taṇhāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:379_3: Idāni upayogavaseneva “taṇhāyā”tiādīnaṃ atthaṃ dassetuṃ “yathā vā”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-s0519t:379_4: sesadhammānanti taṇhāvajjitaavisiṭṭhadhammānaṃ. Taṇhāya nissayabhāveti yadā taṇhā tesaṃ nissayo hoti.
tika-s0519t:380_0: Taṇhāya sesadhammānaṃ paccayabhāveti yadā sesadhammā taṇhāpaccayā honti. “Karajakāyasannissitā”ti
tika-s0519t:380_2: paramparahetubhāvaṃ. Taṇhādiṭṭhiupayenāti diṭṭhiupayena ca diṭṭhisahagatataṇhāupayena ca.
tika-s0519t:381_0: “Āgatīti idhāgati, gatīti peccabhavo”ti padadvayena vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ
tika-s0519t:381_1: pāḷiyaṃ “āgatigatīpi na bhavantī”ti vuttaṃ. Idha huranti dvārārammaṇadhammā dassitā
tika-s0519t:381_2: āsannadūrabhāvehi dvārārammaṇehi vinivattetvā gahitattā. Idha dvārappavattadhammā
tika-s0519t:381_3: “ubhayamantarenā”ti padassa atthabhāvena vuttā. Catubyūhahāre pana anindriyabaddharūpadhammā
tika-s0519t:381_4: tathā vuttā. Kāraṇabhūtena anantarapaccayabhūtena, upanissayapaccayabhūtena ca. Ye
tika-s0519t:381_5: dhammā upādāya “attā”ti samaññā, tesaṃ viññāṇādidhammānaṃ abhāvena anuppādadhammataṃ
tika-s0519t:381_6: āpāditattāti attho. “Anissitassa calitaṃ natthī”tiādinā paṭilomato paccayabhāvo dassitoti
tika-s0519t:381_7: dassento pāḷiyaṃ “esevanto dukkhassāti paṭiccasamuppādo”ti vatvā nanu “avijjāpaccayā
tika-s0519t:381_8: saṅkhārā”tiādiko paṭiccasamuppādoti codanaṃ sandhāya yathāvuttassa paṭiccasamuppādabhāvaṃ
tika-s0519t:381_9: dassetuṃ “so duvidho”tiādinā lokiyalokuttaravasena paṭiccasamuppādo vibhatto. Tadatthatāyāti
tika-s0519t:384_0: 45. Sodheti nāmāti pucchitamatthaṃ hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalakaṃ viya paccakkhato dassento
tika-s0519t:384_1: niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ katvā vivaranto tabbisayaaññāṇasaṃsayādimalāpanayanena sodheti,
tika-s0519t:384_2: evaṃ sodhento ca padassa atthena abhedopacāraṃ katvā “padaṃ sodheti”cceva vuccati.
tika-s0519t:384_3: Tenāha “padaṃ sodheti nāmā”ti. Pucchāya vissajjanamevettha sodhananti āha “tadatthassa
tika-s0519t:384_4: vissajjanato”ti. Ārabhīyatīti ārambho, desanāya pakāsiyamāno attho. Tenāha “na tāva…pe…
tika-s0519t:384_5: pabodhitattā”ti. Idha sodhanaṃ nāma paṭicchannarūpassa atthassa desanānubhāvena vivaṭabhāvakaraṇanti
tika-s0519t:387: 46. Dhārayitabbāti upadhāretabbā, upalakkhitabbāti attho. Vuttameva “sāmaññavisesakappanāya vohārabhāvena anavaṭṭhānato”tiādinā.
tika-s0519t:388_0: Taṃ taṃ phalanti nirayādiṃ taṃ taṃ phalaṃ. Añcitāti gatā. Yonīti ekajāti. Samānavasena
tika-s0519t:388_1: missībhavati etāyāti hi yoni, upapatti. Peccāti maritvā. Ussannatāyāti vitakkabahulatāya.
tika-s0519t:388_2: “Ussannattā”tipi vadanti. Sassatādīhi vā ussannattā. Asurajātiyā nibbattāpanako asurajātinibbattanako.
tika-s0519t:389: Saṅkhāti paññā. Paññāpadhānā ca bhāvanāti āha “paṭisaṅkhāya paṭipakkhabhāvanāyā”ti.
tika-s0519t:390_0: 47. Patthaṭabhāvena pathavī. Sabhāvadhāraṇaṭṭhena, nissattanijjīvaṭṭhena ca dhātu.
tika-s0519t:390_1: Āpīyati, appāyatīti vā āpo. Tejanavasena tikkhatāvasena, dahanavasena vā tejo. Vāyanavasena
tika-s0519t:390_2: vegagamanavasena, samudīraṇavasena vā vāyo. Vīsati ākārāti kesādayo vīsati koṭṭhāsā,
tika-s0519t:390_3: pakārā vā. Kakkhaḷalakkhaṇādhikatāya kesādī kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā vuttā.
tika-s0519t:391_1: Santappatīti ettha sarīrapakatimatikkamitvā uṇhabhāvo santāpo, sarīradahanavasena
tika-s0519t:391_2: pavatto mahādāho, ayametesaṃ viseso. Yena ca jīrīyatīti ekāhikādijarārogena jarīyatīti
tika-s0519t:391_3: ca attho yujjati. “Satavāraṃ tāpetvā tāpetvā udake pakkhipitvā uddhaṭasappi satadhotasappī”ti
tika-s0519t:391_4: vadanti. Rasarudhiramaṃsamedanhāruaṭṭhiaṭṭhimiñjā rasādayo. Keci nhāruṃ apanetvā
tika-s0519t:391_5: sukkaṃ sattamaṃ dhātuṃ vadanti. Vivekanti visuṃbhāvaṃ, visadisabhāvanti attho. Vatthusaṅkhāto
tika-s0519t:391_6: hi āhāro pariṇāmaṃ gacchanto pāṇabhakkhagahaṇipadaniya muttakarīsabhāvehi viya attanāpi
tika-s0519t:391_7: visadisarasasaṅkhātaṃ visuṃbhāvaṃ nibbattento tabbhāvaṃ gacchatīti vuccati, tathā
tika-s0519t:393_0: 48. Yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇanti rasitabboti raso, paṭivijjhitabbo sabhāvo, attano raso
tika-s0519t:393_1: saraso, yāthāvo saraso, yāthāvasaraso yāthāvasaraso eva lakkhitabbattā lakkhaṇanti
tika-s0519t:393_2: yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ. Atha vā yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇanti aviparītaṃ attano pavattisaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0519t:393_3: kiccañceva pīḷanasaṅkhātaṃ lakkhaṇañca. “Idaṃ kiccaṃ, idaṃ lakkhaṇa”nti avijjāhetu
tika-s0519t:393_4: ñātuṃ na sakkoti, tabbisayañāṇuppattiṃ nivārentī chādetvā pariyonandhitvā tiṭṭhatīti
tika-s0519t:393_5: vuttā. Tena vuttaṃ “jānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na detī”ti. Tayidamassā kiccanti kiccato
tika-s0519t:393_6: kathitā. Kathitāti ca vuttā, yato ca avijjā asampaṭivedharasāti vuccati. Jāyati etthāti
tika-s0519t:393_7: jāti, uppattiṭṭhānaṃ. Yadipi nirodhamagge avijjā ārammaṇaṃ na karoti, te pana jānitukāmassa
tika-s0519t:393_9: tattha uppajjatīti vuccati, tesampi avijjāya uppattiṭṭhānatā hoti, itaresaṃ ārammaṇabhāvena cāti.
tika-s0519t:394_0: Atthānatthanti hitāhitaṃ. Sammohavinodaniyaṃ pana “atthattha”nti vuttaṃ, tattha attho
tika-s0519t:394_1: eva atthatthoti atthassa aviparītatādassanatthaṃ dutiyena atthasaddena visesanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:394_2: Na hi ñāṇaṃ anatthe “attho”ti gaṇhātīti. Kāraṇākāraṇanti etthāpi evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:394_3: Atthatthanti vā āmeḍitavacanaṃ sabbesaṃ atthānaṃ pākaṭakaraṇabhāvappakāsanatthaṃ,
tika-s0519t:394_4: phalaṃ phalanti attho, hitapariyāyepi eseva nayo. Nti atthānatthādikaṃ. Ākāranti atthādikāraṇameva.
tika-s0519t:395_0: Paṭividdhassa puna avekkhanā paccavekkhaṇā. Ducintitacintitādilakkhaṇassa bālassa
tika-s0519t:395_1: bhāvo bālyaṃ. Sampajānātīti samaṃ pakārehi jānāti. Balavamoho pamoho. Samantato mohanaṃ
tika-s0519t:395_2: sammoho. Duggatigāmikammassa visesapaccayattā avindiyaṃ. Vindatīti labhati. Anavajjadhammānaṃ
tika-s0519t:395_3: vijjā viya visesapaccayo na hotīti vindiyaṃ na vindati. Ayaṃ avijjāya vemattatāti
tika-s0519t:395_4: ayaṃ “dukkhe aññāṇa”ntiādinā kiccajātilakkhaṇehi vutto avijjāya aviseso. Vijjātiādīnaṃ
tika-s0519t:397_0: Tattakameva kālanti pañcakappasatāni. Vibhūtaṃ samattikkantaṃ rūpasaññāsaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0519t:397_1: rūpaṃ etāyāti vibhūtarūpaṃ, samāpattinti padattho. Na hi kāci arūpasamāpatti rūpasaññāsahagatā
tika-s0519t:397_2: pavattīti. Nirodhasamāpattiyaṃ vattabbameva natthi, tattha nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā
tika-s0519t:398: Damathaṃ anupagacchanto duṭṭhasso khaluṅkasso. Uttaridamathāyāti ariyamaggadamathāya.
tika-s0519t:399: Itaroti dukkhāpaṭipado khippābhiñño, sukhāpaṭipado ca khippābhiñño. Ubhayatobhāgehīti rūpakāyanāmakāyabhāgehi. Ubhayatoti vikkhambhanasamucchedavimuttivasena.
tika-s0519t:403: 49. “Hinotī”ti padassa atthaṃ dassento “kāraṇabhāvaṃ gacchatī”ti āha anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ. Etīti āgacchati, uppajjatīti attho.
tika-s0519t:404_0: Avijjāyapi hetubhāveti ettha avijjā anantarāya avijjāya anantarasamanantarūpanissayanatthivigatāsevanapaccayehi,
tika-s0519t:404_2: asahajātāya upanissayakoṭiyā eva paccayo hotīti veditabbaṃ. Attano phalaṃ karotīti
tika-s0519t:406_0: Yo sabhāvoti puññādiabhisaṅkhārānaṃ yo abhisaṅkharaṇasabhāvo, so hetu. Sesapadesūti
tika-s0519t:406_2: Yo koci paccayoti janakādibhedaṃ yaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ. Abhisaṅkharaṇatoti paccakkhato,
tika-s0519t:409_0: 50. Suttena gahiteti sutte vutte. Padaṭṭhānaggahaṇaṃ adhiṭṭhānavisayadassanatthaṃ,
tika-s0519t:409_2: visayasaṅkhātapavattiṭṭhānabhāvato. Vanīyatīti bhajīyati. Vanatīti bhajati sevati.
tika-s0519t:409_3: Vanuteti yācati, patthetīti attho. Pañca kāmaguṇā kāmataṇhāya kāraṇaṃ hoti ārammaṇapaccayatāya.
tika-s0519t:409_4: Nimittaggāho anubyañjanaggāhassa kāraṇaṃ hoti upanissayatāyāti evaṃ sesesupi yathārahaṃ kāraṇatā vattabbā.
tika-s0519t:410_0: 51. “Kāye kāyānupassī viharāhī”tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā lakkhaṇahāravibhaṅgavaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-s0519t:410_1: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ pana viseso – rūpadhammapariññāyāti rūpūpikaviññāṇaṭṭhitipariññāya.
tika-s0519t:411_0: “Dukkha”nti passantī sā vedanānupassanāti yojetabbaṃ. Vedanāhetupariññāyāti phassapariññāya.
tika-s0519t:416_0: “Eva”ntiādi hārasampātadesanāya sambandhadassanaṃ. Tattha purimena upamādvayena suparikammakatamaṇikoṭṭimasadisī,
tika-s0519t:416_3: Pacchimena tassa paṇītamahārahe jaṭāhi saddhiṃ dukkaratarataṃ dīpeti. Yāyaṃ gāthā vuttāti yojanā.
tika-s0519t:417_0: 52. Yasmāyaṃ hāravibhaṅgavāro nappayojeti yathāvuttena kāraṇena, tasmā sā hāravibhaṅgavārassa
tika-s0519t:417_1: ādimhi na paccāmaṭṭhāti adhippāyo. Hārasampātavāro pana taṃ payojetīti yasmā pana
tika-s0519t:417_2: hārasampātavāro taṃ gāthaṃ payojeti yathāvutteneva kāraṇena, tasmā “soḷasa…pe… āhā”ti
tika-s0519t:418_0: Tenāti “taṃ maccuno pada”nti vacanena. Sabbaṃ vipallāsanti dvādasavidhampi vipallāsaṃ.
tika-s0519t:418_1: Sāmaññassa…pe… voharīyati yattha patiṭṭhitaṃ sāmaññaṃ, so viseso. Atthato pana saññādayo
tika-s0519t:418_2: eva rūpādivisayaṃ viparītākārena gaṇhante vipallāsoti dassento “saññāvipallāso”tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:419_3: Vipallāsānaṃ pavattiākāro “asubhe subha”ntiādi. Visayo kāyavedanācittadhammā. Avijjā
tika-s0519t:419_4: ca…pe… eva sammohapubbakattā sabbavipallāsānaṃ. Ca-saddo subhasukhasaññānanti etthāpi ānetvā yojetabbo.
tika-s0519t:420_0: Tatthāyaṃ yojanā – “avijjā ca subhasukhasaññānaṃ paccayo eva, na taṇhā eva, avijjā
tika-s0519t:420_1: subhasukhasaññānañca paccayo, na niccaattasaññānaṃ evā”ti. Evaṃ santepi purimānaṃ
tika-s0519t:420_2: dvinnaṃ viparītasaññānaṃ taṇhā, pacchimānaṃ avijjā visesapaccayoti dassento āha “tathāpī”tiādi.
tika-s0519t:420_3: Avijjāsīsena cettha diṭṭhiyā gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tenāha “diṭṭhinivutaṃ citta”nti,
tika-s0519t:420_4: “yo diṭṭhivipallāso”ti ca ādi, yathā ca avijjāsīsena diṭṭhiyā gahaṇaṃ, evaṃ diṭṭhisīsena
tika-s0519t:420_5: avijjāyapi gahaṇaṃ siyāti āha “diṭṭhisīsena avijjā vuttā”ti. Taṇhāvijjāsu subhasukhasaññānaṃ
tika-s0519t:420_6: yathā taṇhā visesapaccayo, na evaṃ avijjā. Niccaattasaññānaṃ pana yathā avijjā visesapaccayo,
tika-s0519t:420_7: na tathā taṇhāti dassento “moho visesapaccayo”ti āha.
tika-s0519t:421_0: Pacchimānaṃ dvinnaṃ…pe… hotīti atītaṃse taṇhābhinivesassa balavabhāvābhāvato. Teneva
tika-s0519t:421_1: hi “so atītaṃ rūpaṃ attato samanupassati”cceva vuttaṃ, na “abhinandatī”ti. Taṇhāvipallāsoti
tika-s0519t:421_2: taṇhaṃ upanissāya pavatto vipallāso, na hi taṇhā sayaṃ vipallāso. Tenāha “taṇhāmūlako
tika-s0519t:421_4: so “taṇhāvipallāso”ti vutto. Etenāti “yo taṇhāvipallāso”tiādipāṭhena. Soḷasa saññīvādā,
tika-s0519t:421_5: aṭṭha asaññīvādā, aṭṭha nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā, pañca paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānavādā
tika-s0519t:421_6: ca, yathā attano gatāya, nibbānappattiyā ca parikappavasena subhasukhākāraggāhino,
tika-s0519t:421_7: na evaṃ satta ucchedavādāti āha “yebhuyyenā”ti. Paṭipakkhavasenapīti visuddhivasenapi.
tika-s0519t:421_8: Yāva hi upakkilesā, tāva cittaṃ na visujjhateva. Yadā ca te pahīnā, tadā visuddhameva.
tika-s0519t:421_9: Tenāha “na hī”tiādi. “Arakkhitena cittenā”ti pāḷiṃ nikkhipitvā vipallāsamukheneva
tika-s0519t:422: Mārassāti kilesamārassa. Tassa hi vase ṭhito sesamārānaṃ hatthagato evāti. Tenāha “kilesamāraggahaṇenevā”tiādi.
tika-s0519t:423_0: Mārabandhananti sattamārapakkhe mārassa bandhananti mārabandhanaṃ. So hi kilesabandhanabhūte
tika-s0519t:423_1: attano samārakaparise maññati. Tena vuttaṃ “antali…pe… mokkhasī”ti. Itaramārapakkhe
tika-s0519t:424_0: Mohasampayogato cittaṃ “mūḷha”nti vuttanti rattaduṭṭhānampi mūḷhatāya sabbhāve “mūḷha”nti
tika-s0519t:424_1: visuṃ vacanaṃ āveṇikamohavasena vuttanti dassento “dvinnaṃ momūhacittuppādānaṃ vasenā”ti
tika-s0519t:424_2: āha. Evanti evaṃ rāgādiakusalappattiyā kusalabhaṇḍacchedanato arakkhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
tika-s0519t:424_3: sabbopi micchābhiniveso ettheva saṅgahaṃ samosaraṇaṃ gacchatīti āha “micchādiṭṭhi
tika-s0519t:425_0: Cakkhunāti dvārena. Rūpanti visabhāgavatthusannissitaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ. Nimittaggāhīti
tika-s0519t:425_1: “itthī”ti vā puriso”ti vā “subha”nti vā “asubha”nti vā parikappitanimittaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-s0519t:425_2: tassa vā gahaṇasīlo. Anubyañjanaggāhīti hatthapādahasitakathitādippabhede kilesānaṃ
tika-s0519t:425_3: anu anu byañjanato anubyañjanasaññite ākāre gaṇhāti, tesaṃ vā gahaṇasīlo. Yatvādhikaraṇanti
tika-s0519t:425_4: yaṃ nimittaṃ, nimittānubyañjanaggahaṇanimittanti attho. Evaṃ “cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ
tika-s0519t:425_5: viharanta”nti, yo “nimittaggāhī, anubyañjanaggāhī”ti ca vutto puggalo, tamenaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ
tika-s0519t:425_6: cakkhudvāraṃ asaṃvutaṃ satikavāṭena apihitaṃ katvā vattantaṃ, tassa ca rūpassa iṭṭhākāraggahaṇe
tika-s0519t:425_7: abhijjhā, aniṭṭhākāraggahaṇe domanassaṃ, asamapekkhane moho micchābhinivese micchādiṭṭhīti
tika-s0519t:425_8: evaṃ abhijjhābyāpādā, aññe ca lāmakaṭṭhena pāpakā akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena akusalā
tika-s0519t:426_0: Tassa saṃvarāya na paṭipajjatīti tassa cakkhudvārassa saṃvarāya satikavāṭena pidahanatthaṃ
tika-s0519t:426_1: na paṭipajjati. Sā pana appaṭipatti cakkhundriyassa anārakkhāsaṃvarassa anuppādoti
tika-s0519t:426_2: dassento “na rakkhati…pe… āpajjatī”ti āha. Javane uppajjamānopi hi asaṃvaro tena
tika-s0519t:426_4: attho veditabbo. “Pubbantakappanavasena cā”tiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato
tika-s0519t:426_5: dassento “saṅkhepato ca vitthāro añño”ti katvā taṃ samuccinanto “yā ca kho imā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:427_0: Yathāvuttā akusalā dhammāti dvādasa akusalacittuppādadhammā, tesaṃ vatthūni vā. Te
tika-s0519t:427_1: hi samudayavajjā pañcupādānakkhandhā. “Eva”nti iminā nettipāḷiyaṃ, aṭṭhakathāyañca
tika-s0519t:428_0: Yadipi desanāhārasampātapāḷiyaṃ “tasmā rakkhitacittassā”ti gāthā sarūpato na gahitā,
tika-s0519t:428_1: atthato pana “tesaṃ bhagavā pariññāyā”tiādinā gahitā evāti tassā gahitabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ
tika-s0519t:429_0: Yonisomanasikārena kammaṃ karontoti “so ‘idaṃ dukkha’nti yoniso manasi karotī”tiādinā
tika-s0519t:429_1: nayena vipassanāsaṅkhātena yonisomanasikārena bhāvanākammaṃ karonto, bhāventoti attho.
tika-s0519t:429_3: avijjānirodhā rūpanirodho”tiādinā samapaññāsāya ākārehi. Nirayagatiyaṃ dukkhadukkhatā,
tika-s0519t:429_4: sugativisese brahmalokekadese saṅkhāradukkhatā, itarattha dve tissopīti dassento
tika-s0519t:432_0: 53. Kusaladhammārammaṇāti kusaladhamme uddissa pavattimattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na
tika-s0519t:432_1: tesaṃ ārammaṇapaccayataṃ idha “kusalā dhammā”ti lokuttaradhammānaṃ adhippetattā.
tika-s0519t:432_2: Na hi kadāci anupādāniyā dhammā upādānārammaṇā honti. Phaladhamme uddissa pavattāya
tika-s0519t:432_3: taṇhāya gahitattā “kusala…pe… daṭṭhabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Desanāhāreti desanāhārasampāte.
tika-s0519t:432_4: Kathaṃ pana kusalabhāvoti “kusalā”ti vacanamattaṃ gahetvā codeti, tañca nidassanamattaṃ
tika-s0519t:432_5: daṭṭhabbaṃ, pahānahetubhāvopissā siyā codakena sampaṭicchitova. “Mānopi duvidho”tiādinā
tika-s0519t:432_6: mānassa ca tassā taṇhāya ca sevitabbabhāvo akusalānaṃ pahānāya, kusalānaṃ uppattiyā ca paccayabhāvato.
tika-s0519t:433_0: Nekkhammassitaṃ domanassaṃ nāma “ariyabhūmiṃ pāpuṇituṃ nāsakkhi”nti anusocato uppannaṃ
tika-s0519t:433_1: domanassanti sambandho. Evanti iminā pāḷiyaṃ vuttappakārena, pihaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā chasu
tika-s0519t:433_2: dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate aniccādivasena vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvāti yojanā. Iṭṭhārammaṇañcettha
tika-s0519t:433_5: vuttaṃ. Vipassanādivinimuttā vā paṭhamajjhānādivasena vuttā kusalā dhammā idha nekkhammaṃ.
tika-s0519t:433_7: dutiyajjhānato paṭṭhāya yāva aggaphalā uparivisesā saṅgahitā. Yāya paññāvimuttiyā.
tika-s0519t:434_1: vipassanābhāvanādikammassa yoggaṃ anurūpaṃ anucchavikaṃ. Assaddhiyeti assaddhiyahetu,
tika-s0519t:434_2: “assaddhiyenā”tipi paṭhanti, so evattho. Obhāsagatanti ñāṇobhāsagataṃ. Kāmaṃ pubbepi
tika-s0519t:434_3: paññā vuttā, assaddhiyādīhi pana aññesaṃ kilesānaṃ vidhamanampi paññāya eva hoti,
tika-s0519t:434_4: sā ca evaṃbhūtāti dassanatthaṃ “obhāsagataṃ kilesandhakāre na iñjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:435_0: Kopo kodho. Appaccayo domanassaṃ. Iddhividhañāṇādikā cha abhiññā pākaṭā evāti “dve
tika-s0519t:435_1: ca visese”ti vuttadhamme dassetuṃ “manomayiddhi, vipassanāñāṇañcā”ti āha. Aṅgaṇāni
tika-s0519t:435_2: rāgādayo. Upakkilesā abhijjhāvisamalobhādayo. Anulomanaṃ tadekaṭṭhatā. Phandanā dubbalā
tika-s0519t:435_3: vikkhepappavatti. Balavatī anavaṭṭhānaṃ. Sabbo micchābhiniveso ayonisomanasikārena
tika-s0519t:435_4: hoti, micchāvitakkena ca. Tattha ayonisomanasikāro akusalacittuppādo tappariyāpanno
tika-s0519t:436_0: Atha vā iñjanāti phandanā, diṭṭhaparittāso. Yathāha “tadapi tesaṃ bhavataṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ
tika-s0519t:436_1: ajānataṃ apassataṃ vedayitaṃ taṇhāgatānaṃ paritassitavipphanditamevā”ti. Aṭṭhitīti
tika-s0519t:436_2: anavaṭṭhānaṃ, diṭṭhivitakko. Tena hi puthujjano kāle sassataṃ, kāle ucchedanti taṃ
tika-s0519t:436_3: taṃ diṭṭhiggahaṇaṃ pakkhandanto sattato paribbhaṭṭhaandho viya, samudde vissaṭṭhavāhanikā
tika-s0519t:436_4: viya, yante yuttagoṇo viya ca tathā tathā paribbhamati. Tenāha “diṭṭhiyopi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0519t:436_5: vitakkopi diṭṭhiṭṭhāna”nti ca. Etasmiñca pakkhe micchābhinivesatāya, micchābhinivesahetutāya
tika-s0519t:436_6: ca tassā dve pakkhāti ekadesasarūpekaseso katoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:437_1: paccattavacananti dassento “paṭigha…pe… saññāsū”ti āha. Rūpāvacarasaññāti saññāsīsena
tika-s0519t:437_2: rūpāvacarajjhānāni vadati. Nānattasaññāti nānāsabhāvā, nānāsabhāve vā ārammaṇe saññā.
tika-s0519t:437_3: Ṭhapetvā paṭighasaññā avasiṭṭhakāmāvacarasaññā hetā. Tā samatikkamatīti tā rūpasaññānānattasaññāyo
tika-s0519t:438_0: Rūpāvacarajjhānobhāsopi kasiṇārammaṇā. Kasiṇanissando hi āruppajjhānuppatti. Dassananti
tika-s0519t:438_1: kasiṇarūpānaṃ dassanaṃ. Abhijjhābyāpādappahānena saddhiṃ vīriyārambho upakārako samatho
tika-s0519t:438_2: satipassaddhiyo parikkhāraṅgatā vuttā eva. Satirahitaṃ sammasanaṃ nāma natthīti “yā
tika-s0519t:438_3: upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā, ayaṃ vipassanā”ti vuttaṃ. Tena satisīsena vipassanā gahitāti
tika-s0519t:439_1: pāḷiyaṃ etassa samādhissa santapaṇītatādivisesā vuttā, tepi idha saṅgahitāti tesaṃ
tika-s0519t:439_2: padānaṃ atthaṃ dassento “aṅgasantatāyā”tiādimāha. Tattha aṅgasantatāyāti phalajhānaṅgānaṃ
tika-s0519t:439_4: Ekodibhāvenāti maggasamādhisaṅkhātena ekodibhāvena. Ekodibhāvanti samādhānaṃ. Lokiyasamādhissa
tika-s0519t:439_6: Imassa pana arahattasamādhissa paṭippassaddhakilesattā na niggahetabbaṃ, vāretabbañca
tika-s0519t:439_7: atthīti so maggānantaraṃ samāpattikkhaṇeva appayogeneva adhigatattā, ṭhitattā ca
tika-s0519t:440: “Sativepullappatto”ti etena appavattamānāyapi satiyā satibahulatāya sato eva nāmāti dasseti. “Yathāparicchinnakālavasenā”ti etena paricchinnasatiyā satoti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:441_1: pāḷi āgatā. Taṃ “pañcaṅgiko sammāsamādhī”ti samādhiaṅgabhāvena paññā uddiṭṭhāti katvā
tika-s0519t:441_2: vuttaṃ. Tato eva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “pītipharaṇatā”tiādīnañca atthasaṃvaṇṇanā katā. Tattha
tika-s0519t:441_3: “so imameva kāyaṃ vivekajena pītisukhena abhisandetī”tiādinā nayena pītiyā, sukhassa
tika-s0519t:442: Samādhivasena samatho uddhaṭoti sabhāvavasena samatho uddhaṭo, na upakārakadhammavasenāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0519t:443_2: sammadeva passantassa na rāgo patiṭṭhaṃ labhatīti aniccānupassanā rāgacaritassa sappāyā
tika-s0519t:443_3: vuttā, tathā saṅkhārānaṃ sabhāvadukkhataṃ sammadeva passantassa pakatiyāpi dukkhitesu
tika-s0519t:443_4: dukkhuppādanaṃ vaṇe khārodakasekasadisanti na doso patiṭṭhaṃ labhatīti dukkhānupassanā
tika-s0519t:443_5: dosacaritassa sappāyā vuttā, tathā saṅkhāresu sammadeva ghanavinibbhoge kate attasuññatāya
tika-s0519t:443_6: upaṭṭhahamānāya na moho patiṭṭhaṃ labhatīti anattānupassanā mohacaritassa sappāyā
tika-s0519t:443_8: vuttaṃ. Esa nayo itaresu. Sesamettha suviññeyyaṃ.
tika-s0519t:444_0: Khantibahulo uppannaṃ aratiṃ anabhiratiṃ abhibhuyya viharanto sukhena samādhiṃ adhigacchatīti
tika-s0519t:444_1: khantippadhānatāpi samathapakkhabhajanassa kāraṇaṃ vuttā. Uṭṭhānaṃ sampajjatīti sampannakāyikavīriyaṃ.
tika-s0519t:444_2: Sammākammantavāyāmānaṃ yo kāyikādivikappo vutto pāḷiyaṃ, so nesaṃ kāyikassa payogassa
tika-s0519t:445_1: iminā vipassanānubhāvena samucchedavimutti vikkhambhanavimutti viya samathānubhāvenāti
tika-s0519t:445_2: dasseti. Lokiyehīti nissakkavacanaṃ. Mahantānanti uḷārānaṃ, paṇītānanti attho.
tika-s0519t:446_0: 56. Tanti vicayahāraṃ. Visaṃvādanahetūnaṃ lobhādīnaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ. Sodhentoti yathā
tika-s0519t:446_1: saraṇādivisayā aññāṇādisaṃkilesā na pavattanti, evaṃ sodhento. Paripūrentāti yathā
tika-s0519t:446_2: sīlaṃ akhaṇḍādibhāvena paripuṇṇaṃ hoti anūnaṃ, evaṃ paripūrentā.
tika-s0519t:447: “Tathā paṭipajjanto”ti iminā satthu mahāpatikārabhāvo paripuṇṇo dassitoti paṭhamavāde “dassanābhūmiñca bhāvanābhūmiñcā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:448: Yassa atthāyāti yassa yassa pahānatthāya. Tathā paṭipannassāti yathā asubhajjhānādiṃ pādakaṃ katvā anāgāmimaggādiadhigamo hoti, tathā paṭipannassa.
tika-s0519t:450_0: “Manussabhūto”ti idaṃ pubbāparāpekkhaṃ katvā “pitā manussabhūto khīṇāsavo”ti ca tathā
tika-s0519t:450_1: “mātā manussabhūtā”ti yojetabbaṃ. Bhedānurūpassa sāvanaṃ anussāvanaṃ, bhedānurūpena
tika-s0519t:451_0: 57. Manussattanti manussajātitā. Liṅgasampattīti purisabhāvo. Hetūti manovacīpaṇidhānasiddhiyā
tika-s0519t:451_1: saddhiṃ pubbahetusampadā. Satthāradassananti satthu sammukhībhāvo. Guṇasampattīti
tika-s0519t:451_2: abhiññāsamāpattilābho. Adhikāroti attano sarīranirapekkhaṃ satthu upakārakaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0519t:452_0: Na uppajjantīti pana atthīti “na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjatī”tiādi imissā
tika-s0519t:452_1: lokadhātuyā ṭhatvā vadantena bhagavatā “kiṃ panāvuso sāriputta, atthetarahi añño
tika-s0519t:452_2: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā bhagavato samasamo sambodhiyanti evaṃ puṭṭho ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-s0519t:452_3: ‘no’ti vadeyya”nti vatvā tassa kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso, yaṃ ekissā
tika-s0519t:452_4: lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā”ti imaṃ suttaṃ dassentena dhammasenāpatināva
tika-s0519t:452_5: buddhakhettabhūtaṃ imaṃ lokadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā aññattha anuppatti vuttā hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0519t:453: Khettapariggaho kato nāma hoti “idaṃ buddhakhettaṃ nāmā”ti.
tika-s0519t:454_0: Evaṃ ṭhānāṭṭhānabhāvaṃ gatāti vuttappakārena ṭhānabhūtā, vuttanayena vā aññepi yathārahaṃ
tika-s0519t:454_1: ṭhānāṭṭhānabhāvena pavattā. Sattapaññattiyā upādānabhūtāti indriyabaddhe khandhe sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0519t:455: 58. Phalassa paccakkhakāritāti “imassa kammassa idaṃ phala”nti taṃtaṃkammaphalāvabodho. Appadānābhāvoti paccayasamavāye kammassa ekantato phaluppādanaṃ. Tenāha “katūpacitāna”nti.
tika-s0519t:456: 59. Ajjhositavatthunāti taṇhābhinivesavasena abhiniviṭṭhavatthunā. Rūpabhavaarūpabhavādināti bhavataṇhā viya sayaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0519t:458: Tatthatatthagāminīti nirayādinibbānanti dvīsu gandhabbaṭṭhānesu tattha tattheva gamanasīlā. Sabbatthagāminīti yathāvuttesu sabbaṭṭhānesu ca gamanasīlā.
tika-s0519t:459_0: Sañjīvo kāḷasuttaṃ saṅghāto roruvo mahāroruvo tāpano mahātāpano avīcīti ete aṭṭha
tika-s0519t:459_1: mahānirayā. Ekekassa cattāri cattāri dvārāni, ekekasmiṃ dvāre cattāro cattāro gūthanirayādayoti
tika-s0519t:460: Sakkasuyāmādiko jeṭṭhakadevarājā. Pajāpativaruṇaīsānādayo viya dutiyādiṭṭhānantarakārako paricārako.
tika-s0519t:461_0: Kilesakāmapakkheti “saṅkappo kāmo, rāgo kāmo, saṅkapparāgo kāmoti ettha vuttasaṅkappavasena
tika-s0519t:461_1: vuttaṃ. Sopi hi vibādhati, upatāpeti cāti kilesattasambhavato kilesakāmo vutto, na
tika-s0519t:461_2: kilesavatthubhāvato. Kāmapaṭisaṃyuttoti kāmarāgasaṅkhātena kāmena sampayutto, kāmapaṭibaddho
tika-s0519t:461_3: vā. Aññesu ca kāmapaṭisaṃyuttesu dhammesu vijjamānesu vitakke eva kāmasaddo dhātusaddo
tika-s0519t:461_4: niruḷhoti veditabbo vitakkassa kāmasaṅkappavuttiyā sātisayattā. Esa nayo byāpādadhātuādīsu.
tika-s0519t:461_5: Parassa, attano ca dukkhāpanaṃ vihiṃsā. Taṃ tu micchāhi vihiṃsā.
tika-s0519t:463_0: 60. Ajjhāsayadhātūti ajjhāsayasabhāvo. Yathā gūthādīnaṃ sabhāvo eso yaṃ gūthādīheva
tika-s0519t:463_1: saṃsandati, evaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayassevesa sabhāvo, yaṃ dussīlādayo dussīlādikeheva saṃsandanti.
tika-s0519t:464_0: Saddhāmūlakattā kusalakiriyāya vuttaṃ “yaṃ saddhāvasenā”tiādi. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “saddhā
tika-s0519t:464_1: bīja”nti. Yaṃ lobhavasena, saddhāvasena ca dosavasena, saddhāvasena ca mohavasena,
tika-s0519t:464_2: saddhāvasena cāti yojetabbaṃ. Vīriyavasenāti sammappadhānavīriyavasena. Paññāvasenāti
tika-s0519t:465_0: Akusalassa kammassa katokāsatāya pāḷiyaṃ vuttattā “vipākāvaraṇena nivuta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:465_1: Taṃ pana nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ kammāvaraṇādīhipi nivutatāya icchitattā. Tathā
tika-s0519t:465_2: hi yathā devadattaṃ kokālikaṃ sunakkhattaṃ licchaviputtanti udāhaṭaṃ, yadipi bhagavā
tika-s0519t:465_3: paṭivedhassa aṭṭhānataṃ disvā nibbedhabhāgiyadesanaṃ na deseti, vāsanābhāgiyaṃ pana
tika-s0519t:465_5: ādisaddena saccakādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tassāpi bhagavā anāgate vāsanatthāya dhammaṃ
tika-s0519t:465_6: desesi. Satthā hi “anāgate tambapaṇṇidīpe sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhahissatī”ti tatthāyaṃ kulaghare
tika-s0519t:465_7: nibbatto pabbajitvā kāḷabuddharakkhitatthero nāma pabhinnapaṭisambhido mahākhīṇāsavo
tika-s0519t:465_8: bhavissatīti idaṃ disvā dhammaṃ desesi, so ca tathā ahosīti.
tika-s0519t:466_0: Asampuṇṇeti ekantato vipākadānasamatthatāvasena pāripūriṃ anupagate. Diṭṭhupanissayadiṭṭhisahagatassa
tika-s0519t:466_1: kammaṃ sandhāya “kamme asampuṇṇe”ti vuttaṃ. Tenāha “kilesantarāya missakaṃ kammantarāyaṃ dassetvā”ti.
tika-s0519t:467_0: 61. Diṭṭhi panettha padhānabhāvena pāḷiyaṃ gahitā sīlabbataparāmāsassa adhippetattā.
tika-s0519t:467_1: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “yathā puṇṇañca govatikaṃ, acelañca kukkuravatika”nti. Asampuṇṇattā
