tika-s0519t:467_2: eva hi tassa micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānassa tesaṃ bhagavā “cattārimāni, puṇṇa, kammānī”tiādinā
tika-s0519t:467_3: dhammaṃ desesi. Tāya ca desanāya te taṃ diṭṭhiṃ paṭinissajjitvā sammatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
tika-s0519t:468_0: 62. Paguṇatāya vodānaṃ paguṇavodānaṃ. Tadeva paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhahitvā dutiyajjhānādiadhigamassa
tika-s0519t:468_1: paccayattā vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma hotīti āha “vuṭṭhānaṃ paguṇavodāna”nti. Bhavaṅgavuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0519t:468_2: bhavaṅguppatti. Bhavaṅgacitte hi uppanne taṃsamaṅgisamāpattito vuṭṭhito nāma hoti.
tika-s0519t:469_0: Idaṃ vuṭṭhānanti idaṃ yathāvuttaṃ kosallaṃ vuṭṭhānahetubhāvato vuṭṭhānaṃ. Tathā hi
tika-s0519t:469_1: vuttaṃ “vodānampi tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhāna”nti. Imāya pana vuṭṭhānapāḷiyā
tika-s0519t:469_3: vuttaṃ. Ye pana “nirodhato phalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhāna”nti pāḷiyaṃ natthīti vadeyyuṃ,
tika-s0519t:470_0: 63. Ayaṃ cassa āsayoti ettha āsayajānanādinā yehi indriyehi yehi paroparehi sattā
tika-s0519t:470_1: kalyāṇapāpāsayādikā honti, tesaṃ pajānanaṃ vibhāvetīti veditabbaṃ. Evañca katvā indriyaparopariyattaāsayānusayañāṇānaṃ
tika-s0519t:470_2: visuṃ asādhāraṇatā, indriyaparopariyattanānādhimuttikatāñāṇānaṃ visuṃ balatā ca siddhā hoti.
tika-s0519t:471: Thāmagatoti ettha thāmagamanaṃ nāma aññesaṃ asādhāraṇo kāmarāgādīnaṃ eva āveṇiko sabhāvo veditabbo, yato “thāmagato anusayaṃ pajahatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:472_1: bhagavato ñāṇaṃ, manasikārapaṭibaddhaṃ buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇa”ntiādi. Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ
tika-s0519t:472_2: viya hi sabbaṃ bhagavato ñāṇaṃ parikammanirapekkhanti.
tika-s0519t:473_0: 64. Upakkilesavimuttattāti ettha cittādi eva upakkilesā, nibbattakassa vā kammassa
tika-s0519t:473_3: Dibbasadisattāti dibbe bhavanti dibbaṃ, yathāvuttaṃ pasādacakkhu, dibbaṃ viyāti dibbaṃ,
tika-s0519t:473_4: aggataṃ abhiññāṇaṃ. Dibbavihāro cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni. Tesaṃ vasena nibbattitvā
tika-s0519t:473_5: paṭiladdhabbattā dibbaṃ, tena dibbahetukattā dibbanti vuttanti dasseti. Dibbavihārasannissitattāti
tika-s0519t:473_6: rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānena nissayapaccayena nibbattattā, tena dibbanissitaṃ dibbanti
tika-s0519t:473_7: dasseti. Divusaddaṃ akkharacintakā kīḷādīsu paṭhantīti vuttaṃ “taṃ sabbaṃ saddasatthānusārena
tika-s0519t:473_8: veditabba”nti. Purimā hi tayo atthā kīḷatthassa vasena, itare jutigatiatthavaseneva dassitāti.
tika-s0519t:474_0: Manussūpacāranti manussagocaraṃ. Daṭṭhuṃ na sakkā ittarakhaṇattā khaṇapaccuppannassa.
tika-s0519t:474_3: nissandaphalatañca dasseti. Dibbacakkhussa pādakaṃ etesanti dibbacakkhupādakāni.
tika-s0519t:474_4: Tena vuttaṃ “dibbacakkhunā saheva ijjhantī”ti. Tāni hissa paribhaṇḍañāṇāni.
tika-s0519t:475_0: Samādīyantīti samādānāni, kammāni samādānāni etesanti kammasamādānā. Samādātabbanānāvidhakammāti
tika-s0519t:475_1: attho purime atthe, dutiye pana kammāni samādāpentīti kammasamādānā, micchādiṭṭhiyā
tika-s0519t:476_0: Taṃ vācanti taṃ ariyānaṃ upavadanavācaṃ. Taṃ cittanti samuṭṭhāpakacittaṃ. Taṃ diṭṭhinti
tika-s0519t:476_1: yena micchāgāhena ariye anuddhaṃseti, micchābhinivesaṃ. Ayampettha attho – yathā
tika-s0519t:476_2: nāma hetusampannassa bhikkhuno visuddhaṃ sīlaṃ, samādhiñca sampādetvā ṭhitassa dandho
tika-s0519t:476_3: satuppādo khippābhiññāya diṭṭheva dhamme aññā, sati vā upādisese anāgāmitā. Evamevaṃ
tika-s0519t:476_4: yo ariyūpavādī yathāvuttacittadiṭṭhīhi apakkamitvā appatirūpaṃ sabhāvaṃ “mayā, bhante,
tika-s0519t:476_5: tumhākaṃ upari vutta’nti accayadesanāya te na khamāpeti, so kāyassa bhedā niraye
tika-s0519t:476_6: evāti. Tesu pasannacittassa khamāpanañhettha tesaṃ vācādīnaṃ pahānaṃ paṭinissaggova.
tika-s0519t:476_7: Ito sāvajjataraṃ nāma aññaṃ natthi sabbānatthavidhānato, sabbahitasukhaparidhaṃsanato ca.
tika-s0519t:477_0: Kāyassa bhedāti idha kāyasaddo attabhāvapariyāyoti āha “upādinnakkhandhapariccāgā”ti.
tika-s0519t:477_1: Tadanantaranti tassa maraṇasaṅkhātassa khandhapariccāgassa anantaraṃ. Abhinibbattakkhandhattho
tika-s0519t:477_2: parasaddo, anorimabhūtavatthuvisayo vā siyā, avadhivisesanamattaṃ vā. Tesu purimaṃ
tika-s0519t:478: Vuttavipariyāyenāti “suṭṭhu caritaṃ, sobhanaṃ vā carita”ntiādinā. Hanananti ghātanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:479_2: kammavipākassa vibhāgo. Appetuṃ na sakkoti aṭṭhamanavamabalāni viya, taṃsadisaṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ
tika-s0519t:479_3: viya vikubbituṃ, etenassa balasadisatañca nivāreti. Jhānādiñāṇaṃ viya vā appetuṃ,
tika-s0519t:479_4: vikubbituñca. Yadipi hi jhānādipaccavekkhaṇāñāṇaṃ idha chaṭṭhaṃ balanti tassa savitakkasavicāratā
tika-s0519t:479_5: vuttā, tathāpi jhānādīhi vinā paccavekkhaṇā natthīti jhānādisahagataṃ ñāṇaṃ tadantogadhaṃ
tika-s0519t:479_6: katvā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Atha vā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ jhānādikiccaṃ viya na sabbaṃ balakiccaṃ
tika-s0519t:479_7: kātuṃ sakkotīti dassetuṃ “jhānaṃ hutvā appetuṃ, iddhi hutvā vikubbituñca na sakkotī”ti
tika-s0519t:479_8: vuttaṃ, na pana kassaci balassa jhānaiddhibhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:482_0: 65. Paṭipakkhapaṭibāḷhā kusalā dhammā uppajjitumeva na sakkonti, uppannāpi sammadeva
tika-s0519t:482_1: attano kiccaṃ kātuṃ asamatthatāya anuppannasadisāti paṭipakkhanivāraṇena kusalānaṃ
tika-s0519t:482_2: dhammānaṃ kiccakaraṇabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “manacchaṭṭhāni…pe… bhavissatī”ti vuttaṃ. Viharantassāti
tika-s0519t:482_3: viharaṇahetu. Viharantoti etthāpi eseva nayo, tena rakkhitacittatā vuttanayena ekantato
tika-s0519t:482_4: sammāsaṅkappagocaratāya ca saṃvattatīti dasseti. Vuttanayenāti micchāsaṅkappānaṃ
tika-s0519t:482_7: sammādiṭṭhi bhavissatī”tiādīsu attho yuttiyā yutto eva anarūpakāraṇabhāvato.
tika-s0519t:485_0: 66. Yasmā vā saṃkilesato rakkhitacittassa tīṇi sucaritāni pāripūriṃ gacchanti, tasmā
tika-s0519t:485_1: rakkhitacittassāti ettha yāyaṃ rakkhitacittatā, sā kāyasucaritādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sucaritānaṃ
tika-s0519t:485_2: padaṭṭhānanti evamettha attho veditabbo. Attādhīnanti attaparādhīnaṃ.
tika-s0519t:486: Tato evāti kāraṇaggahaṇena phalassa gahitattā eva.
tika-s0519t:488_0: 73-4. Pāḷiyaṃ pañcindriyāni tīhi khandhehi saṅgahitānīti ettha saddhāvīriyasatindriyehi
tika-s0519t:488_1: pātimokkhādi tividhaṃ sīlaṃ gahitaṃ sodhetabbattā. Tesanti tehi sīlakkhandho saṅgahito.
tika-s0519t:488_2: Samādhipaññindriyehi samādhipaññākkhandhā gahitāti pākaṭoyamattho, tathā sesampīti
tika-s0519t:492_0: Idāni yasmā suttesu hārānaṃ yojanānayadassanattā hārasampātadesanā hāravibhaṅgadesanā
tika-s0519t:492_1: viya na hārasarūpamattadassanattā, tasmā peṭakopadese āgatanayānusārena aparehi vipariyāyehi
tika-s0519t:492_3: alobhādosalobhadosāpi paramparabhāvena pavattanti nidānabhāvatoti dassento “cha dhammā…pe…
tika-s0519t:492_4: mūlānī”ti āha. Yathā ca nidānabhāvena pubbaṅgamatā, evaṃ attano vasevattanenāpi pubbaṅgamatā
tika-s0519t:492_5: labbhatevāti vuttaṃ “sādhipatikānaṃ adhipati, sabbacittuppādānaṃ indriyānī”ti. Alobhassāti
tika-s0519t:495_0: Tesu idha kusalā dhammā adhippetā. Tena vuttaṃ “kusalacchandenā”ti. Nekkhammacchandena
tika-s0519t:495_1: upanissayabhūtena, na adhipatibhūtena. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – alobhappadhāno ce cittuppādo
tika-s0519t:495_2: hoti, nekkhammacchandena upanissayabhūtena mano tassa pubbaṅgamo hoti. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.
tika-s0519t:496_0: Yadaggena tesaṃ dhammānaṃ mano pubbaṅgamaṃ, tadaggena tesaṃ jeṭṭhaṃ, padhānañcāti
tika-s0519t:496_1: vuttaṃ “manoseṭṭhāti mano tesaṃ dhammāna”ntiādi. Manomayatā manena katādibhāvo, so
tika-s0519t:496_2: ca manassa tesaṃ sahajātādinā paccayabhāvo evāti vuttaṃ “manomayāti…pe… paccayo”ti.
tika-s0519t:496_3: Te panāti ettha pana-saddo visesatthadīpako, tenetaṃ dasseti – yadipi tesaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-s0519t:496_4: chandādayopi paccayā eva, indriyādipaccayena pana savisesaṃ paccayabhūtassa manasseva
tika-s0519t:496_6: sammā uddhamuddhaṃ nītā, tato samudāgatāti attho. Tato eva nekkhammavitakkādito samuppannattā
tika-s0519t:496_8: “Phuṭṭho, bhikkhave, vedeti, phuṭṭho sañjānāti, phuṭṭho cetetī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Idaṃ
tika-s0519t:496_9: manokammanti kāyaṅgavācaṅgacopanaṃ akatvā saddhāsamannāgatena pasannena manasā pavattaṃ
tika-s0519t:496_10: idaṃ kusalaṃ manokammaṃ. Taṃ pana anabhijjhāsahagataṃ, abyāpādasahagataṃ, sammādiṭṭhisahagatanti tividhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0519t:497_0: Bhāsatīti avisaṃvādanādinā vācaṅgacopanāvasena pavattentiyā vacīviññattiyā sādhetabbaṃ
tika-s0519t:497_1: sādhetīti attho, tena kāyadvārato pavattakusalavacīkammampi saṅgahitaṃ hoti. Tathā
tika-s0519t:497_2: hi vakkhati “vacīviññattivipphārato, tathā sādiyanato ca bhāsatī”ti. Sabbampi vacīkammaṃ
tika-s0519t:497_3: saccādivasena catubbidhaṃ. Karotīti attano, paresañca hitāhitāni kāraṇākāraṇehi kāyaṅgacopanāvasena
tika-s0519t:497_4: pavattentiyā kāyaviññattiyā sādhetabbaṃ sādhetīti attho, tena vacīdvārato pavattakusalakāyakammampi
tika-s0519t:497_5: saṅgahitaṃ hoti. Tathā ca vakkhati “kāyaviññattivipphārato, tathā sādiyanato ca karotī”ti.
tika-s0519t:497_6: Kammapathavasena gayhamāne pāṇātipātādivasena taṃ tividhaṃ hoti. Tenāha “iti dasakusalakammapathādassitā”ti.
tika-s0519t:497_7: Dasapuññakiriyavatthuvasenāpi gāthāya attho yujjati. Tathā hi vakkhati “so pasannacitto”tiādi.
tika-s0519t:497_8: Bhāsati vā karoti vā kevalaṃ manasā pavattatīti aniyamattho vā-saddo. Tathā ceva saṃvaṇṇitaṃ.
tika-s0519t:498_1: vā dasapuññakiriyavatthusaṅkhātassa kusalakammassa. Nanu tattha dānādimayaṃ tividhameva
tika-s0519t:498_2: puññakiriyavatthu vuttanti? Saccaṃ, taṃ pana itaresaṃ tadantogadhattā.
tika-s0519t:499_0: “Sukhamanvetī”ti saṅkhepena vuttaṃ sukhānugamaṃ vitthārena dassento “idhassu puriso”tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:499_1: Tattha evaṃ santanti evaṃ bhūtaṃ, appahīnānusayo hutvā sukhavedanīyaphassasambhūtanti attho.
tika-s0519t:500_0: Tattha “yaṃ mano”tiādinā gāthātthavasena catusaccaṃ niddhāreti. Ādito vavatthāpitesu
tika-s0519t:500_1: khandhādīsu khandhamukhena saccānaṃ kathitattā sattānaṃ bhinnarucibhāvato nānānayehi
tika-s0519t:500_3: niddhāretabbānī”ti. Saccamukhena assādādike niddhāretvā desanāhārasampātaṃ yojetuṃ
tika-s0519t:500_4: “tattha samudayenā”tiādimāha, taṃ vuttanayameva. Yañhettha aññampi atthato na vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0519t:500_5: taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā, uttānatthattā cāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:501_0: Mananalakkhaṇeti mananalakkhaṇahetu. “Mananalakkhaṇenā”ti vā pāṭho. Īhābhāvato byāpārābhāvato.
tika-s0519t:501_1: Yena pasādena samannāgatattā mano “pasanno”ti vutto, tassa pasādassa kiccaṃ mane
tika-s0519t:501_2: āropetvā āha “akālusiyato, ārammaṇassa okappanato ca pasannenā”ti. Tathā sādiyanatoti
tika-s0519t:501_3: vācāya vattabbaṃ avatvāva phassasādiyanato anujānato. Dutiye tathā sādiyanatoti kāyena
tika-s0519t:501_4: kātabbaṃ yathā kataṃ hoti, tathā vācāya saṃvidhānato. Tathā pasutattāti yathā sukhamanveti,
tika-s0519t:501_5: tathā upacitattā evāti attho. Tatoti tato kāraṇā, manasā pasannena, bhāsanena, karaṇena
tika-s0519t:501_6: ca hetunāti vuttaṃ hoti. Anaññatthāti etasmiṃ pana atthe. Tatoti tato eva. Yo hi
tika-s0519t:501_7: pasannamano tena yaṃ bhāsanaṃ, karaṇañca, tato eva naṃ sukhamanvetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0519t:501_8: Sātabhāvatoti sātavedanābhāvato. Iṭṭhabhāvatoti manāpabhāvato. Kammato vipākuppattiphaladānasamatthabhāvena
tika-s0519t:501_9: kammassa nibbattattā vipākasseva anibbattattāti āha “katū…pe… anvetīti vutta”nti
tika-s0519t:501_10: kāraṇāyatta vuttitoti katabhāvahetukattā kammassāti adhippāyo. Asaṅkantitoti yasmiṃ
tika-s0519t:502_1: manassa vasena pubbaṅgamatā idhādhippetā. Tato evāti ādhipaccayogato eva. Manassāti
tika-s0519t:502_2: upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ. Tesaṃ dhammānanti sambandho. Kusalabhāvo yujjati pasādassa
tika-s0519t:502_3: yonisomanasikārahetukattā. Nanu vibhajjabyākaraṇesu tesaṃ sāvakānaṃ saddhā uppajjatīti?
tika-s0519t:502_4: Nāyaṃ saddhā, tadākārā pana akusalā dhammā tathā vuccantīti veditabbaṃ. Tathā hi
tika-s0519t:502_5: vakkhati “nāyaṃ pasādo”tiādi. Sukhaṃ anvetīti yujjati kammassa phaladāne samatthabhāvato.
tika-s0519t:502_6: Yathā hi kataṃ kammaṃ phaladānasamatthaṃ hoti, tathā kataṃ upacitanti vuccatīti.
tika-s0519t:503_0: Manopavicārā idha nekkhammasitā somanassūpavicārā, upekkhūpavicārā ca veditabbā kusalādhikārattā.
tika-s0519t:503_1: Te pana yasmā cittaṃ nissāyeva pavattanti, nānissāya, tasmā vuttaṃ “mano manopavicārānaṃ
tika-s0519t:503_2: padaṭṭhāna”nti. Kusalapakkhassa padaṭṭhānanti ettha kusalo tāva phasso kusalassa
tika-s0519t:503_3: vedanākkhandhassa saññākkhandhassa saṅkhārakkhandhassa sahajātādinā paccayo hoti.
tika-s0519t:503_4: “Phuṭṭho, bhikkhave, vedeti, phuṭṭho sañjānāti, phuṭṭho cetetī”ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ vedanādīnampi
tika-s0519t:503_5: veditabbaṃ. Saddhādīnampi paccayabhāve vattabbameva natthi. Sabbassāti catubhūmakassa.
tika-s0519t:503_6: Kāmāvacarā hi kusalā dhammā yathārahaṃ catubhūmakassāpi kusalassa paccayā honti,
tika-s0519t:504_0: “Pasannena manasā bhāsatī”ti vuttattā visesato sammāvācāpaccayaṃ bhāsanaṃ idhādhippetanti
tika-s0519t:504_1: vuttaṃ “bhāsatīti sammāvācā”ti. Tatthāyamadhippāyo “bhāsatīti yamidaṃ padaṃ, iminā
tika-s0519t:504_2: sammāvācā gahitā hotī”ti. Karotīti sammākammantoti etthāpi eseva nayo. Suparisuddhe
tika-s0519t:504_3: kāyavacīkamme ṭhitassa ājīvapārisuddhi, na itarassāti vuttaṃ “te sammāājīvassa padaṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-s0519t:504_4: Tattha teti sammāvācākammantā. Yasmā pana ājīvaṭṭhamake sīle patiṭṭhitassa uppannānuppannānaṃ
tika-s0519t:504_6: ca sambhavanti, tathā sammāvāyāme ṭhitasseva kāyādīsu subhasaññādividdhaṃsinī sammāsati
tika-s0519t:504_8: saddhāsādhano ca soti āha “taṃ sīlassa padaṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-s0519t:507_0: Ayaṃ āvaṭṭoti ayaṃ sabhāgavisabhāgadhammāvaṭṭanavasena āvaṭṭo. Ettha hi kusalamūlasammattamaggādiniddhāraṇā
tika-s0519t:508_0: Vibhattihāre padaṭṭhānabhūmivibhāgā vuttanayā, suviññeyyā cāti dhammavibhāgameva
tika-s0519t:508_2: neyyatthataṃ vatvā “yohī”tiādinā taṃ vivarati. “Dukkhameva anvetī”ti kasmā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0519t:508_3: nanu yattha katthaci hitesitā kusalamevāti? Nayidamīdisaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, adhammaṃ
tika-s0519t:508_4: pana dhammoti, dhammañca pana adhammoti dīpanena lokassa sabbānatthabījabhūtesu sakalahitasukhupāyapaṭikkhepakesu
tika-s0519t:508_6: Yo hi loke appamattakampi puññaṃ kātukāmaṃ pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nissāya paṭibāhati, sopi
tika-s0519t:508_7: gārayho, kimaṅgaṃ pana ariyavinaye sammāpaṭipattiṃ paṭibāhantesūti dukkhaphalāva
tika-s0519t:508_8: tattha sambhāvanāpasaṃsā payirupāsanā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ – “na kho ahaṃ, moghapurisa,
tika-s0519t:508_9: arahattassa maccharāyāmi, apica tuyhevetaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ…pe… dīgharattaṃ ahitāya
tika-s0519t:508_10: dukkhāya saṃvattatī”ti, “yo nindiyaṃ pasaṃsati, sabbassāpi anatthassa mūlaṃ bālūpasevanā”ti ca.
tika-s0519t:509: Idañhi suttanti “manopubbaṅgamā…pe…pada”nti paṭhamaṃ gāthaṃ sandhāya vadati. Etassāti saṃvaṇṇiyamānasuttassa.
tika-s0519t:510: Kiccapaññattīti adhipatipaccayasaṅkhātassa kiccassa paññāpanaṃ. Padhānapaññattīti padhānabhāvassa paññāpanā. Sahajātapaññattīti tesaṃ dhammānaṃ manasā sahabhāvapaññāpanā.
tika-s0519t:511: Mahābhūtātīti itisaddo ādiattho, tena mahābhūtāvinābhāvī sabbo rūpadhammo saṅgayhati.
tika-s0519t:513_0: Ekattatāti manopubbaṅgamādisāmaññaṃ sandhāya vadati. Evaṃ sesesupi. Vemattatā “manopubbaṅgamā”tiādinā
tika-s0519t:513_1: sāmaññato vuttadhamme pasādo dhāraṇāya nivattetvā pasannasaṅkhāte visese avaṭṭhāpanato.
tika-s0519t:513_2: Sesesupi eseva nayo. Pasādo sinehasabhāvo, assaddhiyaṃ viya lūkhasabhāvaṃ dosaṃ vinodetīti
tika-s0519t:514_1: Iṭṭhārammaṇādayoti ādisaddena iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇā, dvāradhammā, manasikāroti evamādīnaṃ
tika-s0519t:514_2: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tathā phassoti yathā vedanādīnaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇādayo paccayo, evaṃ
tika-s0519t:514_3: phassopīti paccayatāsāmaññameva upasaṃharati tathā-saddo. Vedanādīnanti hi vedanādayo
tika-s0519t:514_4: tayo khandhā gahitā. Viññāṇassa vedanādayoti nāmarūpaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0519t:515_0: “Sīlamayassa adoso padaṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ khantipadhānattā sīlassa. Adhiṭṭhātīti anuyuñjati
tika-s0519t:515_1: uppādeti. Soti evaṃ kusalacittaṃ bhāvento. “Anuppannāna”ntiādinā bhāvanāpahānasamāropanāni
tika-s0519t:515_2: dassento nibbedhabhāgiyavasena gāthāya atthaṃ vicinitvā samāropeti, evampi sakkā
tika-s0519t:516: Evaṃ “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti gāthāya vasena hārasampātayojanāvidhiṃ dassetvā idāni gāthāntarena dassetuṃ “tathā dadato puñña”ntiādimāha. Tattha bhāvanāmayanti paññābhāvanāmayaṃ.
tika-s0519t:517: “Alobho kusalamūla”ntiādi dānādīnaṃ alobhādipadhānattā vuttaṃ, sabbattha ca “vutta”nti padaṃ ānetvā yojetabbaṃ. Tesanti rāgādīnaṃ. Nissaraṇanti ca parinibbānameva sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0519t:518_0: Pariccāgasīlo alobhajjhāsayo kāmesu ādīnavadassāvī sammadeva sīlaṃ paripūretīti āha
tika-s0519t:518_1: “dadato…pe… padaṭṭhāna”nti. Idha oḷārikā nāma kilesā vītikkamāvatthānaṃ, tappahānaṃ
tika-s0519t:518_2: tadaṅgappahānena veditabbaṃ. Majjhimānanti pariyuṭṭhānāvatthānaṃ. Sukhumānanti anusayāvatthānaṃ.
tika-s0519t:519_0: Dadatoti maggasahagatena alobhena sadevakassa lokassa abhayadānaṃ dadato. Puññanti
tika-s0519t:519_2: maggasaṃyamena saṃyamantassa. Veranti pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ. Kusaloti maggasammādiṭṭhiyā
tika-s0519t:519_3: kusalo vicakkhaṇo. Jahāti pāpakanti tehi tehi maggehi taṃ taṃ pahātabbaṃ pāpadhammaṃ
tika-s0519t:520: “Dadato”tiādinā pubbe avibhāgena kusalamūlāni uddhaṭānīti idāni vibhāgena tāni uddharanto “lokiyakusalamūla”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:521: Puthujjanabhūmi sekkhabhūmi dassitā pahānassa vippakatabhāvadīpanato. Asekkhabhūmi dassitā anupādāparinibbānadīpanato.
tika-s0519t:523: Puññe kathite puññaphalampi kathitameva hotīti vuttaṃ “dadato…pe… desanamāhā”ti. Saccakammaṭṭhānena vinā saṃkilesappahānaṃ natthīti dassento āha “kusalo…pe… desanamāhā”ti.
tika-s0519t:524_0: Verasaddo adinnādānādipāpadhammesupi niruḷhoti vuttaṃ “evaṃ sabbānipi sikkhāpadāni
tika-s0519t:524_2: ca. Tathā hi vakkhati “nibbutoti dve nibbānadhātuyo”tiādi.
tika-s0519t:525_0: Kāraṇūpacārena, kāraṇaggahaṇena vā phalaṃ gahitanti āha “dve sugatiyo”tiādi. Vaṭṭavivaṭṭasampattiyo
tika-s0519t:525_1: imissā desanāya phalaṃ, tassa dānaṃ sīlaṃ bhāvanā upāyo, “sampattidvayaṃ icchantena
tika-s0519t:525_2: dānādīsu appamattena bhavitabba”nti ayamettha bhagavato āṇattīti imamatthaṃ sandhāyāha
tika-s0519t:526_0: Vicayoti vicayahārasampāto, so vuccatīti attho. Esa nayo ito paresupi. “Tividhampi
tika-s0519t:526_1: dānamaya”ntiādinā padatthavicayaṃ dasseti, tena assādādayo, itare ca vicayahārapadatthā
tika-s0519t:526_2: atthato vicitā eva hontīti. Rūpādiārammaṇassa pariccāgo vuttoti sambandho. Sabboti
tika-s0519t:527_0: Dānābhiratassa cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ pāripūriṃ gacchatīti vuttaṃ “dadato…pe… padaṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-s0519t:527_1: Viratisacce, vacīsacce ca tiṭṭhato saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ pāripūriṃ gacchatīti vuttaṃ “saṃyama…pe…
tika-s0519t:527_2: padaṭṭhāna”nti. Kosallayogato ca pāpappahānato ca paññāpāripūriṃ gacchatīti vuttaṃ
tika-s0519t:527_3: “kusalo…pe… padaṭṭhāna”nti. Anavasesarāgādīsu pahīnesu upasamo upaṭṭhito nāma hotīti
tika-s0519t:528_0: Kusaloti puggalādhiṭṭhānena kosallasammādiṭṭhi vuttāti āha “kusalo…pe… maggaṅgādibhāvena
tika-s0519t:528_1: ekalakkhaṇattā”ti. Ādisaddena bodhipakkhiyabhāvādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Khepetabbabhāvenāti pahātabbabhāvena.
tika-s0519t:529_0: Averatanti asapattataṃ. Kusaladhammehīti anavajjadhammehi, phalanibbānehīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0519t:529_1: Dānassa mahapphalatā, sīlādiguṇehi satthu anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvo, anupādāparinibbānanti
tika-s0519t:529_2: imesaṃ paccavekkhaṇā imassa dānassa nidānanti ayamattho pāḷiyaṃ niruḷhova. Nibbacananidānasandhayo
tika-s0519t:530_0: Paṭipakkhaniddesena samudayoti desanatthaṃ paṭipakkhaniddesanena niddhārito ayaṃ
tika-s0519t:530_1: macchariyādisaṃkilesapakkhiko samudayo. Alobhena…pe… dānādīhīti yehi alobhādīhi dānādayo
tika-s0519t:530_2: dhammā sambhavanti, tāni dānādiggahaṇeneva gahitānīti kusalamūlāni niddhāreti “imāni
tika-s0519t:531_0: Bhayahetu deti paṇṇākārādivasena. Rāgahetu deti sabhāgavatthussa. Āmisakiñcikkhahetu
tika-s0519t:531_1: deti lañjādivasena. Anukampanto vā karuṇākhette. Apacayamāno guṇakhette, upakārakhette
tika-s0519t:531_2: vā. Bhayūparatoti bhayena orato. Tena tathārūpena saṃyamena veraṃ na ciyateva. Evaṃ
tika-s0519t:532: “Dadato”tiādinā yathā dānapaṭikkhepena parivattanaṃ dassitaṃ, evaṃ pahānapaṭikkhepenapi parivattanaṃ dassetabbanti vuttaṃ “akusalo pana na jahātī”ti.
tika-s0519t:533_0: Kammaphalaṃ saddahanto dānakiriyāyaṃ padahanto yena vidhinā dānaṃ dātabbaṃ, tattha
tika-s0519t:533_1: satiṃ upaṭṭhapento cittaṃ samādahanto sammādiṭṭhiṃ purakkharonto dāne sammāpaṭipanno
tika-s0519t:534_1: dassetuṃ “taṃ sīlassa padaṭṭhāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyaṃ. Aññañca yadettha
tika-s0519t:534_2: atthato na vibhattaṃ, taṃ vuttanayattā, uttānatthattā cāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:537_1: Tattha nayatoti nayaggāhato. Na hi paṭivedhañāṇaṃ viya vipassanāñāṇaṃ paccakkhato
tika-s0519t:537_2: pavattatīti. Anubujjhiyamānoti abhisamayañāṇassa anurūpaṃ bujjhiyamāno. Yathā ekapaṭivedheneva
tika-s0519t:537_3: maggañāṇaṃ pavattati, evaṃ tadanucchavikaṃ vipassanāñāṇena gayhamānoti attho. Evañca
tika-s0519t:537_4: katvā nandiyāvaṭṭādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ atthanayabhāvo samatthito hotīti. Tathā hi atthavisesasarūpatāya
tika-s0519t:537_5: tayo nayā “suttattho”ti vuttā, padatthavicārabhāvepi pana hārā “byañjanavicayo”ti.
tika-s0519t:537_6: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ tayoti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “paṭivijjhantānaṃ panā”tiādi. Tattha ekameko
tika-s0519t:537_7: saṃkilesavodānānaṃ vibhāgato dvisaṅgahoti yojanā. Catuchaaṭṭhadiso cāti na paccekaṃ
tika-s0519t:537_8: te nandiyāvaṭṭādayo catuchaaṭṭhadisā, atha kho yathākkamanti. “Eva”ntiādi yathāvuttassa atthassa nigamanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:538_0: Tathā cāti yathāvuttassa atthassa upacayena samatthanā. Pubbā koṭi na paññāyatīti
tika-s0519t:538_1: ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato paṭṭhānakathāyaṃ āvi bhavissati. “Andhaṃ tamaṃ tadā
tika-s0519t:538_2: hoti, yaṃ lobho sahate nara”ntiādi vacanato kāmataṇhāpi paṭicchādanasabhāvā, yato
tika-s0519t:538_3: kāmacchandaṃ “nīvaraṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Avijjāya pana bhavesu ādīnavappaṭicchādanaṃ sātisayanti.
tika-s0519t:538_4: Tathā avijjāpi saṃyojanasabhāvā, yato sā bahiddhā saṃyojanabhāvena vuttā. Evaṃ santepi
tika-s0519t:538_5: taṇhāya bandhanaṭṭho sātisayo apekkhitabhāvatoti imamatthaṃ dassento “tathāpi…pe… vutta”nti āha.
tika-s0519t:539_1: etena avijjāya ayāthāvagahaṇahetutaṃ dasseti, tato so avindiyaṃ vindatīti avijjāti
tika-s0519t:539_2: vuccati. Kilissanaṃ upatāpananti āha “kilissanappayogaṃ attaparitāpanapaṭipatti”nti. Allīyanaṃ sevanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:540_0: Dukkhanti …pe… jānantīti attanā anubhūyamānaṃ tathā tathā upaṭṭhitaṃ kāyikacetasikadukkhaṃ,
tika-s0519t:540_1: itarampi vā ekadesaṃ jānanti. Taṇhāyapi eseva nayo. Sabhāgavisabhāgapaṭipajjitabbākārato
tika-s0519t:540_2: tattha tesaṃ ñāṇaṃ natthevātidassento “idaṃ dukkha”ntiādimāha. Pavattipavattihetumattampīti
tika-s0519t:540_3: “pavatti pavattihetū”ti ettakampi. Kā pana kathāti pacurajanasādhāraṇe lokiyepi nāma
tika-s0519t:540_4: atthe yesaṃ ñāṇassa paṭighāto, paramagambhīre ariyānaṃ eva visayabhūte lokuttare
tika-s0519t:540_5: nivattinivattihetusaṅkhāte atthe kā nāma kathā, chinnā kathāti attho. Aṭṭhasamāpattipabhedassa
tika-s0519t:540_6: kevalassa samathassa tādise kāle bāhirakānañca ijjhanato “vipassanādhiṭṭhāna”nti
tika-s0519t:541: “Saṃsārassa anupacchedanato”ti idaṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ diṭṭhigatikamatadassanaṃ. So hi puttamukhadassane asati saṃsāro ucchijjeyyāti bhāyati. Yato vuttaṃ –
tika-s0519t:543: Ete abhayaṃ bhāyanti, sammūḷhā caturo janā”ti. ;
tika-s0519t:544: Tadabhiññāti taṃ yathāvuttaantadvayaṃ abhijānanti guṇaṃ āropetvā jānantīti tadabhiññā. Atthabhañjanato, rogagaṇḍasallasadisatāya attabhāvasaṃkilesānañca rogagaṇḍasallatā.
tika-s0519t:545_0: Sakkāyadassaneti ettha diṭṭhidassanaṃ, sakkāyova dassanaṃ sakkāyadassananti attho
tika-s0519t:545_1: veditabbo. Tesanti diṭṭhicaritānaṃ. Attābhiniveso balavā. Tasmā yathāupaṭṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ
tika-s0519t:545_2: “attā”icceva gaṇhantīti adhippāyo. Tathā vedanādiṃ. Taṇhācarito pana yathāupaṭṭhitaṃ
tika-s0519t:545_3: rūpaṃ taṇhāvatthuṃ katvā attaniyābhinivesena abhinivisantā tadaññameva attato samanupassanti.
tika-s0519t:545_4: Evaṃ vedanādīsu. Tenāha “taṇhācaritā”tiādi. Vijjamāneti paramatthato upalabbhamāne.
tika-s0519t:545_5: Kāyeti samūhe. Diṭṭhiyā parikappito attādi eva paramatthato nupalabbhati, diṭṭhi
tika-s0519t:550_0: 81. Ettāvatā nandiyāvaṭṭassa bhūmiracanavasena saṃkilesapakkho dassitoti āha “tattha
tika-s0519t:550_1: diṭṭhicaritotiādinā vodānapakkhaṃ dassetī”ti. “Yasmā sallekhe tibbagāravo”ti iminā
tika-s0519t:550_2: tattha tibbagāravattā saṃlekhānusantatavuttinā bhavatīti dasseti. Sesesupi eseva
tika-s0519t:552_0: Ye hi kecīti ettha hi-saddo nipātamattaṃ. “Imāhi eva catūhi paṭipadāhī”tipi pāḷi.
tika-s0519t:552_1: Dukkhāpaṭipadādivibhāgena maggo eva idha vuttoti āha “paṭipadā hi maggo”ti catuddisāsaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0519t:552_2: magganti catuddisāsaṅkhātaṃ pavattanupāyaṃ. Dve disā etissāti dvidisā. Nandiyāvaṭṭassāti
tika-s0519t:553: 82. Vivattati vaṭṭaṃ etthāti vivattaṃ, vivattaṃ eva vivaṭṭaṃ, asaṅkhatadhātu, nibbuti eva vā. Tena vuttaṃ “nibbāna”nti.
tika-s0519t:554_0: “Kattha daṭṭhabba”nti vā pāḷi. Upacayeti upacayāvatthāyanti attho. Dasannanti lobhādikilesavatthūnaṃ.
tika-s0519t:554_2: hi ādīnavesu eva saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu assādānupassitā. Na hi yathābhūtañāṇe sati
tika-s0519t:554_3: tathā sambhavo. Tena vuttaṃ “dasannaṃ…pe… bhāvato”ti. Dasavidhakāraṇeti dasavidhe
tika-s0519t:554_4: kāraṇe, dasavidhassa vā kāraṇe. Ayonisomanasikāraparikkhatā dhammā subhārammaṇādayo.
tika-s0519t:555_0: Tabbisayā kilesāti āhārapariññāparibandhabhūtā kilesā. Viññāṇaṭṭhitīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0519t:555_1: Kāye pavattamāno paṭhamo vipallāso kāyasamudāye, kāyekadese ca kabaḷīkāre āhāre pavatto
tika-s0519t:555_2: eva hotīti vuttaṃ “paṭhame āhāre visayabhūte paṭhamo vipallāso pavattatī”ti. Tathā
tika-s0519t:555_3: vedanāyaṃ pavattamāno dutiyavipallāso tappaccaye phassāhāre, citte pavattamāno tatiyavipallāso
tika-s0519t:555_4: tappaccaye manosañcetanāhāre, dhammesu pavattamāno catutthavipallāso tappaccaye viññāṇāhāre
tika-s0519t:555_5: pavatto eva hotīti vuttaṃ “catutthe āhāre catuttho vipallāso”ti. Tenāha “sesāhāresupi
tika-s0519t:555_6: eseva nayo”ti. Āhārasīsena vā āhārapaṭibaddho chandarāgo gahito. Viññāṇaṭṭhitīsupi
tika-s0519t:555_7: eseva nayo. Tenevāha “āhārasīsena tabbisayā kilesā adhippetā”ti. Paṭhame āhāre visayabhūteti
tika-s0519t:555_8: ca paṭhame āhāre chandarāgassa visayabhāvaṃ patte, tabbhāvaṃ anatikkanteti attho.
tika-s0519t:555_9: Appahīnacchandarāgassa hi tattha vipallāsā sambhavanti, na itarassa. Tathā dutiyavipallāsādīsu
tika-s0519t:555_10: appahīnesu. Itare upādānāni pavattanteva appahīnattāti āha “sesapadesupi eseva nayo”ti.
tika-s0519t:555_11: Yasmā ca upādānādīsu appahīnesupi yogādayo pavattanteva yathārahaṃ taṃsabhāvattā,
tika-s0519t:555_12: tadekaṭṭhasabhāvato ca, tasmā vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “paṭhame upādāne paṭhamo yogo”tiādi.
tika-s0519t:556_0: 83. Aparijānantassāti ñātapariññāya, tīraṇapariññāya, pahānapariññāyāti tīhi pariññāhi
tika-s0519t:556_1: paricchinditvā ajānantassa, tesaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca
tika-s0519t:556_2: nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ anavabujjhantassāti attho. Tibbo bahalo chandarāgo hoti
tika-s0519t:556_3: taṇhācaritabhāvatoti adhippāyo. Iti upakkilesassa diṭṭhābhinivesassa hetubhāvatoti
tika-s0519t:556_7: viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo taṇhāvisayato, sabbesaṃ vā taṇhāvisayato taṇhāpadhānatā labbhateva.
tika-s0519t:557_2: cā”ti vuttaṃ. Labbhamāne hi ujuke atthe kiṃ pariyāyakathāyāti. Chandarāgo vā tattha
tika-s0519t:557_3: atthasiddhoti evampettha attho vutto. Na hi tattha asati chandarāge vipallāso sambhavati.
tika-s0519t:557_5: dukkhassa kāraṇato. Viññāṇe niccasaññino. Tathā hi sāti nāma bhikkhu kevaṭṭaputto
tika-s0519t:557_6: “taṃyeva viññāṇaṃ sandhāvati saṃsaratī”ti tattha niccābhinivesaṃ saṃvedesi. Yebhuyyena
tika-s0519t:557_9: daḷhaṃ gaṇhātī”ti iminā sīlabbatupādānaṃ idha bhavupādānanti dasseti. Tathā hi vakkhati
tika-s0519t:558_0: Paccayā honti upanissayapaccayādinā. Paṭhame yoge ṭhitoti paṭhame yoge patiṭṭhito.
tika-s0519t:558_1: Appahīnā hi kilesā kammavaṭṭādīnaṃ kāraṇabhūtā taṃsamaṅgino sattassa patiṭṭhāti vuccanti.
tika-s0519t:558_3: piyāyitassa vatthuno vipariṇāmaññathābhāve domanassuppattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “bhavarāga…pe… padūsentī”ti.
tika-s0519t:559_0: Ganthitvāti ganthiṃ katvā. Dvidhābhūtaṃ rajjuādike viya ganthikaraṇañhi ganthanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:559_1: Cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhantā āsavānaṃ uppattihetu hontīti sambandho. Pariyuṭṭhānappattā
tika-s0519t:559_2: ekacce kilesā visesato āsavuppattihetu hontīti dassanatthaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ uppaṭipāṭivacanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:559_3: Tappaṭipakkhe visaye patthetīti yojanā. Tabbisayabahule bhave patthetīti yathā mānusakehi
tika-s0519t:559_4: kāmehi nibbinnarūpā devūpapatti. Taṃsabhāvattāti diṭṭhisabhāvattā. Aparāparanti aññamaññaṃ.
tika-s0519t:559_5: Ekaccā hi diṭṭhi ekaccassa diṭṭhābhinivesassa kāraṇaṃ hoti, yathā sakkāyadiṭṭhi itarāsaṃ.
tika-s0519t:559_7: idaṃ saccābhinivesassa phalabhūtaṃ avijjāsavaṃ dasseti ekantavassimeghavuṭṭhānena
tika-s0519t:559_8: viya mahoghappavatti. Avijjāsavo siddho hoti vuṭṭhihetukamahoghasiddhiyā uparimeghavuṭṭhānaṃ viya.
tika-s0519t:560_1: vā”ti. Cittassa abbhantarasaṅkhātaṃ hadayanti vipākacittappavattiṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0519t:561_0: Lobhasahagatassa viññāṇassa. Itarassa dosasahagatādikassa. Byañjanena viya bhojanassa
tika-s0519t:561_1: ārammaṇassa abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ visesāpādanaṃ upasecanaṃ, nandī sappītikataṇhā upasecanaṃ
tika-s0519t:561_2: etassāti nandūpasecanaṃ upasecanabhūtāyapi nandiyā rāgasallaupanisato. Upasitte pana
tika-s0519t:561_3: vattabbameva natthīti dassetuṃ pāḷiyā “rāgasallena nandūpasecanena viññāṇenā”ti vuttanti
tika-s0519t:561_4: tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “kena pana taṃ nandūpasecana”nti pucchati.
tika-s0519t:562_0: Rāgasallenāti hetumhi karaṇavacananti dassento “rāgasallena hetubhūtenā”ti āha. Upanissayapaccayattho
tika-s0519t:562_1: cettha hetvattho. Upagantabbato viññāṇenāti vibhattiṃ pariṇāmetvā yojetabbaṃ. “Patiṭṭhābhāvato”ti
tika-s0519t:562_2: iminā viññāṇassa nissayādipaccayataṃ vadati. Tenāha “rūpakkhandhaṃ nissāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
tika-s0519t:563_0: 85. Yadipi akusalamūlādike tipukkhalassa, taṇhādike nandiyāvaṭṭassa disābhāvena vakkhati,
tika-s0519t:563_1: tathāpi aññamaññānuppavesato ekasmiṃ naye siddhe itarepi siddhā eva hontīti imassa
tika-s0519t:563_2: visesassa dassanatthaṃ “āhārādayo…pe… vavatthapetu”nti vuttaṃ. Vakkhamāne vā akusalamūlataṇhādike
tika-s0519t:563_3: ādisaddena saṅgahetvā “āhārādayo”ti vadanto “nayāna”nti bahuvacanamāha. Ekassa atthassāti
tika-s0519t:563_4: rāgacaritassa upakkilesatāsaṅkhātassa ekassa payojanassa. Byañjanatthopi gahito,
tika-s0519t:563_5: na byañjanameva gahitanti suttapadāni aññamaññapariyāyavacanāni yathārahaṃ taṇhāvatthūnaṃ
tika-s0519t:563_6: tattha kathitattā vuttaṃ “savatthukā taṇhā vuttā”ti. Dosavatthūnaṃ, diṭṭhivatthūnañca
tika-s0519t:563_7: tattha kathitattā “savatthuko doso, savatthukā diṭṭhi ca vuttā”ti imamatthaṃ sandhāyāha
tika-s0519t:564_0: Dukkhākārena saha dukkhākāraṃ gahetvāti attho. Evañcetanti yadi taṃtaṃanupassanābahulassa
tika-s0519t:564_1: vasena purimāhāradvayādīsu vimokkhamukhavisesaniddhāraṇaṃ kataṃ, etaṃ evameva veditabbaṃ,
tika-s0519t:564_2: na aññathā. Tattha kāraṇaṃ vadanto “na hī”tiādimāha. Tassattho – yathā ariyamaggānaṃ
tika-s0519t:564_3: odhiso kilesappajahanato pahātabbesu dhammesu niyamo atthi, na evaṃ vipassanāya pariññāpahānānaṃ aniccantikattāti.
tika-s0519t:565_0: Apare panāhu – purime āhāradvaye parikilesabhāvena, dukkhapaccayattā ca dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0519t:565_1: supākaṭaṃ. Tattha purime viññāṇaṭṭhitidvayaviññāṇāhāre tatiyaviññāṇaṭṭhitiyaṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-s0519t:565_3: anupassanānaṃ pavattimukhatāya tehi appaṇihitādivimokkhamukhehi pariññaṃ gacchantīti.
tika-s0519t:565_4: Tathā vipallāsādīsu purimadvayaṃ dukkhānupassanāya ujuvipaccanīkaṃ, itaradvayaṃ aniccānattānupassanānaṃ.
tika-s0519t:565_5: Iti pavattimukhatāya ca ujuvipaccanīkatāya ca ime dhammā yathārahaṃ appaṇihitādivimokkhamukhehi
tika-s0519t:565_13: Na hi aniccato passato mānajappanaṃ, bhayaṃ vā sambhavati. Avijjāyogādīnaṃ attābhinivesanimittatā pākaṭā evāti.
tika-s0519t:566_1: cā”ti katvā, satipi tabbhāve parahitapaṭipattito, niddosatāya ca seṭṭhā vihārāti
tika-s0519t:566_2: catasso appamaññā brahmavihārā, catasso phalasamāpattiyo ariyavihārā “ārakā kilesehi
tika-s0519t:566_3: ariyānaṃ vihārā”ti. Catasso āruppasamāpattiyo āneñjavihārā, satipi devūpapattisaṃvattanikakusalasamāpattibhāve
tika-s0519t:568_0: Yaṃ abhiṇhaṃ na pavattati, taṃ acchariyanti dassetuṃ “andhassa…pe… uppajjanaka”nti
tika-s0519t:568_1: vuttaṃ. Adhitiṭṭhati sīlādi etena saccena, ettha vā sacce nimittabhūte, adhiṭṭhānamattameva
tika-s0519t:568_2: vā taṃ saccanti evaṃ karaṇādhikaraṇabhāvatthā paccayavasena veditabbā samānādhikaraṇasamāsapakkhe.
tika-s0519t:568_3: Tathā aññapadatthasamāsapakkhe. Itarasmiṃ pana samāse karaṇādhikaraṇatthā eva, te
tika-s0519t:568_4: ca kho sīlādivasena ca veditabbā. Sukhanti jhānavipassanāmaggaphalanibbānasukhaṃ.
tika-s0519t:568_5: Lokiyavipākasukhampi labbhateva. “Nāññatra bojjhā…pe… pāṇina”nti hi imāya gāthāya
tika-s0519t:568_6: saṅgahitā anattaparihāramukhena sattānaṃ abhayā nibbānasampattisukhāvahā cattāro
tika-s0519t:568_7: dhammā idha “sukhabhāgiyā”ti vuttāti. Anavasesapariyādānatoti pharaṇavasena anavasesaggahaṇato.
tika-s0519t:569_0: Paṭhamassa satipaṭṭhānassa paṭhamapaṭipadāvasena pavattassāti adhippāyo. Evaṃ sesesupi.
tika-s0519t:569_2: Satipi ca sabbāhi paṭipadāhi sabbesaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ niyamābhāve nānantarikabhāvena
tika-s0519t:569_3: desanākkamenevettha nesaṃ ayamanukkamo katoti veditabbo. Atha vā kāyavedanāsu subhasukhasaññānaṃ
tika-s0519t:569_5: purimaṃ satipaṭṭhānadvayaṃ yojitaṃ tadabhāvato. Itarena itaraṃ. Tāni hi purimesu
tika-s0519t:569_6: satipaṭṭhānesu katakammassa icchitabbāni. Atha vā yathā taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritānaṃ
tika-s0519t:569_7: mandatikkhapaññānaṃ vasena catasso paṭipadā yojitā, evaṃ cattāri satipaṭṭhānāni sambhavantīti
tika-s0519t:570_0: “Tathā”ti iminā yathā samānapaṭipakkhatāya paṭhamassa satipaṭṭhānassa bhāvanā paṭhamassa
tika-s0519t:570_1: jhānassa visesāvahā, evaṃ pītisahagatādisamānatāya dutiyasatipaṭṭhānādibhāvanā dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ
tika-s0519t:570_2: visesāvahāti imamatthaṃ upasaṃharati. Pītipaṭisaṃvedanādīti ādisaddena sukhapaṭisaṃvedanaṃ,
tika-s0519t:571_1: paguṇavasībhāvāpādanassa paccayo hoti, na itarāsaṃ. Itarāsaṃ pana adhiṭṭhānabhāvena
tika-s0519t:571_2: paramparāya paccayo hotīti veditabbaṃ. Byāpādavihiṃsāvitakkaaratirāgā byāpādavitakkādayo.
tika-s0519t:572_0: Dibbavihārādike cattāro vihāre padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā nānāsantānesu uppannāya vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya
tika-s0519t:572_2: vihāro bhāvito bahulīkato”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sammappadhānasadisañhettha sammappadhānaṃ
tika-s0519t:572_3: vuttaṃ. Ariyavihāre ca heṭṭhime nissāya uparimaggādhigamāya vāyamantassa ayaṃ nayo
tika-s0519t:572_4: labbhati. Maggapariyāpannasseva vā sammappadhānassa nānāsantānikassa yathāvuttavipassanāgamanena
tika-s0519t:572_5: taṃtaṃkiccādikassa vasenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Sakkā hi vipassanāgamanena saddhindriyāditikkhatāviseso
tika-s0519t:573_1: mānappahānaṃ ukkaṃseti, brahmavihārasannissaye uppannaṃ dutiyaṃ sammappadhānaṃ kāmālayasamugghātaṃ,
tika-s0519t:573_2: ariyavihārasannissayena uppannaṃ tatiyaṃ sammappadhānaṃ avijjāpahānaṃ, santavimokkhasannissayena
tika-s0519t:573_3: uppannaṃ catutthaṃ sammappadhānaṃ bhavūpasamaṃ ukkaṃsetīti dassetuṃ “paṭhamaṃ sammappadhāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:574_0: Pahīnamāno na visaṃvādeyyāti mānappahānaṃ saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍheti visaṃvādananimittasseva
tika-s0519t:574_1: abhāvato. Appahīnamāno hi mānanissayena kiñci visaṃvādeyya. Kāmālaye, diṭṭhālaye
tika-s0519t:574_2: ca samugghāṭite cāgapaṭipakkhassa avasaro eva natthīti ālayasamugghāto cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0519t:574_3: vaḍḍheti. Avijjāya samucchinnāya paññābuddhiyā paribandhova natthi, bhavasaṅkhāresu
tika-s0519t:574_4: ossaṭṭhesu abhavūpasamassa okāsova natthīti mānappahānādayo saccādhiṭṭhānādike saṃvaḍḍhentīti
tika-s0519t:575_0: Avisaṃvādanasīlo dhammacchandabahulo chandādhipateyyaṃ samādhiṃ nibbatteti. Cāgādhimutto
tika-s0519t:575_1: nekkhammajjhāsayo akosajjabahulatāya vīriyādhipateyyaṃ, ñāṇuttaro cittaṃ attano vase
tika-s0519t:575_2: vattento cittādhipateyyaṃ, vūpasantasabhāvo upasamahetubhūtāya vīmaṃsāya vīmaṃsayato
tika-s0519t:576_1: hoti. Āraddhavīriyo vīriyasamādhimhi ṭhito saṃkilesapakkhassa santapanavaseneva puññaṃ
tika-s0519t:576_2: paripūreti. Cittaṃ attano vase vattento cittasamādhimhi ṭhito paññāya upakārānupakārake
tika-s0519t:576_3: dhamme pariggaṇhanto buddhiṃ phātiṃ gamissati. Vīmaṃsāsamādhimhi ṭhito dhammavicayabahulo
tika-s0519t:577_1: mettaṃ vaḍḍheti. Tapena saṃkilesadhamme vikkhambhento vīriyādhiko paradukkhāpanayanakāmataṃ
tika-s0519t:577_2: sāhatthikaṃ karotīti tapo karuṇaṃ saṃvaḍḍheti. Paññā pariyodāpitā sāvajjānavajjadhamme
tika-s0519t:577_3: pariggaṇhantī pahāsanipātato muditaṃ rakkhantī paribrūheti. Upadhinissaggo pakkhando
tika-s0519t:577_4: ninnapoṇapabbhārova sammadeva sattasaṅkhāresu udāsino hotīti so upekkhāvihāraṃ parivaḍḍhetīti
tika-s0519t:577_5: imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “indriyasaṃvaro bhāvito”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tenāha “yo yassa visesapaccayo,
tika-s0519t:578_0: 87. Disābhāvenāti nayānaṃ disābhāvenāti yojetabbaṃ. Atthopissa pubbe vuttanayeneva
tika-s0519t:578_1: veditabbo. Yena catukkena yassa rāgacaritādipuggalassa vodānaṃ visuddhi. Yathā apariññātā,
tika-s0519t:578_2: appahīnā ca paṭhamāhāravipallāsādayo rāgacaritādīnaṃ puggalānaṃ upakkilesā, evaṃ
tika-s0519t:578_3: paṭhamapaṭipadādayo bhāvitā bahulīkatā nesaṃ visuddhiyo hontīti vuttanayānusārena
tika-s0519t:579_0: Atha vā purimāhi dvīhi paṭipadāhi sijjhamānā vipassanā attano kiccavuttisaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0519t:579_2: “appaṇihitaṃ vimokkhamukha”nti vuttā. Tatiyāya paṭipadāya sijjhamānā sukhappavattikatāya
tika-s0519t:579_3: sammadeva santatighanaṃ bhinditvā aniccalakkhaṇaṃ vibhāventī “animittaṃ vimokkhamukha”nti
tika-s0519t:579_4: vuttā. Catutthāya pana paṭipadāya sijjhamānā sukhappavattikatāya, visadañāṇatāya
tika-s0519t:579_5: ca samūhakiccārammaṇaghanaṃ bhinditvā sammadeva anattalakkhaṇaṃ vibhāventī “suññataṃ
tika-s0519t:580_0: Tathā kāyavedanānupassanā visesato dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ vibhāventī, cittānupassanā aniccalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-s0519t:581_0: Sappītikatāya assādāni paṭhamadutiyajjhānāni virajjanavasena visesato dukkhato passantiyā
tika-s0519t:581_1: vipassanāya vasena “appaṇihitaṃ vimokkhamukha”nti vuttāni. Tatiyaṃ santasukhatāya
tika-s0519t:581_3: vasena “animittaṃ vimokkhamukha”nti vuttaṃ. Catutthaṃ upakkilesavigamādīhi parisuddhaṃ
tika-s0519t:581_4: susamāhitaṃ yathā paresaṃ, evaṃ attano ca yathābhūtasabhāvāvabodhahetutāya sammadeva
tika-s0519t:582_0: Evaṃ vihārānaṃ vipassanāvaseneva vimokkhamukhatā, tattha “dibbabrahmavihārānaṃ santasukhatāya
tika-s0519t:583_0: Tathā purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ sammappadhānānaṃ saṃkilesavisayattā kilesadukkhavītikkamassa
tika-s0519t:583_3: Catutthassa uppannānaṃ ṭhitattaṃ byāpārāpajjanena dhammānaṃ avasavattitādīpanato
tika-s0519t:585_0: Pakatiyā dukkhasabhāve saṅkhāre ñāṇasaccena avisaṃvādento dukkhato eva passati, cāgādhivimuttatāya
tika-s0519t:585_1: taṇhaṃ vidūrīkaronto rāgappaṇidhiṃ visosetīti purimaṃ adhiṭṭhānadvayaṃ “appaṇihitaṃ
tika-s0519t:585_2: vimokkhamukha”nti vuttaṃ. Itarassa pana adhiṭṭhānadvayassa suññatānimittavimokkhamukhatā vuttanayā eva.
tika-s0519t:586_1: hoti, vīriyādhipateyyā pana kāmavitakkādike vinodentassāti tadubhayaṃ nissāya pavattā
tika-s0519t:586_2: vipassanā visesato rāgādippaṇidhīnaṃ visosanato “appaṇihitaṃ vimokkhamukha”nti vuttā.
tika-s0519t:586_3: Cittādhipateyyaṃ, vīmaṃsādhipateyyañca nissāya pavattā yathākkamaṃ aniccānattānupassanābāhullato
tika-s0519t:587_0: Abhijjhāvinayano indriyasaṃvaro, kāmasaṅkappādivinodano tapo ca vuttanayeneva paṇidhipaṭipakkhato
tika-s0519t:587_1: appaṇihitaṃ vimokkhamukhaṃ, buddhi anattānupassanānimittaṃ, upadhipaṭinissaggo nimittaggāhapaṭipakkhoti
tika-s0519t:587_2: tadubhayasannissayā vipassanā yathākkamaṃ “suññataṃ, animittaṃ vimokkhamukha”nti vuttā.
tika-s0519t:588_0: Āsannapaccatthikarāgaṃ paṭibāhantī mettā rāgapaṇidhiyā paṭipakkho, karuṇā paradukkhāpanayanākāravuttikā
tika-s0519t:588_2: “appaṇihitaṃ vimokkhamukha”nti vuttā. Muditā sattānaṃ modaggahaṇabahulā tadaniccatādassanato
tika-s0519t:588_3: aniccānupassanāya visesapaccayoti tannissayā vipassanā animittaṃ vimokkhamukhaṃ.
tika-s0519t:588_4: Upekkhā ñāṇakiccādhikatāya anattānupassanāya visesapaccayoti tannissayā vipassanā
tika-s0519t:588_5: “suññataṃ vimokkhamukha”nti vuttāti evamettha pavattiākārato vipassato nissayato,
tika-s0519t:589_0: Samatikkamanaṃ pariññāpahānañca. Saparasantāneti attano, paresañca santāne, tena
tika-s0519t:589_1: kāyiko, vācasiko ca vihāro “vikkīḷita”nti vuttoti dasseti “vividho hāro”ti katvā.
tika-s0519t:589_2: Tassa pana vibhāvanā idha adhippetā nayassa bhūmibhāvato. Yena paṭipakkhabhāvena.
tika-s0519t:589_3: Tesaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvoti tesaṃ āhārādīnaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvo pahātabbabhāvo paṭipadādīnaṃ
tika-s0519t:589_4: paṭipakkhabhāvo pahāyakabhāvoti yojetabbaṃ. Tattha paṭipadāggahaṇena vipassanā kathitā.
tika-s0519t:589_5: Vipassanā ca cattāro āhāre parijānantī tappaṭibaddhachandarāgaṃ pajahatīti ujukameva
tika-s0519t:589_6: tesaṃ paṭipakkhatā, evaṃ jhānādīnampi upādānādipaṭipakkhatā veditabbā tadupadesena
tika-s0519t:589_7: vipassanāya kathitattā. Vipallāsasatipaṭṭhānānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvo pākaṭo eva. Nti
tika-s0519t:589_8: sīhavikkīḷitaṃ. Vīsatiyā catukkehi visabhāgato vitthārena vibhattanti tīhi padehi
tika-s0519t:590: Indriyānanti saddhādiindriyānaṃ. Dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ niddhāraṇāti yojanā.
tika-s0519t:591_0: 88. Niggacchatīti nikkhamati. Tato niddhāretvā vuccamāno hi niggacchanto viya hotīti.
tika-s0519t:591_1: Cattāro puggaleti “taṇhācarito mando”tiādinā vutte cattāro puggale. Puggalādhiṭṭhānena
tika-s0519t:591_2: cettha dhammo vuttoti āha “bhūmiṃ niddisitvā”ti. Tato evāti yathāvuttapuggalacatukkato
tika-s0519t:591_3: eva. Itaratthāpīti “sukhāya…pe… puggalā”ti etthāpi. Sādhāraṇāyāti paṭhamacatutthāhipi
tika-s0519t:593: Eseva nayoti kusalamūlādidvādasatikasaṅgaho anavajjapakkho. “Vodāyati sujjhati etenāti vodāna”nti vaṃ netabbataṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0519t:594_0: Yathā hārauddeso kato, evaṃ nayānaṃ akaraṇe kāraṇaṃ, payojanañca vibhāvetukāmo “kasmā
tika-s0519t:594_2: Tattha sambhavo anuddesakkamena niddisane karaṇaṃ dassanaṃ payojanaṃ. Yadi hi ime
tika-s0519t:594_3: nayā uppattiṭṭhānavasena asaṃkiṇṇā bhaveyyuṃ, hārā viya uddesānukkameneva niddisitabbā
tika-s0519t:594_4: siyuṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ hārānaṃ uddesāvasāne “ete soḷasa hārā pakittitā atthato asaṃkiṇṇā”ti.
tika-s0519t:595_0: Yasmā panete mūlapadehi mūlapadantaraniddhāraṇena aññamaññaṃ te niggacchanti, tasmā
tika-s0519t:595_1: ekasmiṃ niddiṭṭhe itaropi atthato niddiṭṭhoyeva nāma hotīti imassa atthassa dassanatthaṃ
tika-s0519t:596_0: Idāni tameva saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ vitthārena dassetuṃ “paṭhamanayato hī”tiādi
tika-s0519t:596_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha taṇhādiṭṭhicaritavasena dvidhā puggale vibhajitvā tesaṃ vasena nandiyāvaṭṭanayaṃ
tika-s0519t:596_2: nīharitvā puna te eva taṇhādiṭṭhicarite catuppaṭipadāvibhāgena vibhajitvā sīhavikkīḷitassa
tika-s0519t:596_3: nayassa sambhavo dassito, te eva catuppaṭipadābhedabhinne puggale puna ugghaṭitaññuādivibhāgena
tika-s0519t:596_4: tidhā vibhajitvā tipukkhalassa nayassa sambhavo dassito. Taṃ sandhāyāha “paṭhamanayato…pe… niddiṭṭho”ti.
tika-s0519t:597_0: Yasmā subhasukhasaññāhi lobho, niccasaññāya doso “iminā me anattho kato”ti āghātuppattito,
tika-s0519t:597_1: attasaññāya moho gahito hoti. Tathā asubhasaññādīhi alobhādayo, tasmā dhammādhiṭṭhānavasena
tika-s0519t:597_2: tatiyanayato dutiyanayassa sambhavo. Yasmā pana lobhe sati sambhavato lobhaggahaṇeneva
tika-s0519t:597_3: doso gayhati. Lobho ca taṇhā, moho avijjā, tappaṭipakkhato alobhādosehi samatho gayhati,
tika-s0519t:597_4: amohena vipassanā, tasmā dhammādhiṭṭhānavaseneva dutiyanayato paṭhamanayassa sambhavoti
tika-s0519t:597_5: imaṃ visesaṃ dīpetuṃ uddesānukkamena niddeso na katoti dassento “dhammādhiṭṭhānavasena panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:598_0: Tenevāti tatiyanayato dutiyanayassa viya dutiyanayato paṭhamanayassapi sambhavato.
tika-s0519t:598_1: Evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānavasena āgataṃ nissāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dhammādhiṭṭhānavaseneva
tika-s0519t:598_2: nayaniggamo niddhāritoti ayameva viseso. Yadi evanti pāḷiyaṃ āgatappakārato aññenapi
tika-s0519t:598_3: pakārena nayā niddhāretabbā, evaṃ sante yathā puggalādhiṭṭhānavasena paṭhamanayato
tika-s0519t:598_4: tatiyanayassa, tatiyanayato dutiyanayassa sambhavo dassito, evaṃ dhammādhiṭṭhānavaseneva
tika-s0519t:599_0: Tattha nayoti pacchā vuttadutiyanayo. Atthatoti atthāpattito, atthato labbhamānattā
tika-s0519t:599_1: eva sarūpena na kathitoti attho. Idāni taṃ atthāpattiṃ ekantikaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “yasmā”tiādi
tika-s0519t:599_2: vuttaṃ. Anuppaveso icchito taṃtaṃnayamūlapadānaṃ nayantaramūlapadesu samavarujjhanato.
tika-s0519t:599_3: Tathā hi “yattha sabbo akusalapakkho saṅgahaṃ samosaraṇaṃ gacchati, yattha sabbo
tika-s0519t:599_4: kusalapakkho saṅgahaṃ samosaraṇaṃ gacchatī”ti ca vuttaṃ. Ayañca atthoti “nayānaṃ
tika-s0519t:599_5: aññamaññaanuppaveso niggamo”ti ayaṃ duvidho attho. Piṭakānaṃ atthakathanaṃ peṭakaṃ,
tika-s0519t:599_6: so eva upadesoti peṭakopadeso, upadesabhūtā pariyattisaṃvaṇṇanāti attho.
tika-s0519t:600: Ādito paṭṭhāyāti nayānaṃ aññamaññaanuppavesaniggamamattameva avibhāvetvā nayavicārassa paṭhamāvayavato pabhuti vibhāvanā dīpanā pakāsanā.
tika-s0519t:601_0: Dosadiṭṭhīti appassādatādidosagāhikadiṭṭhī, dosadassinoti attho. Te hi asamūhatānusayā,
tika-s0519t:601_1: kāmesu ca ādīnavadassino. Idañhi nesaṃ aṅgadvayaṃ attakilamathānuyogassa kāraṇaṃ
tika-s0519t:601_2: vuttaṃ. Natthi atthoti yo rāgābhibhūtehi andhabālehi parikappito diṭṭhadhammiko kāmehi
tika-s0519t:601_3: attho, so madhubindugiddhassa madhulittasatthadhārāvalehanasadiso appassādo bahudukkho
tika-s0519t:601_4: bahupāyāso bahuādīnavo savighāto sapariḷāho samparāyiko tathevāti sabbadāpi viññūjātikassa
tika-s0519t:601_5: kāmehi payojanaṃ na vijjati. Anajjhositāti anabhibhūtā viharanti. Tena vuccati sukhā
tika-s0519t:601_6: paṭipadāti tena mandakilesabhāvena tesaṃ puggalānaṃ akicchena sijjhamānā vipassanā
tika-s0519t:601_7: paṭipadā “sukhā paṭipadā”ti vuccati. Ajjhositāti abhiniviṭṭhā. Ime sabbe sattāti
tika-s0519t:601_8: ime taṇhādiṭṭhicaritabhāvena dvidhā vuttā aparimāṇappabhedā sabbepi paṭipajjantā sattā.
tika-s0519t:602_0: Sukhena paṭinissajjantīti kilese akicchena pajahanti. “Imā catasso paṭipadā”tiādi
tika-s0519t:602_1: paṭipadānaṃ ettāvatāyaṃ, visayabhāvakiccesu ca byabhicārābhāvadassanaṃ. Ayaṃ paṭipadāti
tika-s0519t:602_2: nigamanaṃ, ayaṃ paṭipadā yāya vasena sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa bhūmidassanatthaṃ cattāro
tika-s0519t:602_3: puggalā niddhāritāti adhippāyo. Catukkamaggena kilese niddisatīti anantaraṃ vakkhamānena
tika-s0519t:602_4: āhārādicatukkamaggena dasavatthuke kilesasamūhe niddisati. Catukkamaggena ariyadhammesu
tika-s0519t:603_0: Idañca pamāṇaṃ cattāro āhārāti imesaṃ vipallāsānaṃ pavattiyā pamāṇaṃ, yadidaṃ cattāro
tika-s0519t:603_1: āhārā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yāvadeva cattāro āhārā pariññaṃ na gacchanti, tāvadeva
tika-s0519t:603_2: cattāro vipallāse vibhajanti. Yāvadeva cattāro vipallāsā appahīnā, tāvadeva cattāri
tika-s0519t:603_3: upādānāni paribrūhantīti. Evaṃ sabbattha yathārahaṃ vattabbaṃ. Tenāha “evaṃ imāni
tika-s0519t:604: “Abhijjhāya ganthatī”ti iminā abhijjhāyanameva ganthananti dasseti. Esa nayo sesesupi. Papañcentoti diṭṭhābhinivesaṃ vitthārento.
tika-s0519t:605_0: Vippaṭisāruppattihetubhāvo kilesānaṃ āsavananti āha “āsavantī”ti. Kiṃ vippaṭisārāti
tika-s0519t:605_1: tena kilesānaṃ vītikkamavatthuṃ vadati. Yasmā appahīnānusayasseva vippaṭisārā, na
tika-s0519t:605_2: itarassa, tasmā “ye vippaṭisārā, te anusayā”ti vuttaṃ. Padadvayenapi phalūpacārena kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:606: Paṭhamena padenāti yathāvuttesu dasasu suttapadesu paṭhamena padena. Paṭhamāya disāyāti tadatthasaṅkhātāya sīhavikkīḷitassa saṃkilesapakkhe paṭhamāya disāya.
tika-s0519t:607_0: Itīti evaṃ, vuttanayenāti attho. Kusalākusalānanti yathāvuttaanavajjasāvajjadhammānaṃ.
tika-s0519t:607_2: yutte katvā manasānupekkhanā. “Manasā volokayate”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:608_0: Tassāti disālokanassa. Sotāpattiphalādīnaṃ pariyosānatā indriyavasena veditabbā.
tika-s0519t:608_1: Yesañhi saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ vasena satipaṭṭhānādīni sijjhanti, tesaṃ vasena sotāpattiphalādīnaṃ
tika-s0519t:608_2: pariyosānatā. Tattha sotāpattiphale saddhindriyaṃ pāripūriṃ gacchati. Sotāpanno hi
tika-s0519t:608_3: saddhāya paripūrikārī. Sakadāgāmiphale vīriyindriyaṃ pāripūriṃ gacchati. Sakadāgāmī
tika-s0519t:608_4: hi āraddhavīriyo uparimaggādhigamāya. Anāgāmiphale samādhindriyaṃ pāripūriṃ gacchati.
tika-s0519t:608_5: Anāgāmī samādhismiṃ paripūrikārī. Aggaphale arahatte satindriyañca paññindriyañca
tika-s0519t:608_6: pāripūriṃ gacchati. Arahā hi sativepullappatto, paññāvepullappatto cāti.
tika-s0519t:609_0: Apare panāhu – saddhābalena subhasaññāya pahānaṃ. Saddahanto hi paṭikkūlamanasikāre
tika-s0519t:609_1: kammaṃ karoti. Vīriyabalena sukhasaññāya pahānaṃ. Vīriyavā hi sukhassādaṃ abhibhavitvā
tika-s0519t:609_2: yonisomanasikāramanuyuñjati. Samādhibalena niccasaññāya pahānaṃ. Samāhito hi saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-s0519t:609_3: udayabbayaṃ pariggaṇhanto aniccasaññaṃ paṭilabhati. Paññābalena attasaññāya pahānaṃ.
tika-s0519t:609_4: Paññavā hi saṅkhārānaṃ avasavattitaṃ sallakkhento attasuññataṃ paṭivijjhati. Sati
tika-s0519t:609_5: pana sabbatthāpi icchitabbā. Tenāha “satiṃ ca khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbatthikaṃ vadāmī”ti.
tika-s0519t:609_6: Evaṃ catuvipallāsappahāyīnaṃ catunnaṃ indriyānaṃ pāripūriṭṭhānaṃ cattāri sāmaññaphalāni
tika-s0519t:611_0: Tattha manāpikenāti yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ. Amanāpikenāpi hi ārammaṇena vipariyesavasena
tika-s0519t:611_1: lobho uppajjati. Manāpikenāti vā manāpikākārena. Phassavedanūpavicārarāgavitakkapariḷāhā
tika-s0519t:611_3: “uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ. Uppādalakkhaṇasseva pana gahaṇe “uppajjatī”ti na vattabbaṃ
tika-s0519t:611_4: siyā. Na hi uppādo uppajjati, rāgajapariḷāhahetukatā ca tesaṃ rāgassa taṇhāsabhāvattā.
tika-s0519t:611_5: Taṇhā hi dukkhassa samudayo, yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhanti. Tathā
tika-s0519t:611_6: ca vuttaṃ “taṇhāsahajātavedanāya pana lobho sahajātādipaccayehi ca paccayo”ti. Evaṃ
tika-s0519t:611_8: vutto, tassā vipariṇāmo “vipariṇāmadukkhatā”ti. Vipariṇāmāvatthā ca udayāvatthaṃ
tika-s0519t:611_9: vinā na hotīti sā taṃ nissāya uppajjantī viya vuttā “uppādaṃ…pe… dukkhatā”ti.
tika-s0519t:612_0: Doso akusalamūlantiādīsupi vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana viseso –
tika-s0519t:612_1: ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ nāma jarā, taṃ nissāya domanassassa uppajjanato vuttaṃ “ṭhitassa…pe…
tika-s0519t:612_2: dukkhadukkhatā”ti. Dosajapariḷāhahetukatā jarāya dosabahulassa puggalassa nacirena jīraṇato veditabbā.
tika-s0519t:613_0: Vayoti saṅkhārānaṃ nirodho. Aniccatāvasena ca saṅkhatadhammānaṃ saṅkhāradukkhatāti
tika-s0519t:613_1: vuttaṃ “vaya…pe… saṅkhāradukkhatā”ti. Tenāha bhagavā “yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti.
tika-s0519t:613_2: Mohajapariḷāhahetukatā vayalakkhaṇassa yebhuyyena sammohanimittattā, maraṇassa avijjāpaccayattā
tika-s0519t:614_0: Alobhādīnaṃ paññādipāripūrihetukatā yathārahaṃ upanissayakoṭisahajātakoṭiyā ca paccayabhāvena
tika-s0519t:614_1: veditabbā. Sabbe hi kusalā dhammā sabbesaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ paccayavisesā
tika-s0519t:614_2: honti evāti. Abyāpādavitakkasannissayo upavicāro abyāpādūpavicāro. Avihiṃsūpacārepi eseva nayo.
tika-s0519t:615_0: Ayaṃ tipukkhalo nāma dutiyo nayo saddhiṃ disālokananayena niddiṭṭhoti vacanaseso.
tika-s0519t:615_2: āraddhaṃ. Ime yathāvuttapaṭipadācatukkassa vasena catubbidhā. Visesenāti diṭṭhitaṇhāsannissayatāvisesena.
tika-s0519t:615_3: Diṭṭhicarito hi tikkhapañño, mandapañño ca sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya ca dandhābhiññāya
tika-s0519t:615_4: ca niyyātīti dvidhā vuttoti. Tathā taṇhācarito dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya
tika-s0519t:615_5: ca dandhābhiññāya ca niyyātīti dvidhā vuttoti dassito cāyamattho. Tenāha “dve honti
tika-s0519t:616_0: Cattāro hutvāti sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa bhūmidassane cattāro hutvā ṭhitā, catuppaṭipadāvasena
tika-s0519t:616_1: cattāro katvā vuttāti attho. Tayo hontīti tipukkhalassa nayassa bhūmidassane ugghaṭitaññuādivasena
tika-s0519t:616_2: tayo bhavanti. Tayo hutvāti tathā tayo hutvā ṭhitā tayo katvā kathitā. Dve hontīti
tika-s0519t:616_3: idāni nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa bhūmidassane dve bhavanti. Ajjhosānanti diṭṭhiajjhosānaṃ.
tika-s0519t:616_4: Abhinivesoti taṇhābhiniveso. Ahaṃkāroti ahaṃmāno “aha”nti vā karaṇaṃ ahaṃkāro. Diṭṭhimānamaññanānaṃ
tika-s0519t:617_0: Dasapadāni “paṭhamā disā”ti kātabbānīti nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa “paṭhamā disā”ti
tika-s0519t:617_1: karaṇīyāni, “paṭhamā disā”ti vavatthapetabbānīti attho. Saṃkhittena…pe… pakkhassāti
tika-s0519t:617_2: anekappabhedassapi kaṇhapakkhassa saṃkilesapakkhassa atthaṃ saṃkhittena saṅkhepena
tika-s0519t:617_3: paṭipakkhe vattamāne vodānadhamme uddissa ñāpenti pakāsenti, paṭhamā kātabbāti yojanā.
tika-s0519t:617_4: Dasa padāni dutiyakānīti taṇhādikā dasa koṭṭhāsā “dutiyā disā”ti kātabbā. “Saṃkhittena…pe…
tika-s0519t:618_0: Yonisoti upāyaso. Yoniso manasikāro aniccādivasena paṭhamamanasikāro. Paññāti sutacintāmayī
tika-s0519t:618_1: paññā, jhānābhiññā ca. Nibbidāti nibbedhañāṇaṃ. Somanassadhammūpasañhitaṃ pamodādisahagataṃ cetasikasukhaṃ.
tika-s0519t:619: Kusalapakkhe cāti ca-saddo samuccayattho, tena ubhayapakkhato samuccayavasena catasso disā, na paccekanti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:620_0: Tesanti taṇhādīnaṃ, taṇhāya, taṇhāpakkhikānañcāti attho. Satipi anavasesato rāge
tika-s0519t:620_1: pahīyamāne anavasesato avijjāpi pahīyateva, rāgassa pana cetovimutti ujupaṭipakkhoti
tika-s0519t:620_2: dassanatthaṃ “rāgavirāgā”ti vuttaṃ. Avijjāvirāgāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Ayañca attho
tika-s0519t:620_3: “āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimutti”ntiādinā āgatapāḷiyā atthavaṇṇanāvasena
tika-s0519t:620_4: vuttā, idha pana “rāgavirāgā cetovimutti sekkhaphalaṃ, avijjāvirāgā paññāvimutti
tika-s0519t:620_5: asekkhaphala”ntiādinā vevacanasamāropane āgatattā purimā anāgāmiphalaṃ. Tañhi kāmarāgassa
tika-s0519t:620_7: pacchimā arahattaphalaṃ taṇhāya, avijjāya ca anavasesappahānato, paññāpāripūriyā
tika-s0519t:621_0: Tatthāti nandiyāvaṭṭanaye. Tesūti “cattāri padānī”ti vuttesu taṇhādīsu catūsu mūlapadesu.
tika-s0519t:621_1: Idha samosaraṇanti saṅgaho vutto, so ca sabhāvato, sabhāgato ca hotīti taṇhādīni
tika-s0519t:621_2: cattāri dassetvā “tesu aṭṭhārasa mūlapadāni samosarantī”ti vuttaṃ. Samathaṃ bhajanti
tika-s0519t:621_3: sabhāvato, sabhāgato cāti adhippāyo. Vipassanaṃ bhajantīti etthāpi eseva nayo. Nayādhiṭṭhānānaṃ
tika-s0519t:621_4: nayādhiṭṭhāne anuppaveso nayānaṃ nayesu anuppaveso eva nāma hotīti āha “tipukkhalo…pe… anuppavisantī”ti.
tika-s0519t:622_1: abhāvato adoso ekasuttakoṭiyā ekakova hotīti dassento āha “adoso adoso evā”ti. Doso
tika-s0519t:622_2: doso evāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Samosaranti sabhāgato ca sabhāvato ca saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti attho.
tika-s0519t:623_0: Bhūmi gocaroti ca mūlapadāni eva sandhāya vadati. Ekekaṃ nayaṃ anuppavisati taṃtaṃmūlapadānuppavesato.
tika-s0519t:623_1: Kusale vā viññāte akusalo paṭipakkho, akusale vā kusalo paṭipakkho anvesitabbo saṃvaṇṇiyamānasuttapadānurūpato
tika-s0519t:623_2: upaparikkhitabbo. Anvesanā upaparikkhā “disālokana”nti vuccati. So nayo niddisitabboti
tika-s0519t:623_3: tathā anvesitvā tehi dhammehi disā vavatthapetvā so so nayo niddhāretvā yojetabbo.
tika-s0519t:623_4: Yathā mūlapadesu mūlapadānaṃ anuppaveso saṃvaṇṇito, imināva nayena mūlapadato mūlapadānaṃ
tika-s0519t:623_5: niddhāraṇāti veditabbāti dassento “yathā ekamhi…pe… niddisitabbānī”ti āha. “Ekekasmiñhī”tiādi kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:624_0: Tattha tatthāti ekekasmiṃ naye. Ekasmiṃ dhamme viññāteti taṇhādike ekasmiṃ mūlapadadhamme
tika-s0519t:624_1: sarūpato, niddhāraṇavasena vā viññāte. Sabbe dhammā viññātā hontīti tadaññamūlapadabhūtā
tika-s0519t:624_2: sabbe lobhādayo viññātā nayassa bhūmicaraṇāyogyatāya pakāsā pākaṭā honti. “Imesa”ntiādi
tika-s0519t:624_3: nayattayadisābhūtadhammānaṃ matthakapāpanena tiṇṇaṃ nayānaṃ kūṭaggahaṇaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
tika-s0519t:628_0: 89. Saṅgahavārādīsūti saṅgahavārauddesaniddesavāresu. Sarūpato na dassitaṃ, atthato
tika-s0519t:628_1: pana dassitamevāti adhippāyo. Tameva hi atthato dassanatthaṃ udāharaṇabhāvena nikkhipati,
tika-s0519t:628_2: yathā mūlapadehi paṭṭhānaṃ niddhāretabbanti. “Aññamaññasaṅgaho”ti idaṃ mūlapadapaṭṭhānānaṃ
tika-s0519t:628_3: aññamaññato niddhāretabbatāya kāraṇavacanaṃ “sati anuppavese tato viniggāmo siyā”ti.
tika-s0519t:628_4: Paṭṭhānanti ettha pa-iti upasaggapadaṃ, taṃ pana “vibhattesu dhammesu yaṃ seṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0519t:628_5: tadupāgamu”ntiādīsu viya pakāratthajotakanti dassento “pakārehi ṭhāna”ntiādīsu viya
tika-s0519t:628_6: pakāratthajotakanti dassento “pakārehi ṭhāna”nti āha. Idhāti imasmiṃ nettippakaraṇe.
tika-s0519t:628_9: dīpana”nti katvā. Patiṭṭhahanti adhisīlasikkhādayo samudāyarūpena gahitā. Etehi saṃkilesadhammādīhi,
tika-s0519t:628_11: dhammadesanāya dīpetabbā. Tesanti saṃkilesadhammādīnaṃ. Puna tesanti suttāni sandhāyāha.
tika-s0519t:629_0: Goṭṭhāti vajā. Paṭṭhitagāvoti gatagāvo. Āgataṭṭhānasminti sīhanādasuttaṃ vadati.
tika-s0519t:629_1: Pavattagamanattā etthāti vacanaseso. Atha vā gacchati etthāti gamanaṃ, desanāñāṇassa
tika-s0519t:629_2: nissaṅgavasena pavattagamanadesabhāvato paṭṭhānaṃ nāmāti attho. Vomissāti “saṃkilesabhāgiyañca
tika-s0519t:630_0: Saṃkilesabhāve ñāpetabbe pavattaṃ, taṃ visayaṃ katvā desitanti attho, atthamattavacanañcetaṃ,
tika-s0519t:630_1: saṃkilesabhāge bhavanti saddanayena attho veditabbo. “Saṃkilesabhāgika”ntipi pāṭho,
tika-s0519t:630_2: tassa saṃkilesabhāgo etassa atthi, saṃkilesabhāge vā niyuttaṃ, saṃkilesabhāgassa
tika-s0519t:630_3: vā pabodhanasīlaṃ saṃkilesabhāgikaṃ, tadeva saṃkilesabhāgiyanti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0519t:630_4: Padālanaṃ samucchindanaṃ, padālanasannissayatā cettha padālanaggahaṇena gahitāti
tika-s0519t:630_5: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Asekkheti asekkhadhamme. Tesaṃ vomissakanayavasenāti tesaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyādīnaṃ
tika-s0519t:631_0: “Tāni pana cha dukā”tiādinā padānaṃ gahaṇaparicchedato vavatthāpanataṃ vatvā parato
tika-s0519t:631_1: “sādhāraṇāni katānī”ti padassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanāya sayameva sarūpato dassessati. “Anuddharaṇe
tika-s0519t:631_2: kāraṇaṃ natthī’ti vatvā uddharaṇe pana kāraṇaṃ dassento “tathā hi vakkhatī”tiādinā
tika-s0519t:631_3: pāḷimāhari. Vodānaṃ nāma saṃkilesato hoti saṃkiliṭṭhasseva vodānassa icchitattā.
tika-s0519t:631_4: Yasmā vodānaṃ tadaṅgādivasena saṃkilesato visujjhanaṃ, tasmā “taṃ pana atthato vāsanābhāgiyādi
tika-s0519t:631_5: eva hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha tadaṅgavikkhambhanehi vodānaṃ vāsanābhāgiyādivasena hoti,
tika-s0519t:631_7: paṭippassaddhiyā eva veditabbaṃ. Yāyaṃ desanā rāgādibhāginī siyā, sā saṃkilesabhāgiyā.
tika-s0519t:631_8: Yāyaṃ desanā cāgādibhāginī siyā, sā vāsanābhāgiyā. Yā pana āpattivicchedanī sāvasesaṃ,
tika-s0519t:632_1: “saṃkileso tividho…pe… visayadassanatthaṃ āraddha”nti. Bhavarāgo bhavapatthanā. Uppajjatīti
tika-s0519t:632_2: na vigacchati. Tatra tatra bhaveti yadi vā kāmabhave, yadi vā rūpabhave, yadi vā
tika-s0519t:632_3: arūpabhave. Padantarasaṃyojanavasenāti dukanayeneva padantarena yojanavasena. Missitāni
tika-s0519t:633_0: Ekakacatukkavasena dassitabbāni padāni eva gahetvā āvuttinayadassanavasena missetvā
tika-s0519t:633_1: avasiṭṭhadukavasena, tikacatukkavasena ca itare aṭṭha paṭṭhānabhāgā dassitāti āha
tika-s0519t:633_2: “tāniyeva yathāvuttāni aṭṭha suttānī”tiādi. Cattāro ekakāyeva pāḷiyaṃ ādito dassitā.
tika-s0519t:633_3: Chadukā pāḷiyaṃ āgatā cattāro, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dveti. Cattāro tikā pāḷiyaṃ āgatā dve,
tika-s0519t:633_4: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dveti. Dve catukkā pana aṭṭhakathāyameva āgatā. “Pāḷiyaṃ anāgatā”ti
tika-s0519t:633_5: idaṃ sarūpato anāgamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, nayato pana āgatabhāvo dassito eva. Ye
tika-s0519t:633_6: panettha pāḷiyaṃ anāgatā, tesaṃ udāharaṇāni parato dassayissāma.
tika-s0519t:634_0: Soḷasahīti soḷasavidhehi. Na hi tāni suttāni soḷaseva, atha kho soḷasappakārānīti
tika-s0519t:634_1: mūlagaṇanaṃ ṭhapetvā kāraṇasuttaladdhena saṅkhāragabbhena tadanurūpo yo gaṇanavitthāro,
tika-s0519t:634_2: tassa pattharaṇavidhi paṭṭhānanayo. Iminā…pe… natthīti yathāvuttapaṭṭhānavinimutto
tika-s0519t:634_3: pariyattisāsanappadeso na vijjati yathārahaṃ taṃtaṃpaṭṭhānabhāvena pavattattāti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:634_4: Yadi suttageyyādi navavidhaṃ pariyattisāsanaṃ yathāvuttapaṭṭhānavaseneva pavattaṃ,
tika-s0519t:634_5: tattha kathamidha anidassitānaṃ gāthādīnaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyādibhāvo gahetabboti pañhaṃ
tika-s0519t:634_6: sandhāya “gāthāya gāthā anuminitabbā”tiādipāḷi pavattāti dassetuṃ “kathaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:635_0: Tattha ayaṃ gāthā viyāti “kāmandhā jālasañchannā, manopubbaṅgamā dhammā, uddhaṃ adho
tika-s0519t:635_1: sabbadhi vippamutto, yassa selūpamaṃ citta”ntiādinā idha udāhaṭagāthā viya. Gāthāti
tika-s0519t:635_2: aññāpi tepiṭake buddhavacane āgatā idha anudāhaṭā. Saṃvaṇṇanākāle sammukhībhāvena
tika-s0519t:635_3: “ayaṃ gāthā viyā”ti vuttā yā kāci gāthā “saṃkilesabhāgiyā”ti vā “saṃkilesavāsanānibbedhaasekkhabhāgiyā”ti
tika-s0519t:635_4: vā anuminitabbā nayaggāhena ñāpetabbāti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “saṃkilesa…pe… jānitabbāti
tika-s0519t:635_5: attho”ti. Vā-saddo hi idha avuttavikappanattho. Sesapadesūti veyyākaraṇasuttapadesu.
tika-s0519t:636: 90. Ariyānaṃ dhammanti cārittavārittabhedaṃ sīlācāraṃ. Ekantakaraṇīyassa akaraṇampi vītikkamo eva.
tika-s0519t:637_0: Avijjādike saṃkilesadhamme tadaṅgādivasena dhunātīti dhonā vuccati paññā. Paccavekkhitvā
tika-s0519t:637_1: paribhuñjanapaññāti pana pakaraṇena avacchinnattā vuttaṃ. Taṃ atikkamitvā carantoti
tika-s0519t:637_2: paccayānaṃ apaccavekkhitvā paccayaparibhoge ādīnavaṃ apassanto iṇaparibhogavasena
tika-s0519t:637_3: paribhuñjanto na parimuccati nirayādidukkhato, vaṭṭadukkhato ca.
tika-s0519t:638_0: Kukkujanakaṃ nāma kadaliyā pupphanāḷi. Parābhavāyāti vināsāya. Tathāti yathā phalapākantā
tika-s0519t:638_1: kadalī, evaṃ veḷunaḷāpi osadhijātikattāti upasaṃhārattho tathā-saddo. Tenāha “phalaṃ
tika-s0519t:639: Sukhettepīti pi-saddena ko pana vādo ūsarādidosaduṭṭhesu khettesūti dasseti. “Chakaṇa…pe… attho”ti etena yathāvuttaabhisaṅkharaṇābhāvena bījadosaduṭṭhanti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:640: 91. Sajjitanti sañjitaṃ. Aparikkhateti paṭipakkhehi dhammehi avikkhambhite aroge.
tika-s0519t:641_0: Yāya samannāgato puggalo “kiṃ sutaṃ mayā, kiṃ vā suṇāmī”ti kusalaṃ gavesī carati,
tika-s0519t:641_1: sā dhammojapaññā kissavā nāma. Dubbhāsitāti duṭṭhu bhāsitā, issāmacchariyadosādīhi duṭṭhā vā bhāsitā.
tika-s0519t:644: Avajātaputtāti lāmakaputta. Bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā nihīnavuttitaṃ sandhāya vadati. Nerayikoti niraye nibbattanako. Pāpakammino papatanti etthāti papataṃ, narakaṃ.
tika-s0519t:646: 93. Vipulanti uḷāraṃ, telādīhi ceva dhanadhaññādīhi ca pahūtasannicayanti attho. Sambādhāti janasaṃmaddasaṅghaṭā.
tika-s0519t:647: Daṇḍena na hiṃsatīti ettha vuttaṃ yaṃ daṇḍanidhānaṃ, taṃ vaṭṭavivaṭṭanissitaṃ. Tadubhayassāpi phalaṃ dassento “so puggalo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:648_0: 94. Kiñcati taṃsamaṅginaṃ vimaddatīti kiñcanaṃ, rāgādi, palibundhati kusalappavattiṃ
tika-s0519t:648_1: nivāretīti palibodho, rāgādiyeva, kiñcanameva palibodho kiñcanapalibodho. Atha vā
tika-s0519t:648_2: kiñcanañca palibodho ca kiñcanapalibodho, āmisakiñcikkhañca rāgādisaṃkileso cāti attho.
tika-s0519t:649: Visesitanti vilomaṃ, visamaṃ kiriyanti attho. Rājabhaṇḍanti orodhe sandhāya vadanti.
tika-s0519t:650_1: Dānayuttoti satataṃ dānakiriyāsamaṅgī. Dānasaṃvibhāgaratoti ettha dānaṃ nāma atthikānaṃ
tika-s0519t:650_3: saṃvibhajanaṃ. Imehi kho…pe… hotīti ettha hotisaddena “samannāgato”ti padaṃ sambandhitabbaṃ,
tika-s0519t:650_4: na “sotāpanno”ti dassetuṃ “sotāpanno…pe… hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Tehi dhammehi samannāgamo
tika-s0519t:650_5: hi idha vidhīyati, na sotāpannabhāvo, tena sotāpannalakkhaṇamete dhammā, na sotāpannabhāvalakkhaṇanti
tika-s0519t:650_6: dasseti. Tathā hi “sotāpannena…pe… labbhamānataṃ dassetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:653_0: 99. Kiñcāpi udatārīti taraṇakiriyā atītabhāvena vuttā, taraṇameva pana gahetvā āha
tika-s0519t:653_1: “oghataraṇassa ariyamaggakiccattā”ti. Evaṃ vippamutto, vimuttoti ca ettha muccanakiriyāyapi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:654_0: 100. Pātu-saddapubbako bhavanti-saddo siyā uppādapariyāyo siyā āvibhāvapariyāyoti
tika-s0519t:654_1: “pātubhavantī”ti padassa “uppajjanti, pakāsenti cā”ti attho vutto. Pātubhūtadhammassāti
tika-s0519t:654_2: uppannabodhipakkhiyadhammassa, vibhūtacatusaccadhammassa vā. No kalloti na yutto.
tika-s0519t:654_3: Sahetudhammanti ettha paccayuppannadhammāva gahitā, na paccayadhammāti? Nayidamevaṃ
tika-s0519t:654_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ paccayadhammānampi paccayuppannabhāvānativattanato. Atha vā sahetudhammanti
tika-s0519t:654_5: paccayuppannadhammo padhānabhāvena vutto, paccayadhammo pana guṇabhāvenāti evamettha
tika-s0519t:655: Āraññakanti āraññakaṅgasamannāgataṃ. Aññātoti paricayavasena na ñāto, asaṃsaṭṭhoti attho. Tenāha “niccanavo”ti.
tika-s0519t:656_1: kāraṇehi kodhappahānena sukhaṃ supati. Kodhapariḷāhābhāvo pana pākaṭataroti āha “kodha…pe…
tika-s0519t:656_2: sayatī”ti. Visamūlassāti ettha visasarikkhatāya “visa”nti dukkhaṃ adhippetanti āha
tika-s0519t:656_3: “dukkhavipākassā”ti. Sukhanti cetasikasukhaṃ. Akkuṭṭhassa paccakkositvā ca paccakkosanahetu uppajjatīti yojanā.
tika-s0519t:658: Visayabhedena, pavattiākārabhedena ca anekabhedattā kāmasaññāya vuttaṃ “yāya kāyacī”ti.
tika-s0519t:659: Dānamukhenāti dānena mukhabhūtena, dānaṃ pamukhaṃ katvāti attho.
tika-s0519t:660: “Ariyamaggasampāpanavasenā”ti iminā anukampānuddayānaṃ ekantānavajjatameva vibhāveti. “Anukampā”ti padassatthavivaraṇaṃ “karuṇāyanā”ti, itarassa “mettāyanā”ti.
tika-s0519t:663: Bahalakilesatāyāti bahulakilesabhāvena. Pubbahetumandatāyāti vivaṭṭūpanissayassa kusalassa akatattā.
tika-s0519t:665: Parissayā sīlādiparipūraṇassa paribandhabhūtā kilesā eva. Anariyā paññāsīsaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhātumeva na sakkontīti vuttaṃ “ñāṇasirena adhosirā hutvā”ti.
tika-s0519t:666: 103. Bhagavato, bhikkhusaṅghassa ca vasanayogyabhāvo, tehi nivutthabhāvo ca tassa sātisayo vaṇṇoti vuttaṃ “paṭhamagāthāya jetavanassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā”ti. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-s0519t:667: “Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, ninne vā yadi vā thale;
tika-s0519t:669: Idha dhammasaddo samādhipariyāyo “evaṃdhammā te bhagavanto”tiādīsu viyāti āha “dhammoti samādhī”ti samādhipakkhikā dhammā sativāyāmā.
tika-s0519t:670_0: Nānugaccheyyāti nānutaseyya. Anutasanameva hi taṇhādiṭṭhīhi anugamanaṃ. Paṭivipasseyyāti
tika-s0519t:670_1: vipassanāsammasanamāha. Yamakato, hi khaṇikato, paṭipāṭito ca sammasanaṃ vipassanāyapi
tika-s0519t:670_2: sammasanato paṭivipassanā nāma. Sā hi vipassanāya diṭṭhiugghāṭanamānasamugghāṭananikantipariyādānahetutāya
tika-s0519t:670_4: appento”ti etena nibbānārammaṇadhammānubrūhanaṃ yathā “brūhetā suññāgārāna”nti dasseti.
tika-s0519t:671_0: Yaṃ kiñci apadisitvā paṭiññādānaṃ saṅgaro. So pana attano kiccavisesaṃ apadisitvā
tika-s0519t:671_1: mittasanthavavasena vā kālāgamanaṃ apadisitvā kiñcikkhānuppadānena vā paṭibāhakaraṇaṃ
tika-s0519t:671_2: apadisitvā balaggabodhavasena vā siyāti tassa mittakaraṇādipariyāyataṃ sandhāyāha
tika-s0519t:671_3: “saṅgaroti…pe… nāma”nti. Evaṃ paṭipannattāti evaṃ aniccasaññāmukhena tiyaddhakesu
tika-s0519t:672: Dibbacakkhu suvisuddhanti sāvasesā desanāti āha “yaṃ sacchikarotī”ti. Rūpāyatanañhettha adhippetaṃ.
tika-s0519t:673_0: 104. Antanti saṅkhārānaṃ pārimantabhūtaṃ. Vedānanti maggañāṇavedānameva. Arahattādhigamena
tika-s0519t:673_1: antaṃ pariyosānaṃ gatattā. Kammavipākavaṭṭānaṃ, kilesavaṭṭassāpi ca ussadena upacayena ussadā, rāgādayo.
tika-s0519t:674: Sukkobhāsatāya sukkā, abhivisiṭṭhaggahā. Sabbāni vā tārakarūpāni sukkā. Vindatīti upalabhati, paṭivijjhatīti attho.
tika-s0519t:675_0: “Ajjhattaṃ vipassanābhiniveso hotī”ti idaṃ “sakesu dhammesū”ti pāragubhāvassa visesitattā
tika-s0519t:675_1: vuttaṃ, tañca kho abhiniveseneva desitaṃ. “Sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, abhiññeyya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:675_2: Pāragutā ca tesaṃ khandhānaṃ pariññābhisamayavasena hoti. Tato ca nesaṃ hetubhūtasamudaye,
tika-s0519t:675_4: itarasaccesupi pāragubhāvo vutto eva hoti. Sabbaso hi sakaattabhāvabodhenapi catusaccābhisamayo
tika-s0519t:675_5: hotiyeva. Vuttañhetaṃ “imasmiṃyeva byāmamatte kaḷevare sasaññimhi samanake lokañca
tika-s0519t:675_6: paññapemi, lokasamudayañcā”tiādi. Atha vā sakesu dhammesūti attano dhammesu. Attadhammā
tika-s0519t:675_7: nāma atthakāmassa kulaputtassa sīlādidhammā. Sīlasamādhipaññādayo hi vodānadhammā
tika-s0519t:675_8: ekantahitasukhasampādanato purisassa sakadhammā nāma, na anatthāvahā saṃkilesadhammā
tika-s0519t:675_9: viya paradhammā. Tesaṃ sīlādīnaṃ pāripūriyā pāraṃ pariyantaṃ gatoti pāragū. “Akkula
tika-s0519t:675_10: pakkula”iti evaṃ vihiṃsanakapayogaṃ. Ajakalāpena hi tadā bhagavantaṃ bhīsāpetukāmena
tika-s0519t:675_11: kataṃ yakkhagajjitaṃ “akkula pakkula” iti iminā ākārena sattānaṃ sotapathaṃ agamāsi,
tika-s0519t:676_0: Nābhinandatīti “ayaṃ maṃ daṭṭhuṃ āgatā”ti na tussati. Yasmā pana “bhagavato bhāsitaṃ
tika-s0519t:676_1: abhinandī”tiādīsu viya sampaṭicchanatthopi abhinandasaddo hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “cittena
tika-s0519t:676_2: na sampaṭicchatī”ti. Na socatīti “mayā asammoditā gacchatī”ti na cittasantāpaṃ āpajjati.
tika-s0519t:676_3: “Saṅgā saṅgāmajiṃ mutta”nti idaṃ abhinandasocanānaṃ abhāvassa kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-s0519t:677_0: Tenāti udake nhānena. Tenevāha “na udakena sucī hotī”ti. Tassattho – udakummujjanādinā
tika-s0519t:677_1: neva sattānaṃ suci pāpato suddhi nāma hotīti. Udakummujjanādīni hi idha uttarapadalopena
tika-s0519t:677_2: “udaka”nti vuttaṃ. Udakenāti vā ummujjanādikiriyāsādhanabhūtena udakena sattānaṃ
tika-s0519t:677_3: suci pāpasuddhi na hotīti. Atha vā sucitena yathāvuttena udakena pāpamalato suddho
tika-s0519t:677_4: nāma satto na hotīti. Yadi siyā, sabbesameva macchabandhānaṃ pāpasuddhi siyā. Tenāha
tika-s0519t:677_6: udakaṃ orohantānaṃ antamaso macchakacchape upādāya sabbesampi pāpasuddhi siyā, na
tika-s0519t:677_7: panevaṃ hoti. Kasmā? Nhānīyapāpahetūnaṃ appaṭipakkhabhāvato. Yañhi yaṃ vināseti,
tika-s0519t:677_8: so tassa paṭipakkho. Yathā āloko andhakārassa, vijjā avijjāya, na evaṃ nhānaṃ pāpassa,
tika-s0519t:677_9: tasmā niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ “na udakena sucī hotī”ti. Yena pana suci hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0519t:677_10: “yamhi saccañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha saccanti vacīsaccañca viratisaccañca. Atha vā
tika-s0519t:677_11: saccanti ñāṇasaccañceva paramatthasaccañca. Dhammoti seso ariyadhammo. Saccassa panettha
tika-s0519t:677_12: visuṃ gahaṇaṃ tassa bahukāratādassanatthaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0519t:678_1: vā nisedhakaṃ, “na jaccā brāhmaṇo hotī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Thero hi tathāvādena te aniggaṇhantopi
tika-s0519t:680_1: kilesabhāvanā vāsanā nāma āyasmato pilindavacchassa vasalavohāro viya, saha vāsanāyāti
tika-s0519t:680_4: magge kusalo amaggepi kusalo eva hoti. Bhagavā pana sabbaññutāya sabbattheva kusaloti
tika-s0519t:681: 106. Tamena yuttoti yathāvuttatamo tassa atthīti tamo, puggalo. Appakāsabhāvena ṭhitā khandhāva tamo. Ālokabhūtoti jātiguṇāloko, pākaṭaguṇoti attho.
tika-s0519t:682: Kilesamayaṃ bandhanaṃ “daḷha”nti vadanti. Yato saccāni paṭivijjhantā buddhāva naṃ chindanti, na aññe.
tika-s0519t:683: Ducchedanatthena satipi daḷhabhāve sithilavuttitaṃ tassa dīpetuṃ “bandhanabhāvampī”tiādimāha. Tena “aho sukhumataraṃ kho, bhikkhave, mārabandhana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:684_0: 107. Yadipi cetanā kusalākusalasādhāraṇā, apuññābhisaṅkhāro idhādhippetoti tassa
tika-s0519t:684_1: vasena atthaṃ dassento “akusalacetanāvasena cetetī”ti āha. Cetanaṃ abhisandahanaṃ,
tika-s0519t:684_2: cittassa byāpārāpattibhāvena pavattīti attho. Yasmā pana cetanā yadā viññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-s0519t:684_3: tadā diguṇussāhādiguṇavāyāmā viya hutvā pākaṭaṃ payogaṃ nipphādeti, tasmā “pakappetī”ti
tika-s0519t:684_4: vuttā. Pākaṭappayogakappanañhettha pakappanaṃ adhippetaṃ. Tenāha “tameva pakappetī”ti.
tika-s0519t:684_5: Paccayaṭṭho idha ārammaṇatthoti vuttaṃ “pavattiyā paccayo hotī”ti.
tika-s0519t:685_0: 108. Yathā jalasamuddassa vīcisamuṭṭhānavasena labbhamāno vego “vīcimayo”ti vuccati,
tika-s0519t:685_1: evaṃ cakkhusamuddassāpi rūpāvabhāsanavasena labbhamāno vego “rūpamayo”ti vutto. Eseva
tika-s0519t:685_2: nayo sesesupi. Āviñchanatoti ākaḍḍhanato, ākaḍḍhanañcettha santānassa tanninnabhāvahetutāya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:686_0: Samudanaṃ kilesatemanaṃ, avassavahetutā, kilesānaṃ ūmiādisadisatā samāvaṭṭanena sattānaṃ
tika-s0519t:686_1: anatthāvahatāya veditabbā. Uparūpariveguppattiyā upagatassa uṭṭhātuṃ appadānena,
tika-s0519t:687_0: Abhimukho nandatīti tadārammaṇaṃ sukhaṃ somanassaṃ sādiyanto sampaṭicchati. Abhivadatīti
tika-s0519t:687_1: taṇhābhinivesavasena abhinivissa vadati. Tañhissa abhinivesaṃ dīpetuṃ “aho sukha”ntiādi
tika-s0519t:687_2: vuttaṃ. Ajjhosānaṃ adhimuccanabhūtāya taṇhāya taṇhāvatthukassa anupavisitvā āveṇikatākaraṇanti
tika-s0519t:688_0: 109. “Kasmā”tiādinā santāpadukkhānaṃ asuppatikārataṃ āha “yena vā pakārenā”ti. Yenāti
tika-s0519t:688_2: tathārūpaṃ katvā attano vaḍḍhiñca maññanti. Avaḍḍhi eva pana hoti tassa pakārassa
tika-s0519t:688_3: vaḍḍhiyaṃ anupāyabhāvato ca upāyabhāvato ca avaḍḍhiyaṃ. Tathāpīti tattha tattha icchāvighātaṃ
tika-s0519t:688_4: pāpuṇantopi. Yasmā ito bāhirakā sabbena sabbaṃ bhavanissaraṇaṃ appajānanto mandakilesaṃ
tika-s0519t:688_5: dīghāyukaṃ sukhabahulaṃ ekaccaṃ bhavaṃ teneva mandakilesādibhāvena “nibbāna”nti samanupassanti,
tika-s0519t:689: Bhavadiṭṭhisahagatā taṇhā purimapade uttarapadalopena bhavataṇhāti vuttāti āha “bhavataṇhātiādīsu viyā”ti.
tika-s0519t:691: Tato evāti bhūtaratiyā eva. Aññamaññañhi sattānaṃ chandarāgo balavā hoti. Anavasesatoti anavasesena, na kiñci sesetvā.
tika-s0519t:692: Saṃsārasotassa anukūlabhāvena gacchatīti anusotagāmī. Tasseva paṭikkūlavasena nibbidānupassanādīhi pavattatīti paṭisotagāmī, acalappasādādisamannāgamena ṭhitasabhāvoti attho.
tika-s0519t:693_1: jātiyo”ti. Kaṇhadhammasamannāgatattā vā kaṇho. Paṭhamavayepi majjhimavayepi pāpasamaṅgī
tika-s0519t:693_2: hutvā ṭhito kaṇhadhamme abhijāyati, pacchāpi pāpaṃ pasavatīti attho. Sukkoti vā ettha
tika-s0519t:694_0: 111. Purimasminti purimasmiṃ pade. Visaye bhummaṃ tattha deyyadhammassa patiṭṭhāpanato.
tika-s0519t:694_1: Dutiye adhikaraṇe, tadadhikaraṇañhi nibbānanti. Gahaṭṭhapabbajitakiccesu vā visiṭṭhadhammadassanatthaṃ
tika-s0519t:694_2: paccayadānārahattānaṃ samadhuratāniddeso. Atha vā yena yena pana vatthunāti rūpārūpanirodhādinā
tika-s0519t:694_4: saṅgaṇhāti. Yathā vā taṇhādiṭṭhiduccaritānaṃ vasena saṃkilesabhāgiyassa suttassa
tika-s0519t:695_0: Idaṃ evaṃ pavattanti yathā ducintitādivasena bālo hoti puggalo, evaṃ tassa ducintitacintitādibhāvanāvasena
tika-s0519t:695_1: pavattaṃ idaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ nāma suttanti pubbe saṃkilesadhammavibhāgena vuttaṃ
tika-s0519t:695_2: idāni sāmaññato saṅgahetvā vadati. Idaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttanti etthāpi iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0519t:696_0: Kilesaṭṭhānehīti kilesānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānehi. Kilesāvatthāhīti kilesānaṃ pavattiākāravisesehi.
tika-s0519t:696_1: Kāmarāgādīhi saṃyujjati kāmarāgādihetu kammavipākādinā. Satipi tesaṃ kālantaravuttiyaṃ
tika-s0519t:696_2: saṃyutto nāma hoti, yato kāmarāgādayo “saṃyojana”nti vuccanti. Upādiyatīti daḷhaṃ
tika-s0519t:696_3: gaṇhāti pavatteti. Sesaṃ vuttanayattā, uttānattā ca saṃvaṇṇitaṃ.
tika-s0519t:697_0: 112. Udāharaṇavasenāti nidassanavasena, ekadesadassanavasenāti attho. Sakalassa hi
tika-s0519t:697_1: pariyattisāsanassa soḷasahi paṭṭhānabhāgehi gahitattā. Yathā tadekadesānaṃ soḷasannampi
tika-s0519t:697_2: paṭṭhānabhāgānaṃ gahaṇaṃ udāharaṇamattaṃ, tesaṃ pana soḷasannaṃ ekadesaggahaṇaṃ udāharaṇanti
tika-s0519t:697_3: kimettha vattabbaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “ekadesadassanavasenāti attho”ti. Kasmā panettha
tika-s0519t:697_4: pāḷiyaṃ paṭṭhānassa ekadesova udāhaṭo, na avasesoti? Nayanidassanatthaṃ. Iminā nayena
tika-s0519t:698_0: Tattha “appampi ce saṃhita bhāsamāno…pe… sa bhāgavā sāmaññassa hotī”ti idaṃ vāsanābhāgiyañca
tika-s0519t:698_1: asekkhabhāgiyañca. Ettha hi “appampi ce saṃhita bhāsamāno”ti idaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ,
tika-s0519t:699_0: Tathā maghadevasuttaṃ. Tattha hi “bhūtapubbaṃ, ānanda, imissāyeva mithilāyaṃ maghadevo
tika-s0519t:699_1: nāma rājā ahosi dhammiko dhammarājā dhamme ṭhito mahādhammarājā, dhammaṃ carati brāhmaṇagahapatikesu
tika-s0519t:699_2: negamesu ceva janapadesu ca, uposathañca upavasati cātuddasiṃ, pañcadasiṃ, aṭṭhamiñca
tika-s0519t:699_3: pakkhassā”tiādi, idaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ. “Idaṃ kho panānanda, etarahi mayā kalyāṇaṃ
tika-s0519t:699_4: vattaṃ nīharitaṃ ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya
tika-s0519t:699_5: nibbānāya saṃvattatī”ti idaṃ asekkhabhāgiyaṃ. “Pamādaṃ appamādena, yadā nudati paṇḍito”ti
tika-s0519t:699_6: idaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ. “Paññāpāsāda…pe… avekkhatī”ti idaṃ asekkhabhāgiyanti idaṃ
tika-s0519t:700_0: Tathā “tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, indriyānī”ti suttaṃ. Tattha “tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, indriyāni.
tika-s0519t:700_1: Katamāni tīṇīti? Anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ aññindriya”nti idaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ,
tika-s0519t:701_0: Raṭṭhapālasuttaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca. Tattha hi
tika-s0519t:701_1: “ūno loko atitto taṇhādāso”tiādinā saṃkileso vibhatto, “eko vūpakaṭṭho”tiādinā asekkhadhammā,
tika-s0519t:702: “Dhamme ca ye ariyapavedite ratā, anuttaro te vacasā manasā kammunā ca;
tika-s0519t:703: Te santisoraccasamādhisaṇṭhitā, sutassa paññāya ca sāramajjhagū”ti. ;
tika-s0519t:704_0: Idaṃ vāsanābhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca. Ettha hi “dhamme ca ye
tika-s0519t:704_1: ariyapavedite ratā”ti ayaṃ vāsanā, “anuttarā…pe… saṇṭhitā”ti ayaṃ nibbedho, “sutassa
tika-s0519t:705_0: Tathā “saddho sutavā niyāmadassī”ti gāthā. Tattha hi “saddho sutavā”ti vāsanā, “niyāmadassī
tika-s0519t:705_1: vaggagatesu na vaggasāri dhīro, lobhaṃ dosaṃ vineyya paṭigha”nti nibbedho, “sammā
tika-s0519t:706_0: Sabbāsavasaṃvaro parissayādīnaṃ vasena sabbabhāgiyaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tattha hi saṃkilesadhammā,
tika-s0519t:706_1: lokiyasucaritadhammā, sekkhadhammā, asekkhadhammā ca vibhattā. Asabbabhāgiyaṃ pana
tika-s0519t:706_3: sāsanapaṭṭhāne ete taṇhādivasena tayo saṃkilesabhāgā, vodānādivasena tayo vāsanābhāgā,
tika-s0519t:706_4: sekkhānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ vasena tayo nibbedhabhāgā, asekkhānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ
tika-s0519t:706_5: eva vasena tayo asekkhabhāgā, tesaṃ vasena mūlapaṭṭhānāni eva dvādasa honti. Tāni
tika-s0519t:706_6: pana vitthāranayena vibhajiyamānāni channavutādhikāni cattāri sahassāni honti. Yathādassanaṃ
tika-s0519t:706_7: panetāni uddharitabbāni. Tāni pana yasmā saṅgahato kāmataṇhādivasena tayo taṇhāsaṃkilesabhāgā,
tika-s0519t:706_8: sassatucchedavasena dve diṭṭhisaṃkilesabhāgā, kāyaduccaritādivasena tayo duccaritasaṃkilesabhāgāti
tika-s0519t:706_9: aṭṭha saṃkilesabhāgā. Dhammāmisābhayadānavasena tividhaṃ dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu,
tika-s0519t:707_0: Saddhānusārī saddhāvimutto dhammānusārī diṭṭhippatto kāyasakkhīti pañcannaṃ sekkhānaṃ
tika-s0519t:707_1: paccekaṃ tayo sīlādikkhandhāti pannarasa nibbedhabhāgā, suññatānimittāpaṇihitabhedā
tika-s0519t:707_2: paññāvimuttānaṃ tayo aggaphaladhammā, tesu paccekaṃ tayo tayo sīlādikkhandhā, tathā
tika-s0519t:707_4: ekūnavīsati asekkhabhāgā, iti purimāni ekatiṃsa, imāni ekūnavīsatīti samapaññāsa
tika-s0519t:707_5: saṃkilesabhāgiyādidhammā honti. Tasmā imesaṃ samapaññāsāya saṃkilesabhāgiyādidhammānaṃ
tika-s0519t:708_0: Yasmā ca te paññāvimuttā ubhatobhāgavimuttavibhāgaṃ akatvā asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā aggahaṇena
tika-s0519t:708_1: nippariyāyena asekkhabhāgābhāvato naveva asekkhabhāgāti samacattālīsa honti, tasmā
tika-s0519t:708_2: peṭake “cattārīsāya ākārehi pariyesitabbaṃ, paññāsāya ākārehi sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ niddiṭṭha”nti
tika-s0519t:708_3: ca vuttaṃ. Saṅgahato eva pana pubbe vuttavitthāranayena soḷasa honti, puna tividhasaṃkilesabhāgiyādivasena
tika-s0519t:708_5: cha honti, puna saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ dassanabhāgiyaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ asekkhabhāgiyanti
tika-s0519t:708_6: pañca honti, puna mūlapaṭṭhānavasena cattāri honti, puthujjanabhāgiyasekkhabhāgiyaasekkhabhāgiyabhāvena
tika-s0519t:708_7: tīṇi honti, puna saṃkilesabhāgiyavodānabhāgiyabhāvena dve eva honti. Paṭṭhānabhāvena
tika-s0519t:708_8: pana ekavidhameva, iti paṭṭhānabhāvena ekavidhampi saṃkilesavodānabhāgiyabhāvena
tika-s0519t:708_9: duvidhanti vibhāgato yāva channavutādhikaṃ catusahassappabhedaṃ hoti, tāva netabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:708_10: Evametaṃ paṭṭhānaṃ saṅgahato, vibhāgato ca veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:709_0: Imassāpi paṭṭhānavibhāgassa, na purimassevāti adhippāyo. Lokikaṃ assatthīti, lokikasahacaraṇato
tika-s0519t:709_1: vā lokiyaṃ, suttaṃ padesenāti ekadesena. Sabbapadesūti taṃtaṃtikānaṃ tatiyapadesu.
tika-s0519t:710_0: Pariṇamatīti paripaccati. Dharantīti pabandhavasena pavattanti. Nti pāpakammaṃ. Teti
tika-s0519t:710_1: kusalābhinibbattakkhandhā. Rakkhanti vipākadānato vipaccituṃ okāsaṃ na dentīti attho.
tika-s0519t:710_2: Ayañca attho upapajjavedanīyesu yujjati, itarasmimpi yathārahaṃ labbhateva. Tenāha
