tika-s0519t:711: 113. Attano anavajjasukhāvahaṃ paṭipattiṃ paṭipajjanto paramatthato attakāmo nāmāti āha “attano sukhakāmo”ti. Sukhānubandhañhi sukhaṃ kāmento sukhameva kāmetīti ca sukhakāmoti.
tika-s0519t:713: 114. Diṭṭhe dukkhādidhammeti bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇe bhummaṃ, dukkhādidhamme diṭṭhe ñāteti attho.
tika-s0519t:714: “Uddha”ntiādi kāladesānaṃ anavasesapariyādānanti āha “uddhanti anāgataṃ, upari cā”tiādi. Gamanenāti cutūpapātagamanena.
tika-s0519t:715_2: nemaṃ etassāti gambhīranemo, tassa bhāvo gambhīranematā, tāya. Kampanaṃ yathāṭhitassa
tika-s0519t:715_3: ito cito ca sañcopanaṃ, cālanaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānato cāvanaṃ. Ajjhogāhetvāti aviparītasabhāvābhisamayavasena
tika-s0519t:716_0: Saṃyojanānaṃ pajahanavasenāti gāthāya vacanasesaṃ ānetvā dasseti. Atha vā pahātabbassa
tika-s0519t:716_1: pahānena vinā na bhāvanāsiddhīti atthasiddhaṃ pahātabbapahānaṃ ajjhattaṃ, bahiddhāti
tika-s0519t:716_2: padadvayena yojetvā dassetuṃ ajjhattaṃ bahiddhāti orambhāgiyauddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ
tika-s0519t:716_3: visaṃyogagahitoti imamatthaṃ pāḷiyā samatthetuṃ “tenāha sabbaloke”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:717_0: Alobhasīsenāti alobhena pubbaṅgamena, yato yogāvacaro “nekkhammacchando”ti vuccati.
tika-s0519t:717_2: vā. Adhigatajjhānādīnīti ādisaddena vipassanādīni saṅgaṇhāti. Vihiṃsāratirāgānaṃ
tika-s0519t:717_3: byāpādahetukato cattāropi brahmavihārā abyāpādapadhānāti āha “catu…pe… abyāpādo dhammapada”nti.
tika-s0519t:717_4: Adhigatāni jhānādīnīti yojanā. Dasānussati…pe… adhigatāni sammāsati dhammapadaṃ satisīsena
tika-s0519t:717_5: tesaṃ adhigantabbattāti adhippāyo. Ānāpānabhāvanāyaṃ samādhipi padhāno, na sati evāti
tika-s0519t:719: Pāpameva pāpiyoti āha “pāpaṃ hotī”ti, “pāpiyo”ti ca liṅgavipallāsavasena vuttaṃ. Ekavacane bahuvacananti ekavacane vattabbe bahuvacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0519t:720_0: 117. Olīyanataṇhābhinivesavasenāti bhavataṇhābhavadiṭṭhivasena. Tā hi bhavesu satte
tika-s0519t:720_1: allīyāpenti. Atidhāvanābhinivesavasenāti ucchedadiṭṭhivasena. Sā hi avaṭṭupacchedameva
tika-s0519t:720_2: vaṭṭupacchedaṃ katvā abhinivisanato atidhāvanābhiniveso nāma. Olīyantīti sammāpaṭipattito
tika-s0519t:721: Tesañcāti tesaṃ ubhinnaṃ abhinivesānaṃ, tadaññesañca sabbamaññitānaṃ.
tika-s0519t:722: 118. Idaṃ iṭṭhavipākaṃ aniṭṭhavipākanti idaṃ iṭṭhavipākasaṅkhātaṃ aniṭṭhavipākasaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃ.
tika-s0519t:723: “Akaṅkhato na jāneyyu”nti etena “ākaṅkhato”ti iminā padena saddhiṃ sambandhadassanamukhena “na jaññā”ti padassa atthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0519t:725: 120. Tānīti kammakammanimittagatinimittāni. Pattharaṇākāroyeva hesa, yadidaṃ chāyānaṃ volambanaṃ. Evaṃ hotīti “akataṃ vata me kalyāṇa”ntiādippakārena vippaṭisāro hoti.
tika-s0519t:726_0: 122. Esakehīti gavesakehi saparasantāne sampādakehi. Dukkhudrayanti dukkhaphalaṃ.
tika-s0519t:726_1: Tīhi kāraṇehīti kāyavācācittehi. Tāni hi taṃtaṃsaṃvarānaṃ dvārabhāvena kāraṇānīti
tika-s0519t:726_2: vuttāni. Tīhi ṭhānehīti vā tīhi uppattiṭṭhānehi. Pihitanti pidhāyakaṃ.
tika-s0519t:728_0: 123. Rajamissakanti puppharajamissakaṃ. Tassāti tassa sekkhāsekkhamunino. Mahicchādīnaṃ
tika-s0519t:728_1: viya gāme caraṇappaccayā gāmavāsīnaṃ saddhāhāni vā bhogahāni vā na hoti, atha kho
tika-s0519t:728_2: uparūpari vuddhiyeva hotīti dassento “pākatikameva hotī”ti āha. Ajjhattikakammaṭṭhānanti
tika-s0519t:729: Tenāti kusalena kāyavacīkammena. Thirabhāvo thāmaṃ nāmāti tassa atthaṃ dassento “thāmavāti ṭhitimā”ti āha.
tika-s0519t:730_0: Attasaṃnissayaṃ pemaṃ attāti gahetvā “attasama”nti vuttanti āha “attapemena samaṃ
tika-s0519t:730_1: pemaṃ natthī”ti. Bhagavato vipassanāñāṇobhāsappavattiṃ sandhāyāha “paññā pana…pe…
tika-s0519t:730_2: sakkotī”ti. Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, pana abhiññāñāṇāni ca anantāparimāṇaṃ lokadhātuṃ obhāsenti.
tika-s0519t:732_0: Ṭhapetvāti pavattetvā. Vacanīyo yācakānanti yojanā, yācitabbayuttoti attho. Yaññaupakkharoti
tika-s0519t:732_1: yaññopakaraṇaṃ. “Etesu dhammesu ṭhito catūsū”ti vuttaṃ catukkaṃ vavatthapetuṃ “saddhoti
tika-s0519t:733: Gāthāyaṃ vuttadhamme dve dve ekaṃ katvā aṅgakaraṇaṃ dukanayo.
tika-s0519t:735_1: vā hotū”ti āha. Caturo padāti cattāri padāni, liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ, cattāro dhammakoṭṭhāsāti
tika-s0519t:735_2: attho. Kevalaṃ sattavibhāgadassanatthameva catupadaggahaṇaṃ, na adhigatadhammānurūpatāya.
tika-s0519t:737_0: “Saccavādī jino romo”tipi pāṭho. Tattha romoti diṭṭhirāgarattānaṃ titthiyānaṃ, titthakarānañca
tika-s0519t:737_1: adhammavādīnaṃ rāgaviparītadhammadesanato bhayajanako, adhammavādīnaṃ vā tattha ādīnavadassanena
tika-s0519t:737_2: bhāyitabbo, appahīnāsaṃvarānaṃ vā durupasaṅkamanato durāsadoti attho.
tika-s0519t:738: Sacco ca so dhammo cāti saccadhammo. Tenāha “ekantanissaraṇabhāvenā”tiādi.
tika-s0519t:740_0: Dassanabhāgiyaṃ bhāvanābhāgiyanti nibbedhabhāgiyameva dvidhā vibhajitvā vuttanti
tika-s0519t:740_3: Ca-saddena saṃkilesabhāgiyādipadāni ca saṅgaṇhāti. Lokiyattikasseva hi “sesapadānī”ti
tika-s0519t:740_4: vuttehi missakapadehi evaṃ saṃsandane nayadassanaṃ, itaresaṃ pana tikānaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyādipadehi
tika-s0519t:740_5: ceva sesapadehi ca saṃsandane idaṃ nayadassananti “vuttanayānusārena suviññeyya”nti
tika-s0519t:740_6: vuttaṃ. Samatikkamananti pahānaṃ. Satipi vāsanābhāgiyasaṃkilesabhāgiyadhammānaṃ lokiyabhāve
tika-s0519t:740_7: purimehi pana pacchimā pahātabbā tadaṅgavasena, vikkhambhanavasena ca. Evaṃ pajahanasamatthatāya
tika-s0519t:740_8: pahānanti vuttaṃ “vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyassa samatikkamāya hotī”ti.
tika-s0519t:740_9: Saṃkilesadhammānaṃ samatikkamena adhigantabbā vodānadhammā viyāti yojanā. Bhāvanā
tika-s0519t:740_10: nāma tividhā jhānabhāvanā, vipassanābhāvanā, maggabhāvanāti. Tāsu maggabhāvanāya
tika-s0519t:740_11: gahitāya vipassanābhāvanā gahitā eva hotīti taṃ anāmasitvā itarā dve eva gahitā.
tika-s0519t:740_12: Tathāpi “bhāvanābhāgiyassa suttassa paṭinissaggāyā”ti vutte kiṃ sabbena sabbaṃ asekkhassa
tika-s0519t:740_13: jhānabhāvanāpi paṭinissaṭṭhāti codanaṃ manasi katvā pāḷiyaṃ “asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ
tika-s0519t:740_15: nāma natthī”ti vatvā “jhānabhāvanāpi diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthā evā”ti āha.
tika-s0519t:741_0: Ekaṃ eva bhavabījaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ ekabījaṃ, taṃ assa atthīti ekabījī. Sandhāvitvā
tika-s0519t:741_1: samāgantvā, nibbattanavasena upagantvāti attho. Saṃsaritvāti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Kulaṃ
tika-s0519t:741_2: kulaṃ gacchatīti kolaṃkolo. Purimapade anunāsikalopaṃ akatvā niddeso.
tika-s0519t:742_0: Tesaṃ sotāpannānaṃ. Etaṃ pabhedanti ekabījiādivibhāgaṃ. Purimabhavasiddhaṃ vivaṭṭūpanissayapuññakammaṃ
tika-s0519t:742_1: idha pubbahetu nāma. Yo “katapuññatā”ti vuccati, so paṭhamamagge sādhite caritatthatāya
tika-s0519t:742_2: vipakkavipākaṃ viya kammaṃ uparimamaggānaṃ upanissayo na siyāti adhippāyenāha “upari…pe…
tika-s0519t:742_3: āpajjatī”ti. Tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ niratthakatā āpajjati paṭhamamaggeneva tehi kātabbakiccassa
tika-s0519t:742_4: sādhitattā. Paṭhamamagge…pe… āpajjatīti anuppannassa atthakiriyāsambhavato. Evaṃ
tika-s0519t:742_5: tiṇṇaṃ vādānaṃ yuttiabhāvaṃ dassetvā catutthavādo evettha yuttoti dassento āha “vipassanā…pe…
tika-s0519t:742_6: yujjatī”ti. “Sace hī”tiādinā taṃ yuttiṃ vibhāveti. Vimuttiparipācanīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-s0519t:742_7: paripakkatāya indriyānaṃ tikkhatāya ñāṇassa visadatāya vipassanāya balavabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0519t:742_8: So hi vomissakanayena saṃsaraṇako idhādhippeto “deve ceva mānuse ca sandhāvitvā”ti
tika-s0519t:742_9: vuttattā. Idha kāmabhave ṭhito idhaṭṭhako. Manussadevalokūpapajjanato okārena vokiṇṇo.
tika-s0519t:742_10: Ariyasāvakassa taṃtaṃsattanikāyupapatti tassa tassa sodhanasadisaṃ kilesamalādianatthāpanayanatoti
tika-s0519t:742_11: āha “cha devaloke sodhetvā”ti. “Akaniṭṭhe ṭhatvā”ti etena heṭṭhābrahmalokasodhanaṃ
tika-s0519t:743_0: Saddhaṃ dhuraṃ katvāti saddhaṃ dhuraṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā. Saddhāya anussati
tika-s0519t:743_1: paṭipatti, saddhaṃ vā pubbabhāgiyaṃ anussati, saddhāya vā anusaraṇasīloti saddhānusārī.
tika-s0519t:743_2: Dhammānusārīti etthāpi eseva nayo. Dhammoti panettha paññā veditabbā. Saddahanto
tika-s0519t:743_3: vimuttoti saddhāvimutto. Yadipi sabbathā avimutto, saddhāmattena pana vimuttoti attho.
tika-s0519t:743_4: Saddhāya vā adhimuttoti saddhāvimutto. Vuttanayenāti uparimaggavipassanāya balavamandamandatarabhāvena.
tika-s0519t:743_5: Diṭṭhiyā pattoti diṭṭhippatto, catusaccadassanasaṅkhātāya diṭṭhiyā nirodhappattoti
tika-s0519t:743_6: attho. Diṭṭhantaṃ vā pattoti diṭṭhippatto, dassanasaṅkhātassa sotāpattimaggañāṇassa
tika-s0519t:743_7: anantarappavattoti vuttaṃ hoti. Paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya hi yāva aggamaggā diṭṭhippattāti.
tika-s0519t:743_9: catasso rūpāvacarasamāpattiyo, catasso arūpāvacarasamāpattiyoti aṭṭha vimokkhā, tesaṃ.
tika-s0519t:744_0: Phuṭṭhantaṃ sacchikarotīti kāyasakkhī, phuṭṭhānaṃ anto phuṭṭhanto, phuṭṭhānaṃ arūpajjhānānaṃ
tika-s0519t:744_1: anantaro kāloti adhippāyo. Accantasaṃyoge cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ, phuṭṭhānantarakālameva
tika-s0519t:744_2: sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikarotīti vuttaṃ hoti, “visamaṃ candimasūriyā parivattantī”tiādīsu
tika-s0519t:744_3: viya vā bhāvanapuṃsakanti etaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yo hi arūpajjhānena rūpakāyato, nāmakāyekadesato
tika-s0519t:744_4: ca vikkhambhanavimokkhena vimutto, tena nirodhasaṅkhāto vimokkho ālocito pakāsito
tika-s0519t:744_5: viya hoti, na kāyena sacchikato, nirodhaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaccesu āsavesu khepitesu
tika-s0519t:744_6: tena so sacchikato hoti. Tasmā so sacchikātabbaṃ nirodhaṃ yathāālocitaṃ nāmakāyena
tika-s0519t:744_7: sacchikarotīti “kāyasakkhī”ti vuccati, na tu vimutto ekaccānaṃ eva āsavānaṃ aparikkhīṇattā.
tika-s0519t:745_1: idhāpi ānetvā yojetabbaṃ. Yatheva hi antarāparinibbāyiādibhedānāmasaneneva eko anāgāmī
tika-s0519t:745_2: hoti, evaṃ yathāvuttabhedaāmasaneneva saddhāvimutto, diṭṭhippatto, kāyasakkhīti tayo
tika-s0519t:745_3: anāgāmino honti. Ayañca anāgāmino tādisamavatthābhedaṃ gahetvā gaṇanā katāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0519t:746_0: Paññāya eva vimutto, na cetovimuttibhūtena sātisayena samādhināpīti paññāvimutto.
tika-s0519t:746_1: Ubhatobhāgavimuttoti ubhohi bhāgehi ubhatobhāgato vimutto. Kilesānaṃ vikkhambhanasamucchinnehi
tika-s0519t:746_2: rūpakāyanāmakāyato vimuttoti imamatthaṃ dassento “vikkhambhana…pe… vimutto nāmā”ti
tika-s0519t:746_3: āha. Arūpasamāpattiyā rūpakāyato, aggamaggena arūpakāyato vimuttaṃ. Yathāha –
tika-s0519t:747_0: “Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā, te kāyena
tika-s0519t:747_1: phusitvā viharati, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti, ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave,
tika-s0519t:748: Yaṃ pana mahānidānasutte “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādike nirodhasamāpattiante aṭṭha vimokkhe vatvā –
tika-s0519t:749_0: “Yato kho, ānanda, bhikkhu ime aṭṭha vimokkhe anulomampi samāpajjati…pe… ayaṃ vuccatānanda,
tika-s0519t:749_1: bhikkhu ubhatobhāgavimutto, imāya ca, ānanda, ubhatobhāgavimuttiyā aññā ubhatobhāgavimutti
tika-s0519t:750_0: Vuttaṃ, taṃ ubhatobhāgavimuttaseṭṭhavasena vuttaṃ. Tattha yasmā āruppasamāpattīsu
tika-s0519t:750_1: ekāyapi rūpakāyo vikkhambhito eva nāma hoti, tasmā catunnaṃ āruppasamāpattīnaṃ, nirodhasamāpattiyā
tika-s0519t:750_2: ca lābhīnaṃ vasena pañca ubhatobhāgavimuttā veditabbā. Esa nayo kāyasakkhimhipi.
tika-s0519t:751_0: Terasasu sīsesu palibodhasīsādīni, pavattasīsañca pariyādiyitabbāni, adhimokkhasīsādīni
tika-s0519t:751_1: pariyādakāni, gocarasīsaṃ pariyādakaphalaṃ. Tañhi visayajjhattaṃ phalaṃ, vimokkho
tika-s0519t:751_2: pariyādakassa maggassa, phalassa ca ārammaṇaṃ. Saṅkhārasīsaṃ saṅkhāravivekabhūto
tika-s0519t:751_4: samasīsibhāvaṃ dassetuṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ terasa sīsāni vuttāni. Idha pana “yassa puggalassa
tika-s0519t:751_5: apubbaṃ acarimaṃ āsavapariyādānañca hoti jīvitapariyādānañcā”ti puggalapaññattiyaṃ
tika-s0519t:751_6: āgatattā tesu kilesapavattasīsānaṃ eva vasena yojanaṃ karonto “kilesasīsa”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0519t:751_7: Tattha pavattasīsampi maggo pavattito vuṭṭhahanto cutito uddhaṃ appavattikaraṇena
tika-s0519t:751_8: yadipi pariyādiyati, yāva pana cuti, tāva pavattisambhavato “pavattasīsaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ
tika-s0519t:752_0: Kilesapariyādānena attano anantaraṃ viya nipphādetabbā, paccavekkhaṇavārā ca kilesapariyādānasseva
tika-s0519t:752_1: vārāti vattabbataṃ arahanti. “Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hotī”ti hi vacanato paccavekkhaṇaparisamāpanena
tika-s0519t:752_2: kilesapariyādānaṃ samāpitaṃ nāma hoti. Taṃ pana parisamāpanaṃ yadi cuticittena hoti,
tika-s0519t:752_3: teneva jīvitaparisamāpanañca hotīti imāya vāracutisamatāya kilesapariyādānajīvitapariyādānānaṃ
tika-s0519t:752_4: apubbācarimatā hotīti āha “vārasamatāyā”ti. Bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā parinibbāyatoti ettha
tika-s0519t:753_0: Caritanti caritā kāyavacīmanappavatti. Ettha ca yena rāgādhikabhāvena puggalo “rāgacarito”ti
tika-s0519t:753_1: lakkhīyati, tayidaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ. Tenāha “rāgajjhāsayo rāgādhikoti attho”ti, tena appahīnabhāvena
tika-s0519t:753_2: santāne thāmagatassa rāgassa balabhāvo lakkhīyatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Eseva nayo sesesupi.
tika-s0519t:754: Sīlavantehīti ādisaddassa lopaṃ katvā niddeso katoti dassento āha “sīlavantādīhī”ti. Ādisaddena dāyakādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0519t:756_1: saṃvaro, sekkhabhūmivasena pahānabhāvanā, asekkhabhūmivasena sacchikiriyā, puthujjanabhūmisekkhabhūmivasena
tika-s0519t:756_2: vā yathārahaṃ saṃvarapahānabhāvanā. Pubbabhāgiyā hi saṃvarapahānabhāvanā puthujjanassa
tika-s0519t:756_3: sambhavanti, itarā sekkhassa, asekkhabhūmivasena sacchikiriyā. Nayato dassitanti
tika-s0519t:756_4: “yaṃ, bhikkhave, mayā ‘idaṃ na kappatī’ti appaṭikkhittaṃ, taṃ ce kappiyaṃ anulometi,
tika-s0519t:756_5: akappiyaṃ paṭibāhati, taṃ vo kappatī”tiādinā nayadassanavasena pakāsitaṃ. Sarāgādisaṃvattananti
tika-s0519t:757_1: padānaṃ aññamaññasaṃsaggato. Anekavidhoti dvādasavidho yāva dvānavutādhikacatusahassavidhopi
tika-s0519t:757_2: anekappakāro. Lokiyasattādhiṭṭhānādisaṃsaggatoti ādisaddena lokiyaṃ ñāṇaṃ, lokuttaraṃ
tika-s0519t:757_3: ñāṇaṃ, lokiyañca lokuttarañca ñāṇaṃ, lokiyaṃ ñeyyaṃ, lokuttaraṃ ñeyyaṃ, lokiyañca
tika-s0519t:757_4: lokuttarañca ñeyyaṃ, lokiyaṃ ñāṇañca ñeyyañca, lokuttaraṃ ñāṇañca ñeyyañca, lokiyañca
tika-s0519t:757_5: lokuttarañca ñāṇañca ñeyyañcātiādiko sambhavanto paṭṭhānabhedo saṅgahito. Ubhayatthāti
tika-s0519t:757_6: saṃkilesabhāgiyādike, lokiyādike ca. Yathārahanti yo yo saṃsaggavasena yojanaṃ arahati,
tika-s0519t:757_7: so so dhammo. Sambhavāvirodheneva hi yojanā. Na hi “lokiyaṃ nibbedhabhāgiya”ntiādinā yojanā sambhavati.
tika-s0519t:758_0: Tīsu piṭakesu labbhamānassāti tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhe tepiṭake buddhavacane upalabbhamānassa
tika-s0519t:758_1: vijjamānassa, etena na kevalaṃ saṅgaho eva yathāvuttabhedānaṃ paṭṭhānabhāgānaṃ niddhāraṇāya
tika-s0519t:758_2: kāraṇaṃ, atha kho pāḷiyaṃ dassanañcāti vibhāveti. Tenāha “yaṃ dissati tāsu tāsu bhūmīsū”ti.
tika-s0519t:761_1: nivāsaṭṭhānataṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ, attano vā santāne pariyattisaddhammassa anuppavesanaṭṭhānatāya
